I'm glad I only paid $60 for it vs. the $199 that was listed as the regular price.  Will not purchase from this manufacturer again!

Reviews.Title: Great for
Reviews.Author: Cindy H.
Reviews.Content: Great for beginners ! my 4 years son loves it, It's easy to use and require charging every 2 hours

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: mah55
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this.  She can carry where ever she goes.  It is fully functional as a computer, can be used for games, music and holds a charge well.  My daughter has down syndrome and she has no trouble figuring it out.

Reviews.Title: Can't watch Google Play Movies, but otherwise my kid is happy playing her game apps.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am frustrated that I can download Google Play, but the movie that grandma and grandpa bought for her just won't play on the zeepad.  We have Google Play engineers trying to solve the problem. I was disappointed to realize there is no customer service number on the manual from Zeepad, nor can I find a customer service number on the internet.My daughter loves playing her Disney games and taking photos and video.  She's happy. I'm not fully.

Reviews.Title: Pissed I wasn't money
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Toya
Reviews.Content: No it did not meet my expectations!! This was a complete waste of money! I could be right by my wifi & it would tell me there's "no connection"... A lot of things are slow. I wouldn't even bother. I would be Bette off getting an iPad, galaxy tablet, hell the kindle fire would have been better!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: Mommy0608
Reviews.Content: This product might seem like a bargain for the price but the tablet is no good. It had glitches from the moment we turned it on. We'll be pressing one thing and the tablet will decide to do something completely different or nothing at all. I bought 2 tablets but ordered them at different times so I figured I would see if the second tablet had the same issue which it did. I am returning the products

Reviews.Title: Not as Described From Moma Imports, Better From Goodios
Reviews.Author: Cecil
Reviews.Content: My sister and I each purchased one of these from Moma Imports and both are really poor quality compared to the same product from Goodios.  From Moma there is no labeling on the buttons, the preloaded apps described on the product pages are not there, they are missing.  The included earphones stylus and screen protector that are normally included from other sellers are missing as well.  The battery lasts only 45 minutes with screen brightness turned down as low as possible on the Moma tablet but last 2 1/2 hours on the same product from Goodios.  These (Moma) are not nearly the quality and completeness that others are receiving from other sellers.  Mine was defective (would freeze whenever screen blanked) and I returned it.  When I purchased the replacement it came from Goodios and that unit was MUCH better and did not have any of the deficiencies of the ones which were supplied by Moma..  I can only guess but as a systems engineer I suspect that these (Moma) are factory seconds or somehow a different production run that the normal units and I would avoid purchasing them from Moma based on what we have experienced.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Tablet!
Reviews.Author: Dan White
Reviews.Content: Was a little nervous looking at some of the reviews of this product, but purchased it for a couple reasons. It fit my budget and it seemed to be a great starter tablet. So with no basis for comparison here goes.I purchased this for my wife so she could do words with friends and such without having to drag her laptop to bed with her. Neither of us have used a tablet before so keep that in mind.PROS:It arrived packed securely before the expected arrival date (2 days early)It had about a 50% charge when it came, but I stuck it on the charger and left it there for the remainder fo the day (5 hours), the following day I got it back out and started to set it up. The battery lasted all day, but I was working on it it intermittently.WiFi set up was a breezeThe app store had all of the apps I was looking for and the ui was very intuitiveThe screen is very responsive and the colors are vibrant.CONSIt did not come with a screen protector for some reason (minor complaint)The camera is not very good quality considering the average throw away cell phone comes with better image quality these days, but as far as the skype app goes it was a bonus but not why I bought this.In the end for the money I cant imagine getting a better starter tablet than this.

Reviews.Title: Eh, for the price...
Reviews.Author: Maria A. Cruz
Reviews.Content: Its functional... sort of...  For my 8 year old, she uses it to play games, and it is decent for that purpose.  But it doesn't hold a battery charge for very long, maybe lasting for about an hour.  Also the actual plug connection for the zeepad is crap.  You have to play with the cord and jam it into the tablet in order to get the darn zeepad to charge.  The charger is not the typical UBS or iPad type, but a thin connector, which is impossible to buy at regular stores.  So when the battery goes dead on a car ride, you are simply out of luck.  My recommendation?  Spend a bit more and get something that has more of a battery charge and easier to charge.

Reviews.Title: Son is very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Ellis
Reviews.Content: My ten year old saved his allowance for a tablet and chose this one, primarily because unlike most cheap off-brand tablets, it includes Google Play.We also own a 1st-gen Kindle Fire and this compares favorably.  It's roughly the same speed, but running Android 4.0 instead of the modified 2.3 on the Fire makes it a much better experience.I foresee the 4GB internal storage becoming too small eventually, but since it supports adding storage with a card, I'm okay with this.  Especially from my son's perspective, better to get the price down as low as possible to start with, and allow expanding it later.The one complaint I have is that it comes with a proprietary charging cable.  (It also comes with a USB cable, but I assume that is only for transferring files.)We were pleasantly surprised to find an included stylus in the box.  To be honest, I'm not sure what art programs we should look for to take advantage of this, but it was a nice bonus.All in all, for the price this is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Not what i thought ...
Reviews.Author: wandaful
Reviews.Content: I got the tablet with the expectation of it as being BRAND NEW out the box, but instead it was slightly used, with some scratches on the screen.  It appeared to have had some previous settings on it which I had to adjust. It also in the beginnning had problems with wifi connection.  its still not picking up  good when I leave the house.  Overall, it's an okay tab, a bit slow with some of the connections like netflix and it freezes up sometimes.  My opinion is to invest in a Brand you can trust.  I got this for my grand daughter.  Good for gaming.  I got myself a Kindle Fire, which I throughly ENJOY!!!!!! My grand daughter wants to switch and always is getting mine to watch netflix and to go online for stuff like Disney.

Reviews.Title: not for kids
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: Reviews must be at least 20 words longBecause of the price, we purchased two of these for our kids. Within two weeks the first on broke. now 1 month later, the second one is done for. Both were dropped on the VERY SENSITIVE power on/off button, braking the button right. I claim some responsiblity but very poor design.

Reviews.Title: poor poor battery
Reviews.Author: from NC
Reviews.Content: I can use this device for less than 30 minutes before needs charging -completely useless !!! Device is sluggish -speaker is bad

Reviews.Title: I hate it..
Reviews.Author: William Baiza "Willb14"
Reviews.Content: This item was new and did not work correctly...and to send back it was crazy it took about 8 weeks to get my money back........

Reviews.Title: Unknown Product
Reviews.Author: Lydia
Reviews.Content: No appropriate information is available to set the tablet up when you receive it.  What few directions are sent in the package must be read with a magnifying glass.  We will have to spend hours on my PC at home searching ways in which to bring this tablet to its supposed ability of use.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price!
Reviews.Author: Eursla Houston
Reviews.Content: As far as the tablet goes i purchased it for my 10 yr old daughter.She loves it. It's actually better than the Polaroid one i purchased for my son. The graphics are nice and crisp,but the camera sucks.I wish it would have came with better directions. All in all well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Can't wait to get this, really looking forward to learning how it works
Reviews.Author: Dr Susan Helman
Reviews.Content: Have not received yet.  I can't wati to see how it works and am hopeful that it is everything I thought it would be

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: Bill Lawlor
Reviews.Content: It came with everything in the box.  It has a real nice picture.  It is very fast for it's size.  It was money well spent.Thank YouBill

Reviews.Title: great economical alternative to the I-pad
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: has a microphone, and camera and works off a google platform.  I tried several other low price tablets.  They all lacked something.  The Zeepad is the best I have found for the price.  Other than being slightly slower and having somewhat less "user friendly controls" for my 2 and 7 year old, it is great.  And given the cost savings you cant beat it.  My girls love their new tablets.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: itisus
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get something to do some e-book reading on but don't want a single use device like a Kindle.  I never understood the whole Ipad thing, but now that I got this (and at a price that made it reasonable to get, not like buying another laptop) I am very impressed.  Not the greatest screen, the fastest processor or anything.  But I can read books, I can watch youTube, browse the internet, etc. and stick it in my pocket (a big coat pocket).  Seems to work great after having it a week.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: janet
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Tablet primarily to read on. It is a great tablet to read on. I only wished that I had purchased a tablet locally. The only way my Zeepad will charge is via the usb. It will not charge from the outlet, only by PC. Battery life is not very long either. After about two hours of reading its time to charge.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Robert Littleton
Reviews.Content: I enjoy that this tablet runs on the android system. The android system is very user friendly. The tablet and its system overall is user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: cindy r
Reviews.Content: This tablet was the right one for my son.  It is perfert to start out with.  He had no problems learning how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Goggles Pisano
Reviews.Content: I purchased it for less on the sears site a few weeks ago.  I've only had the zeepad for a couple weeks so I'm not sure about reliability.  So far, I'm very happy with the purchase.  I wanted something simple to use for ebooks, occasional videos, web and email use.  I downloaded the Kindle App and it works flawlessly.  The capacitive touch screen is much better than the cheap Archos tablet I had (which quit after a year).  I watched part of a netflix video on the zeepad and it ran well, but the dark scenes didn't show up well due to low contrast.  All other applications I've run were plenty colorful and vibrant.  The processing speed seems better than other cheap tablets.  One little quirk, but so far I haven't been able to keep the time consistently accurate.  It goes back to some factory programmed time zone (maybe China).  The battery doesn't seem to last more than 2-3 hours with constant average use.  Also, the actual screen size is a little smaller than most 7" tablets but not so much it matters.  The unit does resemble a large GPS navigation system in looks (which doesn't matter to me).  Overall, I am impressed with the quality of the tablet for the price.  It's probably worth $100-$150 when compared to others I've tried.

Reviews.Title: Not the same product
Reviews.Author: onique
Reviews.Content: The tablet I received was not the same product I order!! Instead of my zeepad they sent me a Yeahpad!! It does not keep a charge!! I am so upset

Reviews.Title: A gift for my daughter=)
Reviews.Author: Lesa
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for christmas.  I wanted to buy something cheaper than the ipad but still plays movies, apps, music.  She loves it.  It came recommended on here.  We love it!!!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Kevin D McMillan
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with what our zeepad can do.  It meets our expectations and more.  I was a little disappointed in how long it took to ship, but once the product got here it has been great.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: Ordered it just before Christmas...got it on time!!!  It was a gift and the person who got it loves it.

Reviews.Title: What I expected.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: It works well not as fast as the more expensive tablets but much cheaper. I would recomed it to any one looking for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad Review
Reviews.Author: Makeda
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my 5 and 7 year old girls, they love it and it was good quality for the money!!  I would definitely recommend it, cause I find myself using theirs alot.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: marino fernandez
Reviews.Content: For the price its a good product. Email set up is very easy, I bought this tablet to use it while on the road. I use my phone hot spot to connect to the internet and I was pretty surprise on the speed of the tablet, I thought it would be much slower. I use it for basic stuff just to read books, go online and watch some videos. The screen is really responsive, the tablet comes with head phones but the material is really cheap I didn't even bother on putting it on, it also come with a screen protector A+, charger, usb cable and a stylus pen (very nice). I also like that you can also charge it via usb since the charger pin looks a little fragile, so when that brakes you can always use the usb. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I just received my zeepad yesterday...I am very happy with this product.  I am suprised how fast it is...The picture is great....For the small amount it costs, it a great deal!.....

Reviews.Title: good for what I paid for it
Reviews.Author: NoDakGrl "nodakgrl"
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it.  It does all that it needs to do.  Its not the best picture, but for just basic internet viewing and watching movies and videos.....it is good.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet for the Price
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: For the money i am very impressed with this tablet. My son has a Lenovo with close to the same features, but cost almost 3 times as much. The only thing i was not impressed with is the battery power, which only lasts about an hour when you are doing stuff constantly.

Reviews.Title: this ended up to be even more than I had hoped.
Reviews.Author: Grammacoop
Reviews.Content: We reinstalled the Skype and now I get to spend quality time with my 8 year old grandson. He was totally taken by surprise that we bought it just for him.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kendra Dias
Reviews.Content: I have several coworkers who are interested in my fun sized "toy".  It is easy  to carry, and Im enjoying learning all of its features.

Reviews.Title: Kids love it!
Reviews.Author: Norfis Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Worth the wait... Didn't get it on time, but better late than never... Good tablet for kids and adults too.

Reviews.Title: Made my 8yr old son the Happiest kid this Christmas!
Reviews.Author: mkreader
Reviews.Content: This purchase was the best purchase i could have made.  My 8yr old son wanted a tablet like his father, but I didn't want to invest a lot of money.  This does everything i needed it to do.  Shipping scared me a little it was towards the end of the delivery time that i was quoted, but it did arrive. Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Dont order
Reviews.Author: Austen
Reviews.Content: Read all the reviews prior to ordering n thought people were maybe just over exagerating this shit sucks, i ordered 2 of them the first coming 2 weeks later when shoulda only took 3 days maybe if it was ups id understand but not mail thats fast, showing the laziness of the seller. On top of that just as other reviews say they come scratched your either selling me used shit calling it new Or dont know how to pack stuff corrctly knowing its going across country. The second ones taking longer n ill be suprised if it shows up before christmas.  Im sure my gf n gma will still like them but for the price at least take care of it n if they dont plan on refunding my account for both n receiving them back its bull shit i spend almost 170 for crap.

Reviews.Title: Very good product...
Reviews.Author: denis
Reviews.Content: I recieved this the day I was supposed to, I love it... don't believe all the negative reviews you read about this. So far it does everything I want it to do. The battery life is not very long it lasts about 2.5 hrs before it needs charged. The wifi works great, I get a signal in places I usually don't. The screen is bright and the colors are great, I have not watched any videos on it but the one it came with and it was crystal clear. Games work great on this, I have several so far, I do recommend getting a card for it to hold more...but overall it works great. The touch screen is very responsive, I did have to tap it a couple of times to get it to respond, but overall it's not a high end high dollar tablet. so far i am very pleased with it...

Reviews.Title: Handy item
Reviews.Author: Dian C Flouro
Reviews.Content: This item is easy to carry and use at work, and will come in handy for travelling verus carrying a laptop.I was not thrilled w/the seller, as it took a very long time to get to me.I recommend the product, not the seller I purchased it from.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made power cords
Reviews.Author: Barbara Cloney
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for my twins:First Issue: a prong broke off of the wall power cord IN THE WALL... thank God my 4 year old didn't try to take it out on his own.  Second Issue: Other twin's power cord came bent and doesn't work.Third Issue:  After contacting Amazon and finding that there was no contact phone number for distributor, I got a new Zeepad in the mail.  THIS power cord doesn't even fit into the device, therefore rendering that power cord useless....LAST and FINAL:  Resorted to the USB port to plug into the computer.  Son brought USB to show me....missing the metal part that goes around the prongs that go into the computer.  The metal that protects these prongs was still stuck into the USB port of my computer.The device itself is fine....IF YOU CAN GET IT CHARGED!

Reviews.Title: replaced
Reviews.Author: Alan gavami
Reviews.Content: This is an addition to my original review. The company edge cuter send me another zeepad for my doughter, but my doughter was now disappointed with the product. So I emailed the company and they worked with me to get this problem resolved. My son wanted a blue colored one. So I send the new pink one that I just had received in the mail and they send me aBlue colored zeepad for my son. It is not the fastest tablet but for the price and the companies cooperation in resolving this problem, I can't really complain. They fix the  Issues and improved their shipping methods, so the electronics are more protected during shipping. Because I know UPS or USPS just throw boxes around and couldn't care less what's in them. So overall as far as customer service the company did a great job, and my son loves his blue color tablet. It is his first one, and its been working fine so far. Thanks GaryAlan gavami.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: chestube
Reviews.Content: Bought for husband for christmas. Very easy for him to use. He loves to be able to read books on it. Gave 4 because battery life is short

Reviews.Title: An excellent introduction to the Android system
Reviews.Author: Edsel
Reviews.Content: An inexpensive way to explore the Google/Android galaxy. Our household owns iPads/iPhones/Touch's and a Windows 8 Tablet so the Zeepad was my experiment to test and compare the Android ecosystem. The Zeepad's processing performance is excellent, the screen is good, the user manual is a fun read because the translation to english is so bad. You can download much better instructions for the 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich OS from a variety of sources on the internet. The Zeepad even came with a charger, touch-pen, and ear-buds.If you are curious about the Android OS system the Zeepad is the tablet to get.

Reviews.Title: camera not there
Reviews.Author: Tami Eshelman
Reviews.Content: I specifically wanted a tablet that my daugther could take photos and video with as well as skype her sister who is away at college.  The specifications said it did it all.  Well yes technically it does it all, but the only camera and video is FACING the user!  So no dual camera...  disappointing to say the least.  But it shipped fast, and was really low priced.  And it functions well.  It holds battery life well and even without the camera, my daugther LOVES it.  She takes it on her daddy weekends so she can watch Netflix and check her facebook.  It seems to be quite sturdy too and the screen has a nice resolution.  I would recommend it unless you want the dual camera.

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love it
Reviews.Author: travisia
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my four year old for Christmas and it works like a charm! Very good tablet. The touch screen is excellent, and the setup was very easy!

Reviews.Title: granddaughter loves it
Reviews.Author: Sandra K. Mcbride
Reviews.Content: signed her right up for skype so she could keep in touch with friend that moved to Wash. state. good buy

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my eight year old daughter.
Reviews.Author: Michelle t
Reviews.Content: This was a nice christmas gift. My daughter likes this zeepad but its not as heavy as my kindle and if you press on the screen or back too hard there are small ripples that appear on the screen. This is my only concern because my daughter like most kids are not gentle when it comes to electronics. However, i think for the price im not worried and she will become use to not pressing the screen too hard when playing games on it. Will update within a few months !

Reviews.Title: They Love It!
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these for my younger sister and cousin. They absolutely love them. Great product for younger children!

Reviews.Title: Awesome, Magnificent Tablet -- Well Worth The Money
Reviews.Author: Yo Health Pro -- MK
Reviews.Content: I cannot tell you how extremely happy I am with this tablet.  Some of the comments on Amazon had me so concerned about this tablet that I had asked to return it before I even opened it.  After the seller assured me that they would accept this tablet back, I felt guilty for not giving it a try.  When i first opened and saw it, I was impressed.  It is so streamlined, it is beautiful.  It is so intuitive.  If you have ever used a computer before, using this tablet will be a breeze.  I have only had this tablet for a week, but I am in love with it.  The time was preset to China time, but I touched on (selected) Settings (the three little lines on the bottom right of the screen just above the time).  Then I went to System (scroll down) and clicked on Date and Time.  Click on both Automatic Date and Time and Automaic Time Zone to turn them off.  Then click on Select Time Zone to chose your time zone.  Once this is done, Click on both Auomatic Date and Time and Automatic Time Zone to turn them back on.  This will set the date and time according to your time zone.  You will not have to adjust the time at all.  I also was able to get all of the Google Apps that I wanted, once I got the time zone and time settings correct.  And the selection of Google Apps are voluminous, and almost overwhelming.  But you can search the Apps for the App you want.  I was able to get Norton Utilities to protect from viruses, for free.  I was even albe to download an App to do my banking with Chase Bank on this tablet, again free.  I have downloaded the Pandora App (again free).  Talking about impressive.  The sound is great, especially with the headphone attachment included.  Enjoying Pandora itself is enought to be impressed with this tablet alone.  f you have a cell phone, you can use the Google Phone App (free)to receive and make all your phone calls on this tablet.  Google Phone even transcribes your conversations so you can have a hard copy of what was said.  Skype App (free) is also included.  You can make video phone calls once yuo download the software and purchase a Skype phone number.  And all of this works.  It comes with an attachment that allows you to connect directly to USB hardware.  I have not tried it yet, but I can only imagine the number of hardware that I will attach to this tablet, including external speakers with an external power supply,  my full keyboard, a USB hub so I connect more than one piece of hardware at a time (again with an external power supply), my mouse, and even an external hard-drive with its own power supply.  And when I want to just carry the tablet with me, I can disconnect all of this hardware and have all the computing power I need for most of my applications.  When I tell you this tablet is awesome, it is truly awesome.  I can do everything on it that I would do on a regular computer, laptop or stand-up.  I must say that the processing speed will not be as fast as a laptop or stand-up, but I have not used any applications where I noticed the speed to be a problem, not yet!!  I am even thinking of attaching a second external wireless adapter to extend the range of the Wi-Fi.  Talking about a great computer, this is a great computer.  Who would expect to able to do all of this with a tablet.  I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a compact computer. that is easy to carry yet powerful enough to do most of your computing needs.  It is extremely powerful, and the screen resolution and icons are beautiful.  I would give it 10 stars if I could.  A great buy.  My best buy on Amazon since I started shopping on Amazon over 10 years ago.  And the price is more than reasonable.  I think anyone who takes the time to learn to use this tablet will be just as impressed with it as I am.  Cudos, Marvelous, Wonderbar, Fanterrific, Wondermous, Fantabulous, Excellentaprimo, and so many other adjectives that cannot come close to how impressed I am with this tablet.  A definite jewel in the rough!!!  I will write a follow up in the future to let you know if all of these external attachments will work.  But I don't see why they wouldn't.  Again, like I said, an extremely impressive tablet and an awesome buy!!!

Reviews.Title: not. bad tablet
Reviews.Author: bhenjo
Reviews.Content: not bad for the price everything that you need is there except it wjll be more better if it has more memory rom

Reviews.Title: CRAP!!!
Reviews.Author: misty
Reviews.Content: I have had nothing but issues with this dumb things since i bought it! I would not even give it half a star!!! Dont waste your money! the screen freezes all the time, the charging dock is broken! and now i cant reach the company to see if it still has a manufacturing warrenty on it!!

Reviews.Title: not please
Reviews.Author: bernadette
Reviews.Content: The zeepad is OK the charger stop work to soon and the camera is very poor I don't thing I will purchase a zeepad again

Reviews.Title: 5 stars for the right purpose, 1 star otherwise
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "average joe"
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a cheap tablet to watch youtube videos, play a few (and only a few!) games, and occasionally check e-mail/facebook, this is a steal.  If you're looking for a fully functioning tablet, stay away...this becomes slow and nearly unusable with multiple apps running and memory filled more than 25%.I've bought 2 for my 8-year-old son (he sat on the first and broke the screen), and they both worked great.  Perfect tablet for simple use by a young child (or maybe an IT-challenged senior).

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: lauren
Reviews.Content: I know there quite a bit cheaper than all the other tablets, they feel cheap also, but there still a really good buy! Great for kids that are first time users of tablets to break them in....there actually really fast at downloading books and apps and looking at web pages.

Reviews.Title: They do not honor their warranties
Reviews.Author: Maxine Blocker-burnette
Reviews.Content: My zee pad stopped working after less than 5 months.  It worked very well for 4 months then started acting up and finally just stopped working.  The company told me I did not return it in the 90 day return period.  When I bought the tablet it said it had a one year warranty.  Well it stopped working after 4.5 months.  At the time I purchased the item it said it had a one year warranty.  My advice don't buy from Goodios.

Reviews.Title: great tablet for older kids
Reviews.Author: gfcf momma
Reviews.Content: bought 3 of these for my kids for christmas and bought the warranty with them....the kids love them and so do we. word of advice, get the warranty through square trade, well worth it and we had the refund on the broken tablet within 3 days.

Reviews.Title: This is a great deal even though there are minor issues...
Reviews.Author: Desert Rain Photography
Reviews.Content: For the price I would had expected a whole lot less. My first thought was that it felt like a toy but then I saw a front and rear facing camera. It charged quickly and does 99% of what my iPad 2 does. I bought it because I'm a tech, web designer and programmer and I need to check my stuff on Android devices. Even though at first look it may seem cheap it's not, it's a bargain. LOL! This little device has more computing power than all of NASA's computers when they sent me to the moon. The peeps leaving negative responses... Please try and understand there are two kinds of people... People that are grateful and like stuff and then there are people that win the weekly lottery and bitch for the rest of their lives they didn't win more. Bottom line, This pad is a steal of a deal and way better than not having on e at all...

Reviews.Title: Tablet for children
Reviews.Author: Pastor Yvette Smith
Reviews.Content: I have no complaint I have bought a total of 5 Zeepad 7" and my grandchildren love their tablets.  I getting ready to have to order another one.Pastor Smith

Reviews.Title: the tablet is good but not sturdy
Reviews.Author: Monique Sears
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet for my kids ... it plays minecraft and other games with no prob...however my sons tablet broke within 2 months....it isn't the most sturdy--- if you do buy it..get a case and tell your kids to go easy when charging it and handling it.....

Reviews.Title: What is the problem with this product?!
Reviews.Author: HB
Reviews.Content: I first ordered this product from another vendor through Amazon and had to return it because it would not turn on anymore. Ordered a new one from this vendor and now only after having for a couple of weeks, the screen is white with lines. I'm going to return this and get an entirely new product. No more Zeepad for me.

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: LaDonnia
Reviews.Content: this item didnt last for a year  my daughter was disappointed and now i have to purchase her another tablet

Reviews.Title: Got four of these for my kids
Reviews.Author: Undefinable
Reviews.Content: I thought these tablets were going to go out after a few uses. Surprisingly, they are still working after several uses, charges, and drops.Pros: Work just as well as other Android tabletsCons: Battery doesn't hold long. (This is a Pro me since the tablets are for my kids)  Camera resolution is low

Reviews.Title: Bought for my children
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Roomes"
Reviews.Content: This item is perfect for children between the ages of 4-12. I just hope it will last as its gone 4 months already with zero issues.

Reviews.Title: Great cheaper tablet
Reviews.Author: Shay
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my kids for Christmas and they love it. It was packaged very well and worked perfectly right out the box. It already has Google play on it and some apps already installed. Its been a week and it still works fine. I would definitely recommend this tablet as a cheaper alternative to the higher one's.

Reviews.Title: Not an iPad but a value for the price.
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: Have had for a few weeks and even has been dropped a couple of times and still works. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 14 year old daughter. Its nice for her to have instead of carting around her laptop around when she just wants to use the net or facebook or play games.

Reviews.Title: Slow.
Reviews.Author: brant
Reviews.Content: I have two of these. They are decent for the price. Slow running though and each one I have has a slightly different software than the other. Not sure why but they serve there purpose. Now my kids leave my Kindle Fire alone.

Reviews.Title: Fun tablet
Reviews.Author: Peter Bouzianis
Reviews.Content: I gave this tablet away to my customers as a promotional giveaway and they love it connect to the Internet quickly and search the Internet pretty fast

Reviews.Title: YOU RUINED MY DAUGHTERS CHRISTMAS!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: James Johnson
Reviews.Content: THIS THING HAS TROUBLE DOWNLOADING APPS AND IF IT CAN DOWNLOAD AN APP THEN IT HAS TROUBLE LOADING IT IT SHUTS OFF OR REBOOTS.....I HOPE SOMEBODY CAN DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS ASAP...

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: Good tablet for the price. Android apps are available so thats awesome, it is not a high dollar tablet because you didn't pay high dollar. Any bad review is flawed. You get what you pay for and more!

Reviews.Title: Good For Price
Reviews.Author: Shawn Prejean
Reviews.Content: My son and I use our tablets nearly every day.  They are not the best, slow processor, sometimes lags or freezes, but for the price I am happy with the product.  If you are buying it just to keep a kid busy, or as an ereader it an acceptable product.  If you are a tech gadget nut then you shouldn't be trying to skimp on price to try and get a high end product.  Also, if you plan to watch movies on it i.e. Netflix, HBOGO, Hulu......... then get the biggest SD card you can find for it, without it none of them will play.

Reviews.Title: YES!!!
Reviews.Author: Callahan
Reviews.Content: First of all, the tablet got here two days earlier than stated when I placed my order.  I love the fact that there where a lot of different apps already installed on the device.  It is very user friendly.  My 4 yr old loves playing the games on it and watching movies as well (it keeps her busy while I do house work).  I have not had any problems with it so far and everything works very well.  It's not a Apple product or anything like that but it is GREAT for what it does cost.  Got this one for under $70.00 and I plan to write an update on it in the future.  Good buy for kids and teens...and parents who don't want to spend a lot of money.  lolUPDATE:Today (2/08/2014), nearly 2 months later, the screen on the tablet went out.  I strongly suggest that you purchase a warranty if you are able to because this item will tend to have a few issues.  It is slow at loading at times as well.  But I still stand by what I said before...it's a great buy for kids, teens, and parents who don't want to spend a lot of money.  You get what you pay for...

Reviews.Title: Awful, dont waste your money,
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Campbell
Reviews.Content: Broke in a matter of weeks. Wasn't even worth the money. The charging port is trash. Within two weeks couldnt even charge it

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: s. brubaker
Reviews.Content: It must be made out of eggshells. Or made to self destruct after it's too late to send back. It wasn't used hard at all and the screen just cracked. After like a month or two.

Reviews.Title: not a bad deal,  but description lies.
Reviews.Author: magda
Reviews.Content: the shipping was fast,  the device works,  but the specs are dishonest.  it says 4GB capacity,  but it only came with one,  and one for the sd card.  i had to put an 8GB sd card before i gave it to my friend as a gift.  i couldn't just guve it to her with such grossly unmet specs.  i dont know if dealers know this,  but it is illegal to sell some something that does not match it's advertised description.  you can't someone you're gonna sell them a chicken,  and give them a dog.  who do approach about compensation??

Reviews.Title: Very easy to operate!
Reviews.Author: jamie hang
Reviews.Content: Resolution is not as good compare to the higher end tablets but still a good quality overall. So far no lag and runs better than expected. Perfect for the younger ones.

Reviews.Title: temp tablet won't last long
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Robbins
Reviews.Content: Worked great for 6 months then power button came off power board and there is no way to repair it.  Spend a little more or buy one with a repair/replacement plan.

Reviews.Title: Help
Reviews.Author: Norma Ruckey
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of the ZEEPad's  On this one (pink) the camera picture is blurry.  the other (green) the picture is OK.  I already have several apps downloaded and e mail set up and have since thrown away the return slip.  I am leaving Thursday for a week.  So I am hesitant to return.  Is there anything else I cando.  Everything else seems OK with the exception of the fuzziness of the camera.  Maybe there is a focus button I cannot locate.

Reviews.Title: good if you plan on buying protection plan at time you buy tablet otherwise not good item
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: i have bought two of these for my 11 and 10 yr old boys who only use them indoors sitting down no rough housing or anything like that and they seemed to be really good at first. the first one bought was working fine then only two months later it stopping working correctly. a month after i bought the first i bought a second one and when it arrived it already had problems with some things now only over one month of having it the touch screen stopped working also. so with in few mo s both are not able to be used due to touch screen not working anymore. if u buy this also buy protection plan. because if not you will be stuck with useless electronics also.

Reviews.Title: Bad choice
Reviews.Author: carolyn chandler
Reviews.Content: This was a piece of junk and the seller never responded to my request for help.it worked for two weeks and then the tabs started to fall off form the inside and it was humpy dumpy from that point on. I'm not poverty stricken,but I don'tHave that kind of money to just give away.No matter how old the child is don't disappoint them with this product.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Sharon Perry
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandaughter. It was slow from the start & I should have returned it then but made the mistake of letting her keep it, now three months later it doesn't work at all, it is junk! I should have got her a Kindle or a Nook, I guess you get what you pay for! I received no help from the seller or the manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Thought it would last longer than 2 months!!
Reviews.Author: cdhj1234
Reviews.Content: Had this tablet for 2 months. It has frozen several times and now will not hold a charge. The charger broke within the first month. The tablet will not charge at all now. I can't return it because it is out of the time window to return. No idea how to contact seller!! Very frustrating!!

Reviews.Title: Slows and freeze up often
Reviews.Author: Donaisha Walker
Reviews.Content: Terribly slow!!!!! Don't buy! I buy it for my child who loves tablets even she can't deal with the  terrible drag....

Reviews.Title: excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Ana Jacquelinne Bueno Perez "Miami"
Reviews.Content: my daughter loved it.!! she can surf the net, go to her facebook and play some games. Has loads of applications to download, plus you can use nexflix and you tube. I recommend it, for me it was an excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: Ok...
Reviews.Author: Eileen
Reviews.Content: Bought for our 6year old son works well for him but not for adult use..always freezing and battery dies after not much use

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: jandm
Reviews.Content: So far so good . I have used it some but I purchased this as a Christmas present for my 15 yr old son . So we will see how well it holds up . I currently have a nextbook but I like this one better than mine.

Reviews.Title: good price
Reviews.Author: K. Morales
Reviews.Content: works great, and it's durable. my kid love them, She use it to see videos and to play computer games...  Good product

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Just me! "Just Me"
Reviews.Content: Bought as gift for 10 year old girl.  She loves the games and the facial recognitionand the internet wifi

Reviews.Title: it's okay
Reviews.Author: tbyrd
Reviews.Content: I like that this product is affordable but there is always a but...... the battery only stays charge for an hour or so before you have to plug it back it. Some say its because of the apps but I find that not to be true at all!!!! Even when reading, you have to always carry your charger and be next to a power outlet in order to enjoy. Next time I will definitely invest because battery wise its JUST NOT WORTH IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Bought the tablet for my oldest son. Ordered it on a wed. It said delivery date would be between October 1-4 got it on sat September 25. The only thing is that it said 4GB and I checked on the tablet it had less then 1GB on it. Other than that its a pretty good tablet. Would recommended it if your debating on getting it get it. Money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Stopped Charging After 3 Months
Reviews.Author: Dana Sabo
Reviews.Content: There is no reason that this product should have stopped working after on 3 months of light use. I am very disappointed. The tablet will no longer charge. I have tried the AC adapter which has been charging it up until now and I have tried several different USB connectors and it will not charge with any of them. The seller only has a 30 return policy so I have contacted the companies that they the seller recommended to see it they will honor the manufacturer warranty. I hope I don't get the run around and they will promptly send a replacement.

Reviews.Title: NEW ZEE PAD JUST A FEW DAYS OLD
Reviews.Author: W. MEHALOF
Reviews.Content: The zee pad is very nice compared to my plain android 7 inch tablet..I have one question-- How do you get it started running-- the battery is fully charged and  when i get the screen on it turns off in a minute, i dont know how to unlock the screen.. I want to get online with it soon. Im having a problem getting the icon screen on ect..If anyone has any suggestions please e-mail me, ok...duncan_mee@yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: defective
Reviews.Author: Cindy R, VA
Reviews.Content: Power switches malfunction after less than month,or so. At first I thought it was the kids fault, but the last one I bought for myself had the same defect. Apparently I was excited with the product,at first they seemed to be working well. I purchased 4 of them.The back cases vs pink seemed to hold up a little longer.

Reviews.Title: good little tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: rdale
Reviews.Content: bought this for a 3 and 4 year old and they love it.  mostly for Netflix, games and recorded movies... no problems.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my 7 year old & he LOVES it!
Reviews.Author: A Nu Redd
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to spend as money on a tablet for my son as I did for my Ipad because I was scared he wouldn't take care of it and it would be down the drain. I ran across this one on Amazon and figured for the price, I wouldn't be upset should he damage or break it. To my surprise, he has had this for over 6 months, there are no scratches, he has all of the games he wanted, and he has accidentally dropped a few times & there has been NO damage to report at all! It  takes a licking and keeps on ticking! Perfect for younger children. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: useless..
Reviews.Author: Esmeralda
Reviews.Content: It's useless , this is the second one i bought and once again it doesnt want to charge and i've bought like 3 chargers for it already . waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Not many apps but it is decent
Reviews.Author: G. Lynch
Reviews.Content: this is for my son and at its price I feel like it does what it can.  So its a decent buy.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: SheriK
Reviews.Content: This is a good tablet for the price, the screen protector was a little tricky to get the bubbles out,but I bought it for a 4 & 5 year old so I  didn't want nothing to fancy. I would buy it again!

Reviews.Title: Would not purchase again
Reviews.Author: autumn
Reviews.Content: My daughter worked this summer to save money to purchase a tablet. We found this one and thought we would give it a try. The charger didn't work, when we contacted the seller they told us to use a cell phone charger ( not what I paid for) also it freezes a lot. Would not purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Vulpie
Reviews.Content: I don't have a laptop and being a design, a tablet would be a great tool so I bought the Zeepad because it's cheap and the reviews were great! I was pleasantly surprised by all of the stuff it came with (usb adapter to upload my portfolio, screen protector, stylus, etc) and by how responsive it is! It's just as quick as my Dad's $200 tablet but for more than half the price! It's small, but I don't need anything too big anyway, and the camera is nice to skype with my friends (note: if you're going to use skype, uninstall the skype app that comes with it and install the current version from the play store, otherwise video doesn't work). The only real complaint I have about it is the battery life but that's fine by me considering it's price. Well worth it!

Reviews.Title: WoPad 8
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: It tends to run a little hot. Can be tough to hold. Freezes sometimes and seems to kick the Wifi modem off a lot on certain downloads. Color is nice. Screen is ok. Camera's are weak. But for the money and Pacman type apps and the fact it does browse the internet and do most basic functions I guess its Ok. Battery time could be a little longer. 1st run it stayed up about 6 hours. After that the battery time seems to be on average of about 2 hours. Chord is to short to run on charger. If you do run on charger it gets really hot. If it lasts a year I'll consider it worth the money paid.

Reviews.Title: zpad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Perfect size. Battery life could be a little longer. Needs car charger. Operating system a little slow. Otherwise awesome product.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Jak8787
Reviews.Content: Everything internal was shifted, none of the ports lined up with the plugs, same with the power button, it was partially depressed on one side.

Reviews.Title: returned it
Reviews.Author: DP
Reviews.Content: Tablet is really slow, major delay in typing as well, after two weeks the charging port broke so I returned it which was very easy to do through Amazon, they sent ups the next day to pick it up

Reviews.Title: Not a premium device
Reviews.Author: dwane everett
Reviews.Content: this is an okay product my 10 yo loves hers they break easy limited storage capacity and the battery really sucks i would not get another nor would i recommend and the charger breaks very easily

Reviews.Title: No extended warranty
Reviews.Author: B.I.C. LINE COMPANY
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 & both stopped working after 2 months. I cannot even return these for replacement or repair after the 30 days window expired. I would not recommend these to anyone. Buying something cheap every 3 months does not make sense. Better buy something 3 times the price that will work for years

Reviews.Title: Perfect for My Grandson
Reviews.Author: BetsyDavis
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect starter "iPad" for my grandson.  He is always wanting my iPad and this was a great solution. The setup was very easy and I am happy with the sale, and delivery.

Reviews.Title: zpad great purchase
Reviews.Author: loganzz1
Reviews.Content: This product met all but one of my requirements. It does not have a universal power cable. Mini or micro. Other than that it does everything my kids need in fact 4 days after I got it I purchased a second one for my 12 year old and he can't put it down.. so in my opinion its great for 7 year olds as well as pre teens...

Reviews.Title: Well wtf.
Reviews.Author: Astreja
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery. slow device. small. lightweight. cute. horrible camera. doesn't hold a charge for more than an hour. good for games. you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for*************
Reviews.Author: Laci Ledbetter
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these, one for each of my children.  I am dealing with setting them up and downloading the games and such for the kids, because I want to control what they see.  Here are the issues I have noticed so far with these tablets...1.) Response time is ridiculously slow.  You hit "Install" and it MIGHT flip screens 30 seconds later.  If it doesn't it will "time out" ... Timing out happens consistently.  I don't know how the games are with response time, I haven't had the patience to even try.  The kids haven't complained, but they are just happy they have a tablet.2.) The screens aren't very sensitive.  I realize that screens can be too sensitive but I shouldn't have to jam my finger on the screen to get it to respond.  Very annoying.3.) Low quality graphics -- honestly, I didn't expect much from a $70 tablet, but just thought I would let you know. It's no ipad or Kindle with the graphic quality.4.) Battery life. .... It. Dies. FAST.  I was just TRYING to download a game on one, it gave me the "You're at 14% notification" and literally less than 5 minutes later when I went to plug it in, it was already down to 9%. This is supposedly a brand new tablet.  We literally got it in the mail yesterday. (Please note that we've had the other one for several weeks, so I'm not writing this review without having used this.)5.) Very cheaply made.  The Power Off button feels like it's going to fall off it's so loose. The camera is crooked and my daughters pad is coming apart in the middle. When I say "very," I do mean VERY cheaply made.6.)  The "User Manual" is supposedly written in "English" however, it doesn't even make sense.  Here is a sentence from the "User Manual"  "#3 Check the music file wherther damaged. Try playing other music, if the file have damaged may lead to serious noise or hop sounds."  ---that is letter-for-letter.  Huh?If you're wanting a serious tablet.  Avoid this one. I only gave it a star, because I had to. Like I said, the kids don't complain - they are just happy to have a tablet but I am not satisfied and would not use this for myself.  If I had purchased this for myself, I would have returned it immediately.  Will update this review if something changes, but I doubt it will.

Reviews.Title: It only lasted for three months
Reviews.Author: carole
Reviews.Content: I purchase this table for a teenager who found it limited, slow and flimsy slow.  The major issues were the power plug and ability to connect to computer

Reviews.Title: Quit working within 3 months
Reviews.Author: C. I. Ponzi "addicted to reading"
Reviews.Content: Bought this in April by the end of June the screen went black and never came back. Couldn't fine anywhere to send back amazon doesn't even give an address for returns. Total waste of money for the time we had it. By the way wasn't dropped or wet or misused just quit working.

Reviews.Title: changed my mind
Reviews.Author: sewsherry "sherry"
Reviews.Content: I loved this tablet when I first got it.  I gave it a shining review. It seemed perfect.  But after  3 months, it stopped holding a charge. and then the place where you attach the plug to the devicestarted getting loose, and then broke completely, and I am very careful with my stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great 1st tablet...
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: The Zeepad 7.0 came on time. I am pleased with it and my Grand daughter who is 6 LOVES it. Adding Apps through Google Play is fast and easy. The apps run smoothly. We have yet to figure out all of its many functions. My only complaint is that everyone...even Grandpa want's to play it and the charge doesn't last long enough....But we really like it.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Satisfied
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the notepad.  The product was a good value for the quality of the merchandise.  Would highly reccommend.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Product
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Nicolalda
Reviews.Content: I'm giving this product a negative start due to many issues that this tablet has. First, the power switch on this tablet does not work. I bought this tablet for Christmas for my niece who still can use it since this tablet came defected from the seller. The seller "engine29" has no idea how to run its business since I shipped this tablet to be fixed since the power switch has defected problems. After expending $19.00 for shipping, they e-mailed me requesting $15.00 to fixed their defected tablet plus another payment to ship this tablet back. The tablet cost me $69.99 plus $19.00, Now!!! they want $15.00 plus shipping charges. I'm not happy with this tablet and seller products. This is my first time I'm writting negative reviews since other sellers are willing to keep their business honest and profitable.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Gadget_girl
Reviews.Content: This little tablet is good for taking anywhere you want it does everything a computer would do I have 3 kids and they all have one its perfect for them and they love it

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeeepad is junk
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The screen is not very clear. It is very slow. Power button broke off and fell inside of pad less than 2 weeks after recieving making it unuseable. Dont wast your money.  Gave one star because that is lowest possible.  It deserves negative stars. Most disapointing purchase of my life.

Reviews.Title: For my Kids
Reviews.Author: Destiny J.
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my kids and for them its perfect for the few apps that they like. They love it.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7"
Reviews.Author: Larry5357
Reviews.Content: I like this product very appordable to buy very easy to used by young and adults and i want to buy this product again for a gift to my family and friend im satiesfied ......,

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Rigoberto
Reviews.Content: Very responsive touchscreen, used it for games like Minecraft and Angry Birds. We got it for my little sister and she loved it, but broke it a while back by sitting on the cord while it was charging, therefore breaking the charging area inside the device. I used it sometimes for email and things, I would also download the games for her, never had a problem with it. Very good buy, would buy it again for somebody else.

Reviews.Title: Good kid's tablet
Reviews.Author: K. Lucas
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these tablets for my 5-year old twins because I was tired of them stealing my tablet.  This is not a Kindle Fire or iPad kind of tablet (the processor is not super fast, the screen response is slower and the battery life isn't stellar), however it works great for my little ones and I'm not worried about it all the time.  My kids can play their favorite games to their hearts' content.  It arrived promptly and even included a screen cover.  I'm happy with this product and my shopping expereince with this dealer.

Reviews.Title: only worked one week then screen turns on and goes black
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: screen turns on and goes black and when i contacted to find out what to do i got blown off very disapointed paid for a peace of garbage

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: I was a bit worried cause of the price but its pretty perfect I ranked it 4 stars cause the WiFi on it is pretty frustrating. It will disconnect constantly and and the instructions they send you tell you how to fix it but its not a permanent fix. You have to constantly turn the WiFi off and back on but it takes forever to turn back on. And it won't automatically connect to the internet even if you have signal you have to manually go in and connect. But other than the crappy WiFi it works great!

Reviews.Title: Cheap - Sometimes you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I was excited as this was a cheap tablet that had decent reviews... unfortunately mine broke within a week.  I was hoping to have a cheap alternative for my 3 year old twins to play with instead of using dad's ipad.  Unfortunately this one did not meet the grade.  These broke shortly after purchasing.  One had a screen damaged after putting the tablet in a bag along with other books.  The other one is still working but is slow and unresponsive.I work in IT and was hoping to avoid paying for a more expensive unit.  This is one time that I wish I would have just bit the bullet and purchased an ipad.  The Zeepad that didn't immediately break is slow and just sits on the shelf.  I now still have to wait my turn to use my ipad.

Reviews.Title: It very nice
Reviews.Author: Rodney Treadway
Reviews.Content: It very entertaining to used. I Love the  size and the price the speed is good when accessing programs or website. I have a iPad but I found myself using the ZeedPad more. Mind you IPad is very, very fast but also very, very expensive. I leave the iPad at work and take the Zeepad with me every where I go. The camera is O.K. But In time Zeepad may increase the resolution. But again for the price It very nice.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated
Reviews.Author: judy
Reviews.Content: I'm really not sure how I like it. The chargers don't work unless I hold them a certain way, and when I went to send it back. I broke the screen in the parkinglot of the UPS store. And of course they wont replace it because the screen is now broke. So now I have bought a replacement screen, and of course that is cracked as well. I'm starting to think that amazon is not for me...

Reviews.Title: 7" zeepad 7.0 allwinner A13 Boxchip Cortx A8 Android 4.0 4GB Capacity
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey G Harwood
Reviews.Content: Tablet charger had a broken wire inside plugin unit. Tablet quit working within 6 weeks. Bought a new tablet atwalmart for less money. So far so good on the new tablet.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Zoe Best
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 Zeepad's for my grandkids and one for myself.  It is great for a kid but for me it was slower than I had hoped. I still play games on it and considering the price it is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Horrible product
Reviews.Author: Ksm
Reviews.Content: I brought 2 of these and they are horrible. I first brought 2 from another store and decided to but 2 more thur amazon....worst mistake. The products reject alot of apps that are offered in the App Store. The power level is ridiculous! They have to stay charged! They are very thin avid made of really light plastic! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY! Put a few extra dollars with it and get a better product or just buy from another store. Only my amazon products were horrible. The exact same items purchased from another store were just fine!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: ismo
Reviews.Content: I can't pan this product as my expectations were low. I mean what do expect from a $70 computer, but ultimately I found it too slow to be of any use to me. I'm not sure whether the processor was at fault or the wireless card but it did not even surf the internet efficiently. I had hoped to use it for dictation but found that an impossibility as the only way it could process speech was if I spoke one...word...at...a...time with a lengthy pause between them.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Paul 6267
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 10yo daughter and have not had any problems with it, other than the battery seems to deplete quite quickly but overall this is a great product. She has tons of games downloaded on it she does research for reports, reads news and watches movies on it all with no problem. This is a really good product and with the addition of a tf card this tablet is just as good as my apple ipad.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Product
Reviews.Author: Nathan M. Russler
Reviews.Content: I was not shipped a Red Zeepad Android Tablet.  I was shipped something similar, but it was Black, and had none of the features described in the description.  None of the Apps were pre-loaded, although that was an easy fix.  It did not come with a bonus stylus, screen protector, or earphones, as advertised, just a AC adapter-type charger that doesn't work.  It will hold a charge and let my kid play with it (for about 2 hours) if you use a standard micro-USB-type charger.I wouldn't get anything else from this seller ever again.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet Great Price
Reviews.Author: Johnny5.Ontime
Reviews.Content: Bought the pink Zeepad for my daughters 8th birthday, she has been using it everyday for the past 2 months and it hasnt lost a step, works great, great response to the touch and that was one of my major concerns. I have handled other cheaply priced tablets and the response to the touch is not as fast as it should be, this tablet however reacts very quickly and all apps work just like they should no issues, I would recommend this tablet for anyone, especially if your looking to get one for your child and are afraid to spend a few hundred dollars with the notion that they are just children and could break the item so if that happens the cost of the tablet is within reason to just get a new one lol

Reviews.Title: For my daughter
Reviews.Author: Pat Sadler
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it.  She left it in a friend's car and he used it and loved it.  So, this seems to be a winner.  I have a Kindle and for the price difference, this can't be beat.  She says the camera is also very good.

Reviews.Title: USELESS
Reviews.Author: tedward
Reviews.Content: The screen parted from body as I tried to get protective package cover off. Cracked the screen and unit went dead!!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: C. Kulik
Reviews.Content: For the price, I find the Zeepad very good.  The only thing I don't get is how to take a picture when there is no viewing hole in the back.  The only picture you can take is of yourself!  I would like it if the battery lasted more than an hour, but all in all, I think it is a good buy for what I use it for.  I have downloaded games (It comes with Angry Birds) and books.  I like it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Lmmbee
Reviews.Content: When the tablet arrived it was extremely slow and was not compatible with many of the apps I wanted. I was told to restore it, that didn't work and then I was told to go to a website to go and do another update. After all of that it still didn't run anything.

Reviews.Title: poor battery
Reviews.Author: Tish McCracken
Reviews.Content: very poor battery life!! would not connect to wifi!,often locked while in use. cute and lite weight,loaded apps easily. returned it.

Reviews.Title: Little tablet
Reviews.Author: E. Carrasquillo "lizriver"
Reviews.Content: The plastic is a bit cheap, even for the price. Still my kids like it.  Was very disappointed you can't charge overnight.

Reviews.Title: Flemsy
Reviews.Author: Vegasguy
Reviews.Content: Don't let this thing get handled incorrectly or for that matter broken, because it wont be able to get fixed stateside and the wait roundtrip is way to long.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: TONYA STANTON
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a late Christmas gift for my son. The reviews were pretty good, and I have never had to return anything I purchased from Amazon.com. My son received this tablet at the end of January. On the outside of the box was written Tablet PC, MID Android, nothing about a Zeepad 7.0 Allwinner like the online description stated. The invoice was from a totally different vendor (from China DanDan Wu, pandawill.com) than who I ordered it from HD-Design. After about three months the device stopped charging and is no longer working. I expected my son to have this device longer than three months. Do not buy this item!

Reviews.Title: Broken :(
Reviews.Author: Jasmine Nordstrom
Reviews.Content: My daughter was super excited to receive this and she had it not even a month it was in a case it dropped the screen still broke.  I have had multiple electronics and they have dropped never broke.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Sharon R
Reviews.Content: I received this on time.  I really like it but it's a little slow when using wi-fi/internet.  I love the color and the size.  It fits it my purse. It works great with the keyboard/case that I bought along with it.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I am highly disappointed with this product. I ordered it for my son's 8th birthday and I'm upset that the device did not function properly and now he has to go without his gift until I receive a refund.I gave this 1 star because it arrived on time and that's about all it did right. I received it on Tuesday, as scheduled and I charged it for an hour. I had trouble turning the device on but after holding it down for a minute it came on. I connected my Wi-Fi and went to the Google Play store to set up an account. As I was selecting a password the tablet started malfunctioning and random letters started popping up. I didn't have a change to put a password in because the tablet was randomly inputting letters. After a few minutes I shut it down and tried again. Then I was able to make a password and add some apps I know my son would like. I properly shut the tablet down and my son was anxious to play it on his birthday. But when his big day came the tablet WOULD NOT TURN ON! I tried charging it with the charger and on my laptop but even charging it did not help. I held the on/off button for 3 minutes and still nothing. I am so disappointed with this product and will never purchase from this seller again!! When my refund is honored, I'll just shell out the extra bucks and get my son a Nabi tablet or a Kindle Fire. I see cheap is not the right route.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Blaine
Reviews.Content: great product for my 3 yr old grandson he loves it and plays angry birds all the time, it stands up to his roughness. love the product

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend !!
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 Zeepads at the same time and neither of them lasted 2 months!! I will not buy one again!!

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia L. Billingslea
Reviews.Content: Bought this for our 8 year old for her birthday and am very pleased with it.  Very affordable and works great!

Reviews.Title: Defective after 1 use
Reviews.Author: Bshaw
Reviews.Content: The apps that I was able to load were decent. Unfortunately after downloading and turning off the zeepad overnight, it would not turn on the next morning. Also, the screen would not rotate correctly, so it was on the verge of breaking down anyway. The battery drained very quickly also.

Reviews.Title: read the comments under" Can't review something that I haven't received"
Reviews.Author: e.olds
Reviews.Content: Read all the comments under the review titled "Can't review something that I haven't received". Those are the real reviews, these positive stars are not. I cant believe just anyone can write a review here. That is scandalous.The bias party is deleting negative comments. Is you can write a comment with 1 star of what you read for yourself, consumers need to know this is a scam!

Reviews.Title: It's nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a surprise easter gift for my 6 year old son. When it arrived I rushed to get it set up and download a ton of apps so my son could play with it as soon as he opened it. It was very easy to use although the downloading did take a while. Took approximately 10-15 mins to down load each app and I had purchased about 60 apps (along with some children's kindle books). This was fine since the tablet is priced under $100 (what did I expect, really).My sole issue with this tablet is with the charger. It does not charge well or quickly with the USB cord and the wall charger is difficult to work with. The charger plug does not fit completely into the port so I'm constantly trying to stop myself from shoving it in further. Also, if the plug is not positioned in the port exactly right the unit will not charge. I end up twisting and turning, and wiggling the plug around while constantly checking to see if the tablet is indeed charging. It's a little annoying. If it at least had an LED light that would blink or light up when the unit was charging, I would like it a lot better.Overall, it is a nice tablet especially considering the price. If I could do it over, I would probably purchase the same one again. I may look into purchasing a different charger that might fit the unit better. I did have to purchase a separate MicroSD card since only 40 of the 60 apps I purchased fit onto the tablet. But that was only an extra $20 or so. Well worth it since I am sure I will be purchasing more apps for the tablet in the future.

Reviews.Title: good tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 8 year old he loves it never had an issue other than not much storage space in it

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Dawn Yates
Reviews.Content: it is easy to use for me and my son and my son loves having a tablet of his own

Reviews.Title: its great
Reviews.Author: deidre harden
Reviews.Content: This Zeepad is great. It was for my 16 year nephew and he loves it! It does everything that a male teenager wants in a tablet. I didnt think he was going to like it at first but he doesnt leave home without it. He even takes it to school to take notes on it. He accesses and downloads music. And can play all the games he enjoys like angry birds and bad piggies.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my 3 boys and they absolutely love them. They are sturdy and have great apps. My boys play on them for hours on end. I would reccommend them to everyone!

Reviews.Title: JUNK JUNK JUNK!!!
Reviews.Author: avahzd
Reviews.Content: Dont do it, do NOT let the pretty pink color or the low price trick you.  This product is JUNK.  Had it for less than two months and the battery port is loose and will not take a charge.  Tried to get Goodios to make good on this product and they will not.  It is LESS than 2 months old...  Sad thing is is that there are way too many people in the world buying this junk, then it breaks, than the company will not stand behind their products; yet, they still make tons of money off one shot buyers like me.  Once again do NOT get this tablet.  Should be called the ZEROpad.

Reviews.Title: broken
Reviews.Author: missfox
Reviews.Content: I recieved my z pad tablet with a cracked sceeen. I was very upset to find out that it cane from China and it cosr me 23.00 to return it. Highly upset. I waited a long time for it to arrive and just to open it to see the screen was cracked was very upsetting.

Reviews.Title: Wish I would have bought the protection plan...
Reviews.Author: Lisa Cline
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter as a late Christmas present; Here it is not 3 months after it shipped and the screen is shattered and it was sitting on a table without anyone touching it when it, flashed a couple times then a quarter of the screen just went black! I contacted the seller to try to get information on how to have it fixed because it is still under warranty & needs to have Any repairs done at a "Certified Zeepad Dealer" so as not to Void the warranty and got NO response other than "Sorry contact the factory!"So now I am left looking for a New tablet for my 13 year old who is pretty upset not to mention I am not too happy myself seeing as I don't have an extra $100 (with shipping and accessories) to just throw away every 2 months or so on a new tablet. JMHO

Reviews.Title: My granddaughter loves this
Reviews.Author: A. Gift For You "rainbowlaw"
Reviews.Content: She's been playing for several months and it's still going (the first one died after a few days). She loves the color, too.

Reviews.Title: I didn't expect much but got even less.
Reviews.Author: BatMan
Reviews.Content: This review is in no way, shape or form about the seller OR Amazon for that matter.  Thi is specifically about the tablet itself.  In a word... OUCH!I didn't expect much at all for this price.  I have young kids who really wanted a tablet for games etc... I didn't want to get them something that would make me hurt too bad if THEY broke it.As a techie I am aware that my personal standards may be a bit high but I tried to keep my expectations in check for the purposes of  the intended use.  a 5 and 6 year old.I ordered two of these thinking that less than 80.00 a piece for a "tech toy" can't be horrible.  Boy was I wrong.  The quality of the propduct build was about what I expected, plastic, and cheap plastic at that.  The screen, while I didn't expect it to be up to par with something like a Nexus 7, I didn't think it would be practically unviewable in portrait mode, and low visibility from certain angles even in landscape mode.I knew it would be slow, I fully expected (thus appreciated) the lag in functions.  The battery life however was a shocker.  One was dead in about 2.5 hours and the other made it about 3 hours.  Not acceptable no matter how inexpensive it was.The other thing that I noticed is that one of the tablets (though they were identical) did NOT have Zeepad branding, it was a generic of a generic, nothing to cry about since as I said before they were identical in every other way.The packaging and contents are also of a generic caliber.  One came with earphones and a cheap sylus, the other came with a cheap stylus/pen and a screen protector.Another thing that really bothered me was the jailbroken state they are in.  Makes me wonder about the legitimacy of the company. I can't say that the software was "stolen" because Android is largely open source however it did seem to be a bit janky and illegitimate.One tablet was in an Asian language with little hope to change it to english, fortunately I'm used to android and it's icons so I was able to make it through.Overall it just wasn't worth it for me to keep them, Got them on Friday, sent them back today.  Decided to get my babies a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 instead.  They are worth the extra hundred bucks a piece :).If you order this your mileage may vary depending on your expectations of course.  As for me, I would be hard pressed to suggest this to anyone, friend or foe!

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: amv89
Reviews.Content: They sent me a broken tablet.. I couldn't believe it when it arrived. My daughter was so excited for it to arrive too. I'll change my review if I get my money back.So disappointed.

Reviews.Title: completely unsat
Reviews.Author: brian stacy
Reviews.Content: it arrived and the power button was broken on it and the battery wouldn't even charge don't buy this items i wish i would have read the reviews on this item before i bought it

Reviews.Title: RIPOFF
Reviews.Author: richkajun
Reviews.Content: DID NOT WORK RIGHT FROM DAY ONE. THIS IS A TOTAL RIPOFF AND I AM STILL TRYING TO GET REFUNDED. ITS SAD WHEN YOU BUY AN ITEM AT THIS PRICE AS A PRESENT FOR YOUR CHILD, AND IT COMES OUT THE BOX BROKEN.THEN IT TAKES AN ACT OF CONGRESS TO GET YOUR MONEY BACK OR EVEN A WORKING REPLACEMENT.

Reviews.Title: Great for my kids
Reviews.Author: Abbie L. Levanduski
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these for my kids 7 and 8.  We wanted something cheap, with quick shipping, for a trip we are taking in a few weeks.  We are not disappointed at all.  One came in the 2 day shipping and one was a day or two late.  They work perfect for them.  We updated the software to the latest, and they even come with several apps already included.  Highly recommend to anyone that is looking to purchase a tablet for a child.

Reviews.Title: For a child
Reviews.Author: Abbie L. Levanduski
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these for my kids 7 and 8.  We wanted something cheap, with quick shipping, for a trip we are taking in a few weeks.  We are not disappointed at all.  One came in the 2 day shipping and one was a day or two late.  They work perfect for them.  We updated the software to the latest, and they even come with several apps already included.  Highly recommend to anyone that is looking to purchase a tablet for a child.

Reviews.Title: Not much power, but very good for its price
Reviews.Author: Kurt Momberg
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my kids, and they definetely love this device. Well constructed. If you want it for your kids, try to include a leather cover or something similar and they'll get lot of fun. Some games won't run as this is not the best hardware available, but most of them run fine.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad did right by me
Reviews.Author: issac
Reviews.Content: The first tablet I received had defective speakers, a mismatched set of earphones, and no instructions.I was very frustrated at first, but then Zeepad support was able to promptly (and in a hassle-free way) respond to my request to replace the defective unit, and the replacement unit has been working great for the price!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: mr. smartypants
Reviews.Content: this is not an ipad.this is an. 80$ tablet that plays games (gba and <) and it isn't THAT slow. for 80 bucks you get what you pay for and more. internet is acceptable, touchscreen is spot on, get usb keybord and a class 10 micro hdsc 32 card and your gravy.battery last about or < 4 hours playing gba.youtube is smooth, wifi good,the bad... it doesn't brush my teeth...

Reviews.Title: absolute junk!!
Reviews.Author: Christina Franklin
Reviews.Content: The tablet only functioned properly less than half the time.  Also, the screen portion kept popping out of place and would have to be snapped back in.
