The last time I had to do that, the screen cracked, rendering the touchscreen COMPLETELY non-functioning.  I have a very disappointed child!  I would not recommend buying this product to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Cheap tablet
Reviews.Author: Matthew S. Johnson "notprint"
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty decent tablet for the money. I purchased it for my grandparents to get them up to date with some technology. They were going to the library and having to wait in line to use computers all the time to check email and look things up. Now, all they need to do is walk in and start. They like the Android system ease of use.One thing to be warned of however. The power button cannot be pressed too hard or it will break away from the motherboard easily. I had it for 3 days before I sent it to my grandparents and ended up being unable to use the device because the screen wouldn't turn on or off. The button seemed really loose. So, I pulled it apart and needed to adjust the button mechanism on the motherboard. Then I managed to wedge some paper in between it to keep it positioned correctly when I put it back together (if you have this problem, you will see exactly what I mean and possibly how to do it). But, I warn you. If you are not mechanically inclined, don't attempt taking the unit apart! It can be easily fixed by the right person for little to nothing.Overall though, I would approve this unit and recommend it. Especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: The second one coming!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am disabled and have a tendency to drop things.  Well, this little gem took multiple blows to our hardwood floors before finally shattering the screen.  I was so surprised that it went on as well as it did, and this time I have a cover coming with it.I was only disappointed that the camera works only one way for skype calling.

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: its ok pretty slow and sensitivity could be better other than that its ok i would buy it for a kid not an adult

Reviews.Title: HATE IT
Reviews.Author: bnikiliabourne1
Reviews.Content: I HATE THIS PRODUCT.  IT STOPPED WORKING TWO WEEKS AFTER I PURCHASED IT.  I SENT IT BACK AND THAT WAS TWO WEEKS AGO.

Reviews.Title: Faulty ZEEPAD!
Reviews.Author: Eder
Reviews.Content: I bought three ZEEPAD Tablets all three of them I have had nothing but trouble with them getting hot, Screens turning black and shutting off and not turning back on this is only one of them.The second one the volume plus the on and off buttons would not work, and  get hot and turned off and would not turn back on. These two I had to pay almost 100.00 dollars for shipping and for shipping return labels. When I did received the ZEEPADs back they only worked for a coupled days and now the ZEEPAD are not working once again. The third one is not working either it turns on but all you see is black and color strips on it.I am very disappointed! They do not have a reboot on them and I hooked it to my PC and it would not even recognized the tablet. I have three that need to be repaired. The first two I sent in to be repaired cost me almost 100.00. I now have three that are not working and just the two that I have put more money in them then what I paid for them. all three of them need to be repaired.I believe the cost is much more than the ZEEPAD is worth. I would not highly recommend them to anyone. This item is a huge disappointment. I believe if something is wrong with a product that is manufactory defaults a customer should not have to pay to have it ship to and from the place of purchase.I have three of these and don't feel I should pay for shipping to and from for all three ZEEPADs. They where a waste of time and money.In the end I'm stuck with three worthless ZEEPADS.I should of spent the $400.00 to $600.00 dollars on an APPLE IPAD but I thought because the ZEEPADS/Android's would be better because you did not have stay with same apps. Boy was I wrong.WHAT A REP-OFF...!!!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price.  Headphone jack NOT 3.5mm
Reviews.Author: Jericha Hawkins
Reviews.Content: It is a great tablet for the price.  I bought it to use e-textbooks in class and it functions perfectly.  Not the fastest tablet, but I don't use it for anything elaborate.My only real complaint is that the specs say it has a standard 3.5mm headphone jack, but headphones don't fit in the jack.  I just ordered a 2.5mm adapter, so hopefully that helps.

Reviews.Title: zee pad review
Reviews.Author: kalina schauble
Reviews.Content: I really like the zeepad. It came before the final date. The company emailed instantlyWhen I emailed them. The only problem was advertised new and came with scratches onThe screen. It works great. The manual was a copy. But product performs fine.

Reviews.Title: It broke in two days
Reviews.Author: Miss Holland
Reviews.Content: I received this product friday and it broke sunday whole screen just went black but as far as returning it they were very helpful

Reviews.Title: It worked fine for a few days
Reviews.Author: Jamie Donawho
Reviews.Content: It worked fine for a few days, now when I cut it on it won't go past the android screen ..  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: did not work upon receiving
Reviews.Author: 2tyme
Reviews.Content: did not work at all upon receiving so im giving it a 1.shudnt not even be that.but will see what happen after returning it

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Had problems from opening the box. I guess you get what you pay for. I bought a samsung galaxy 7'' and Im very pleased.

Reviews.Title: A great starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Bert
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a starter tablet in order to see if I would like to invest in a higher end tablet later or buy a laptop.This tablet does a great job. The browser is a little slow at times but acceptable. I've had no problems with donwloading apps. Great for displaying photos and videos to family and friends. Be sure to get a mirco sd card with this. Right now I'm leaning toward a larger tablet.

Reviews.Title: Gifts for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Regina F. Love
Reviews.Content: Purchased about 4 of these this Christmas and they work great and everyone loves them.  My six and 7 yr. old grandaughters and my 26 yr old daughter all have them and they are user friendly.  My daughter watches movies on them and it works really good and the clarity is great.  My grandaughters played their mommy IPad so I figured these would be comparable for them..they play games on them and they are very educational with games fit for every grade level.  Love these

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Malgorzata Czyzewska "MaggieScarlett"
Reviews.Content: A good Android tablet for this price.  Runs Android Jelly Bean which is impressive, however it force closes a lot of the apps I try to run  It's good enough for my needs though (email, web browsing, facebook, some light studying).

Reviews.Title: CHAD'S ZEEPAD
Reviews.Author: dragonsmith
Reviews.Content: THIS ZEEPAD FROM AMAZON DOES EVERYTHING THAT I NEED FOR IT TO DO. IT CONNECTS READILY TO THE INTERNET AND DOESN'T DROP CONNECTIONS VERY OFTEN ALTHOUGH IT DOES HAPPEN ON OCCASION. OVERALL I WOULD RATE IT A 5 STAR PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE THAT I PAID FOR IT.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Beverly Bower
Reviews.Content: I am thoroughly pleased with my tablet.  I was very pleased with the speed of delivery and the care in packaging.  The tablet itself is great.  I'm still getting used to some features as I had not used one before, but love the ease of use and the size.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for price- except for battery life
Reviews.Author: Keeley
Reviews.Content: This tablet is used for etextbooks and I can't rave enough about it for the price!! I really enjoy it and was pleasantly surprised at all of its features. The battery life starts draining right away though, even if I'm simply reading an Ebook through the kindle app. I really love how apps are available, including netflix, by the way. Overall, if you can't afford a $500 tablet, this is perfect for the average college student.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: This was for my 11 year old son's Birthday.  It has been a great product.  Uses it for his video games and his reading as well as other stuff.  He absolutely loves it.  For the price, cannot beat it.

Reviews.Title: Would not buy again.
Reviews.Author: Heather Morrison
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these.  Within a week the screen was cracked and the charger had fallen apart for one of them.  The other one is still working but the screen quality is horrible.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: ladybugs8453
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money. ! It was ready to go right out of the box, also compatible with google play which is a plus in an android.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: DENISE H
Reviews.Content: Product arrived before schedule with no issues so far. Purchased for a 10 year old who is very happy with the Zeepad.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet For Kids
Reviews.Author: Sarah Zimmerly
Reviews.Content: We have been very pleased with this 7 inch tablet.  My 7 year old son bought this with his own money.  He loves playing games on it and listening to Iheart Radio.  He chose to buy this over a DS, due to the fact that he can put games on for free and also have movies and books on it.  I would highly recommend this for any child.

Reviews.Title: not good!
Reviews.Author: momoffourpa
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for my 4yr old twin daughters.  One never even turned on, and the other would only turn on for a few seconds (only charged 1%) before needing the charger attached.  Whenever I would attach it the unit would immediately shut down.  So neither unit worked and I had to return both!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet for the price.
Reviews.Author: WandsMagic
Reviews.Content: The Zeepad is a well built tablet at an affordable price. It works well as an e-reader. The WiFi is fast and reliable. It is very comparable to my smartphone, since the operating system is the same. My only complaint is the battery life which for continuous use is only about 2 hours.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: This Android Tablet is very nice quality but the battery life isn't very long at all. That is why I gave it a 3.

Reviews.Title: I like this very much.  My 7 year old daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Warren
Reviews.Content: Not having much experience with Tablets I was surprised by the amount of apps and our ability to navigate on this product.  I am seriously thinking about getting one for myself.  I would recommend this product to others.

Reviews.Title: Buy a case with it
Reviews.Author: Kakungulu "Lone Prospector"
Reviews.Content: Mine is broken already and I didn't get a week to enjoy it.I got it as an extra child-entertainment thing for a flight. I was amazed it supported all the android apps I knew from my phone and performed really well (maybe battery life could be better...). But few days later, while sitting on the plane, I discovered the screen was shattered. If you were spoiled by "gorilla glass" to believe tablets are indestructible, this one will remind you that glass can break and scratch. So don't buy it and leave the case and screen protector for later... Personally, I discovered that my Nook tablet version has a free android hack and now I'm back to using it. But I miss the camera and skype...

Reviews.Title: Zee
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: It was a present for a very special person in my life and in her words it is really AWESOME!

Reviews.Title: Not a bad tablet!
Reviews.Author: JAS1125
Reviews.Content: After some issues with the intial start up, I had to reboot the system twince and since then, no issues so far. I had contacted the vendor Goodios and they were very responsive and even sent a new charger when the provided one proved to be defective. Surprised at how nice the tablet is for the price....no issues with Google Play and YouTube vids work very well.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE Falsely sold "New product" and wont give a refund!
Reviews.Author: K.W
Reviews.Content: NO ONE from the company has even made an attempt to contact me, they obviously have poor customer service and SELL USED ITEMS AS "NEW".It has been about ANOTHER month and no one has contacted me about a refund! I have sent them one more email but if I do not get word from them by the end of the week. I will have to contact Amazon directly. Its not fair to customers to pay for  a new product and get a used one.Just don't bother buying from these people they aren't honest and its hard to get in contact with them.

Reviews.Title: Not what it says it is nor what you think.
Reviews.Author: Felicia
Reviews.Content: I have contacted the seller explaining that the wifi worked for a few weeks then after about 2 weeks it stopped working. I have reset my wifi box at home and the tablet itself, they told me to reset my wifi and the tablet a couple times and ever time I do that it still flips inself back and forth on it's on. I can go into settings and try to turn on wifi knowing I have full service because I can be on my Ipad and try on this and it will not it just flips on and off by itself.  I do not have anything I can do with this because in the process of resetting it it deleted all my Kindle books and games. So it sits in the box> I can not use it that wa 80 dollars thrown away. Just Be Careful

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: kriscurly17
Reviews.Content: Great for my 13 year old son. Does what he wants for such a better price than some of the other tablets.

Reviews.Title: Pleasant surprise
Reviews.Author: Paul Backor
Reviews.Content: Kids love it.  Good starter tablet.  Only problem is it freezes a lot and your have to restart.  But for the money its been a big hit.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet for the Money
Reviews.Author: superjeff
Reviews.Content: It works pretty well and for what I paid, so I can't complain much.Battery power isn't great.. expect about 45 minutes if watching a movie.  No problems when keeping it plugged in.My only criticism is responsiveness.  Pretty much any icon I click on, I have to wait about 3-5 seconds for response.  Since this was purchased as an extra tablet for my 2 toddlers (who like to fight over the ipad to watch netflix at bed time), I've had a time trying to convince them to be patient and wait more (the iPad is obviously instant).  This, in itself, isn't too terrible.. but if the buttons get pushed too many times while "waiting", the unit has to be rebooted to work.  It just gets stuck.That said.. if you're patient, it performs as it should.  Apps take a while to load too... and then respond well.

Reviews.Title: I had higher expectations.
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: When I first rec'd this for my mom for Christmas I was very impressed but upon setting it up for her to use there is a problem powering it up after being off.  Everything else it great except for the powering up, so she always leaves it on.

Reviews.Title: Power Button/Speaker
Reviews.Author: Telina
Reviews.Content: My daughter absolutely love this product but as she push the power button it completely went down and then the sound went out...

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: Bill Coffman
Reviews.Content: The tablet works good. Apps good, internet connection and all.  Only problem is the charger broke after about 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: It is a good tablet for a kid.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It can be slow at times and require a few taps for it to respond but all in all, my nephew enjoys it.  Easy to navigate and use.

Reviews.Title: Product as describe
Reviews.Author: Orlando Nunez "Orlando Nunez"
Reviews.Content: Product as describe. Would buy again. I would gave 5 star if it give a tracking number. On your order status there a tracking number button but everytime you click on it never give any tracking number but other than that great product mostly best for kids.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Tracy B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kids for xmas & they really like it. Within the first day they were fighting over it. I should have bought another one! Good tablet for the price.

Reviews.Title: lyn
Reviews.Author: lyn
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 new zeepads for my kids ages 13 to 8. They love it. Perfect for price. Like I said I bought 4 had to return 1 to get replaced taking a while :(

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Android 4.0, 4GB Capacity, 512 MB.
Reviews.Author: Elkin
Reviews.Content: Mi experiencia con el producto es muy buena, es rapida, para el precio que tiene es muy buena compra la recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: OK for a child
Reviews.Author: A. Chiriboga "Dats it!"
Reviews.Content: I was thrilled when I realized I could gift a nephew with a touch-pad so he could enhance his writing skills. I waited for the package to arrive and it did, well ahead of the other recommended things by amazon.Unfortunately, while attempting to place the writer's, diaries and other apps, I quickly discovered it is not zoned for a worldly market. It is a Pan Asian product that has a time zone setting as far as turkey, and cannot be placed on the Proper timeline. This, I can already see will be a problem when the web based apps attempt to SYNCH. This is the only reason i subtract 2 stars. No thing should ever be a "Surprise!", when you cycle through it's features. No, it should be foretold ahead of time and guaranteed to work (in the western Zone). It is great, other than that, since this is a child's introduction to his talented development via a touch-screen/pad.Hopefully, Amazon stops surprising their customers. They fixed many things and this is just another fix needed.______-------Added------_________After ordering a keyboard, I found that the recommended keyboard/case did not work with it.I also found out that the settings on it are very limited and people, beware, Like the spam mail in you In-box, this has many "go-to" adds on many of the apps there.so If you are going to give to children, make sure they do not have CC information nor access to it.If you could tther it, even better. It could turn out to cost you more than you wanted.

Reviews.Title: zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: matt dailey
Reviews.Content: excellent product for price,my wife seems to love it . some games such as bingo blitz, you can only play 2 cards instead of 4, i guess because of size.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Fred King
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a Christmas present for my Grandson, and he loved it. I also ended up purchasing a key board to go along with it.

Reviews.Title: C
Reviews.Author: Thomas Gingell "Graalchild"
Reviews.Content: The price was right, It does work and my son plays games on it when we are out and about. I wanted to see if I really wanted a small pad, I like it but the screen quality is the weakest link,but I now plan on getting a Quad core 7" pad, probably a Galaxy.

Reviews.Title: Its a starter!
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: I like my zpad.the only thing thats a bummer is the camera is just front facing.Over all its really nice. My mom and nephew has em too and they were excited and happy!!

Reviews.Title: good for kids
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 6 year old son for Christmas.  It works pretty good for his needs.  It is alittle slow, especially when turning on.  Other then that it works great for him to play games and watch you tube on.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Douglas P. Garey
Reviews.Content: Nice pad for the money.  I purchased for my 2 children for Christmas and they have used them almost daily with no issues so far.  Great for watching Netflix and playing the apps they enjoyed on my smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my mom, so I only had a couple of days to check it out before delivering it as a gift. My must-have feature was the ability to do Skype calls and it worked pretty well. It comes with the real Google Play Store, so it would be easy to install your favorite applications. Here some points to ponder:- Only front camera for video calling. The resolution is pretty decent, though the camera application was very basic. Fixed installing another app from the Play Store.- No GPS.- The items on the screen "stretch" when tablet is held vertical. No big deal, but I think that means it would be better to use it only in horizontal orientation.- Also, when transitioning (moving the tablet) between horizontal & vertical, the screen gets a little crazy swapping from vertical to horizontal. It calms down when stabilized.- Highly recommended to install the adhesive screen protector immediately after opening. Got some scratches for normal use.- Tested Skype and Youtube and both worked fine.- I couldn't test the ports or the USB cable. Adhesive screen protector and a stylus are included.EDIT: My brother told me they are having problems leaving Skype enabled all the time. I don't know what happens but it shows as if in disconnected status. Also, it seems the volume of the speakers and the sound quality is very low when in a call, compared to a Galaxy Tab 2. I assume it would be better to use headphones.EDIT2: Now that I have it back and using it everyday, I can say that is slow. I guess this is related to the small memory (512Mb). When browsing, switching between applications, or using an app constantly, it gets slower. Sometimes I get the msg saying that an app has stopped, but I just choose "Wait" and soon it gets back again. I've installed a memory management app so when the memory usage falls below 25% I run a "quick boost" to recover control. I'm using it mostly to watch Netflix in my bed (with headphones of course, as I said the speakers are awful), and it works pretty fine. Also, on the PROS side, is pretty tough; it has fallen a few times, and stands the beats as a champ. I tried to use a microSD card to free storage space, but it couldn't recognize it, don't know if the beats have something to do. The battery life is normal and the wifi reception is good.In summary, again, is pretty decent for the price but as it needs some maintenance, I would say is not recommended for a non-tech person. Being so tough, it would work also to get kids busy, for games, netflix and so.

Reviews.Title: This product is GARBAGE
Reviews.Author: LaTonya Tejada
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my 7 year old daughter. She has not been able to enjoy this at all. It freezes up, shuts off for no apparent reason and it does not hold a charge, she would have to plug it in and charge it in order to try and use it, but that didnt matter considering it would freeze. And to make matters worse she was attempting to use it today and it went blank. The screen is blank.I purchased a Google tablet from Walmart for my son and his works perfect. No ISSUES at all. It doesnt freeze up and he hadnt had his tablet on the charger in 2 days and he was still able to get on with no problems.

Reviews.Title: zeepad is a winner.
Reviews.Author: Keith Inglesby
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my daughter for x'mas, although it didn't arrive until after x'mas, which was kind of a bummer for her. So far this pad has exceeded my expectations. I have not had a problem with my charger yet, but it doesn't seem to be the right one for the zeepad. I have had no connection problems, or freezing up issues so far. I wish it had a simple case for it, but haven't found one that fits yet. Not better than my nook color, but definetly good for children of all ages.

Reviews.Title: too much hassle
Reviews.Author: Ana M Zavala
Reviews.Content: This tablet freezes all the time and I have to turn it off. and start again. and this happens with every use. not worth it. gave it to the kids so they could play. and even when they are playing it freezes.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good!
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet for my 7 yer old son to play games and watch videos on.  It woks great for him.  The screen is very responsive, and it moves pretty quickly.  It works so well, I may get one for my wife too.  I think this is an excellent tablet for the price point.  However, if you do a lot of web surfing or streaming videos, you may consider upgrading to a Nexus 7 or Kindle Fire.  My Nexus 7 has a much clearer screen and is considerably faster.  That being said, the Zeepad is perfect for my son.  If you just want something to mess around with, play games, and occasionally surf the web, this is a great tablet.  If I didn't have a Nexus 7 to compare it too, I would give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Really impressed!
Reviews.Author: Gloria N.
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 5yr old daughter for christmas.  She loves it, but I honestly love it more lol.  I have been bringing this thing with me everywhere.  Connects to wifi easily and plays netflix with no issues. It is very nice for the price paid and I'm thinking of buying another but since I've only had it a couple weeks I'm going to wait a little while to see how it holds up!  Good purchase so far though

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Natalie Warrick "...."
Reviews.Content: This is one of the biggest wastes of money! There is absolutely no contact number for this company.  Battery lufe is about 1.5 - 2 hours, freezes up all the time.  Quality of product is very low grade. I realize the product is only 80 dollars but even for that price I expected it wouldnt feel so cheap! Thanks to Amazon, they waived the return policy since even they couldnt find a contact number for them!!! Research the reviews on other tablets prior to buying. There are sooo many in this price range that have better reviews!

Reviews.Title: WARNING PIECE OF CRAP DON'T BUY
Reviews.Author: Jamie S. Mustard "~J-ME~"
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 of these in Feb and 1 month later only one of them still works.  There is no rest button on them and they won't hold a charge.  I want my money back but I know I will never get it.  When looking it up on line since there is no brand name (and ZeePad is not a brand name) you can't find any info on the piece of S***.  Not only am I pissed about this but you have screwed my kids over.  Thanks for nothing.

Reviews.Title: not working
Reviews.Author: sher
Reviews.Content: the tablet has now stopped charging received it only one and half week now, this is not the service i paid for

Reviews.Title: NICE UNIT FOR THE MONEY
Reviews.Author: DUANE HOLLENBECK
Reviews.Content: CHARGED IT UP, TURNED IT ON, AND SO FAR SO GOOD.GREAT UNIT, LOTS OF FUN. JUST LIKE A GOOD BOOK, I CAN'T PUT IT DOWN.GOOD GRAPHICS, SPEED IS ABOUT WHAT I EXPECTED.BATTERY ONLY LASTS  AN HOUR AND A HALF.NOT SURE WHERE THEY GET 3 HOURS, MAYBE IF YOU TURN IT ON AND DON'T USE IT, HAHABUT, SO WHAT, IT WAS $70.00AN ONE CAN  USE IT WHILE IT CHARGES. SO NO PROBLEM.LOVE IT WILL BUT TWO MORE, SO MY KIDS( AND MY WIFE ) WON'T HAVE TO FIGHT OVER IT.  but it appears they don't last long.  I have purchased 4 of these tablets in the last five monthsnow only one still works. I would have to advise finding another product.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: RoyBlaze
Reviews.Content: First, this took a while to get as it comes from China.  Pay attention to the delivery date.  It still came 10 days earlier than promised.  I only mention this because I didn't pay attention and wondered when it would show up.  Anyway I have an HP iPaq PDA that holds a lot of my day to day info and it is not getting younger. I don't want the data on my smartphone as I don't want it hacked.  I need to replace the PDA before it dies.  Looking at replacement costs was eye opening to say the least, 500 smackers.  Forget about it.  Then I thought, hey get a 7" tablet, bigger screen and lots of apps.  I didn't want anything too expensive as it would be an offline one or two use device.  I saw that the Zeepad had a lot of good reviews and got one.  I've had it for several weeks and have punched a lot of data into it.  It is slow and punching data in is time consuming as sometimes the character doesn't register.  But for my purposes, I don't care as I will be inputting once and reading hundreds of times.  As I said slow, you click and then wait 3 or 4 secs but I am a very patient person and it doesn't bother me that much, though I gave 4 stars because of it.  The charger's plug to the tablet is longer than the socket on mine so it doesn't fit all the way in but it charges.  Do not force the plug into socket or you may break it.  One review says the prongs to the wall socket broke, I checked to see if mine were loose and I recommend you do the same.  Bottom line, this is an $80 tablet not a $200 tablet and you have to expect it will not work the same.  If you are looking for an all around excellent, fast 7" tablet get the Kindle Fire, if you need it for a one or two use device I recommend the ZeePad.

Reviews.Title: Great value!!
Reviews.Author: Ashton Brereton
Reviews.Content: I wanted a fully functional tablet that would allow me, wirelessly, to access the internet, check and write emails, and access files on computers on my home network - from anywhere in or around my home - at a price below $100. The Zeepad 7.0 cost me $81.95 - delivered,  It does everything I wanted - flawlessly. The only reason I don't give it five stars is that it does not have a backward facing camera - so I can't can't scan documents. The front-facing camera works perfectly. So, in sum, I recommend it unreservedly - at the price.UPDATE:I have been using the Zeepad more often now and found that the built-in browser was somewhat slow - taking seconds to access main pages for sites such as CNN, NBC and BBC - and occasionally the browser froze. So, I installed Opera Mini for tablets (free) and found the increase in speed of access to web pages was dramatic. Access is now in less than a second, the formatting of the pages was changed to suit the Zeepad screen, the font size was automatically increased, scrolling is a breeze and all the stories and information are available. This free browser has, for me, significantly improved the capability of this budget tablet.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Joe Urbach
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this item.  It is the perfect starter tablet or would be great for kids. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great so far!!
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: So far it works great and it got here faster than it said it would,it took about a week and a half.Thanks, the wifi does not work well at all.

Reviews.Title: Excellent affordable tablet
Reviews.Author: S. TERRY
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift. No complaints at all. Very good product and fast delivery. Will look for this or similar products in the future.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet!
Reviews.Author: L. Hiles "Dingo"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zeepad 7.0 for my 12yo grandson and haven't been disappointed. For the price, it's a great beginnner tablet. I like the fact that it uses google apps, he has many choices. The only downside is that it was difficult to set up because the choices were in Japanese?  Somehow, my daughter was able to set it up in English. We have had no problems since.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Chuggs
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use as a toy, basically. I didn't need it to do much, so in that aspect it's pretty good. If you need a high-end tablet, this is not it. It freezes on me sometimes and the touch screen is quirky. The camera is surprisingly sharp and the vertical width is such that I can hold it with both hands and type using my thumbs like on my HTC Evo. I give it 4 stars b/c it's a fun toy, but it's just that...a toy.

Reviews.Title: Great For Everyone
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline M. Allen
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet. I have nothing bad to say about it. I like it because it comes in really clear. I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: What a surprise!
Reviews.Author: Not So Shoe Gal
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 70-something mother-in-law, she has a very basic knowledge of electronics in general, so i was just hoping for something simple and functional.  This met all my expectations and more!  I played with it a bit to set it up for her and dound it very easy to navigate, good picture, responsive screen.  Don't put it head to head with an ipad or kindle, it'll just hurt Zeepad's feelings! ;)  Its a good, simple little tablet to use for watching knitting videos on youtube!

Reviews.Title: I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Deidre Lynn Salcido
Reviews.Content: My nephew will love this...he hasn't seen it yet.  I heard the Android technology was amazing so I purchased this over a Kindle.  I like the slim, lightweight device.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Service!!!
Reviews.Author: FeFeG
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item through PCTVSHOP and the service they provided was awesome!!! I have absolutely no complaints what so ever! Completely satisfied and most definitely a happy customer.

Reviews.Title: My kids love !!!
Reviews.Author: brucar11
Reviews.Content: Got it for my kids on christmas ! Very good for children they can play and watch movies . Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: eh. i suppose you get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Emberlynn
Reviews.Content: i was super excited when this came in the mail, my main use for it is that i can now type outside of my house without having t o bring my humongus 16 inch laptop around with me, and i can continue my short stories while im at work, and use my friends wifi for email and facebook. i suppose it does what its supposed to do. the camera is messed up, i guess it was manufactured wrong and the acual  camera lens is below the faceplate of the tablet, so iit constantly looks like you have your finger in front of the camera, which is a huge bummer. the touch screen is glitchy, so if i want to play draw something my drawings are always squigly, and thats a shame, it also takes a few tries to acually open something when you touch it. in one area the screen is kinda soft like a laptop, if you push on it with even the slightest bit of pressure it gets a black finger print on it, its hard to explain, but its like when you push on a laptop screen and it gets a shaded area for a few seconds. all in all this little thing has potential, but i think mine was an assembly line reject.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: I haven't found anything that is disappointing about this tablet.  The kids love it and I no longer have them fighting over my KindleFire.  Plays all the apps and Kindle app for reading books without any problems so far.  I have even left the plastic film over the screen and they don't use the stylus (just fingers) and it is very responsive.  I'd highly recommend as a purchase for kids (or even adults) who don't want to pay a lot for one to knock around with.  I ordered 3 of them and they are all great!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the $ and good test for youngsters before investing in IPad or other high $ tablet
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Came with crappy stylus, but convertor cables to allow USB devices to be added to the system and to be connected to other systems via USB, 512 memory sucks and unable to see how to add except for 32GB Micro SD card, but that is enough for my kids so that works. Plays music, video and video games well either streaming from NetFlix or of SD or flash drive. Kids can use it easy, I say overall def worthwhile.

Reviews.Title: Still can't believe this was only $70!!
Reviews.Author: annie79
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my 7 year old son. We charged it an played with it a little on Christmas Eve, and we were amazed how well it performed. I had thoroughly read the reviews, so I had high expectations, however, this blew them out of the water. Since it is only $70, and some people will have a hard time seeing past that to what is actually an awesome product, I will tell you the feature that I felt was lacking. To be fair, I have only used the camera one time, but the picture wasn't as great as on my phone (which takes incredible pics) or my husband's iPad, however, for a 7 year old, the pic was great. I am seriously impressed with this device, especially for a young person who isn't going to be doing too much other than playing games, and I strongly encourage this purchase, even if the price makes you leery. I would have paid more for this and still been just as happy!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: john k
Reviews.Content: First of all the tablet was not brand new because there was a picture of the previous owner on it. Second the tablet was nothing like we expected.

Reviews.Title: Not made good!!
Reviews.Author: vicki miller
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 15 year old daughter for Christmas, and she was taking very good care of it, but within one day of use her buttons for the power and the volume broke and fell out of the tablet. We could not turn it on anymore or use it at all. I have sent it back for them to fix or return my money. Made SO CHEAP!!

Reviews.Title: It took forever to get here
Reviews.Author: Aud
Reviews.Content: I placed the order on December 9th, I received it on December 21st. Coming from California going to Washington State, With that said, the product itself is exactly as described. It is a bit slow, especially if you put a live wallpaper on. The picture itself doesn't have the greatest resolution, but for the price it's good. I did notice that the picture fits better when the tablet is upside down. The only downfall to that is if you're using the camera. Overall, I would say it's great for a kid or someone who doesn't need much on a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great little android pad
Reviews.Author: G-Man
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised when I fired this thing up.  It comes preloaded with fruit ninja and angry birds.  So after wasting far too much time on that, then I started loading apps from the Play Store... No problems what so ever.  I liked it so much I bought a second one for my wife.

Reviews.Title: Waist of money
Reviews.Author: V. Davis
Reviews.Content: My daughter got this for a Christmas present.  It worked ok for a month (touch screen not a responsive a the kindle fire) but the battery life starting decreasing to about 45 min, the shell kept coming undone on one side, and then the on/off switch broke.  The unit only comes with a generic users manual.  No company info, no phone numbers to call, etc.  Less than a month after Christmas all that is left is a very upset little girl.

Reviews.Title: This product sucks!!
Reviews.Author: Pattie Cummings
Reviews.Content: I have contacted seller for hopes of replacing item that I have purchased but no reply.  I am currently looking for a computer repair store to fix the problem I am having since it appears that I am stuck with the broken tablet. Will not be spending my hard earned money with this guy again!!

Reviews.Title: Didnt get it
Reviews.Author: Mad Dude
Reviews.Content: I didn't get it. Was suppose to be a present for my younger sister for Christmas didn't get here on time and still waiting.

Reviews.Title: I know a little girl who is going to be disappointed next week
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with the product when I received it a few days ago, thought it would be perfect for our first foray into tablets for my younger daughter.  I charged it, found a wi-fi connection to download a few age-appropriate apps, and then tested it today after using it only a handfull of times only to find that the on/off button was flush with the top of the tablet, and unresponsive.  it had been a somewhat "loose" button to begin with but after a little prodding, the button actually recessed into the tablet and remained unresponsive.  The tablet turns on when the charger is plugged in and is fully functional, but that's not going to help us much.  I'm not sure what it will take to return it, but will try a replacement and I will update the review if the next one is more functional.

Reviews.Title: Looks can be deceiving..,
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: They say don't judge a book by its cover. This Zeepad presentation looked great but my first hour just navigating thru it it started to freeze up on me and lost its charge.It took forever to charge back up and one week later it completely died and will not cut back on smh. U get what you pay for. Cheap can become expensive. This was indeed a waste

Reviews.Title: Slowest tablet possible, virtually useless.
Reviews.Author: E. Gormly
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet ONLY to play music, the plan was to post it on the wall in our office where we do a lot of work as our phone just was not cutting it.  The packaging screams cheap but that's to be expected with an 80.00 tablet.  what was not expected was the inability to play music, it does play... 60 seconds after you click a button in Google Music and once it's started you cannot stop it for another 60 seconds, the point is this is ridiculously slow, even after removing everything installed on it. Displaying album art is non existent as well as even the song names.  if you click out to look at another album, you better go brew a coffee and take a shower, it might be ready when you get back.  This was not a symptom of Google's app either as all the other music players I tried had the same issues.On top of that turning it on and off is a problem, after it goes into sleep you have to hold the button for 30-60 seconds for it to reboot, it will not turn back on after it shuts down the screen like all other tablets do.  I read some of the reviews and unless I got a bum tablet I cannot see how anyone can get this to work properly, there is no way anyone can function by clicking a button and waiting 30 seconds for something to happen.Try it, think "click" in your head and then count to 30. that's how long it takes to respond when an app is open.I cannot say how it plays games but if a simple MP3 is any indication this is not worth 8 dollars let alone 80.I would not give this item to my worst enemy... or wait, maybe I would...We should have sent Osama a few of these in 2001, we'd have found him in the same cave still trying to power it on.Update 01/20/2013: after looking at this thing siting in the box waiting for the return I decided to try one thing, I forgot that I did not erase my google credentials so I opened it and did a "reset".Oddly enough, now the thing is snappy enough to play the music and show albums and turn on and off properly, not sure what did it and it doesn't change my rating but it now works for my purpose  So if you get a sluggish unit, try resetting it in the settings of the device.

Reviews.Title: Horrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Corinne
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for Christmas. 2 weeks later the screen stopped responding. I emailed the company it is offered through and I am still waiting to hear back from them 3 weeks later. I should have spent the extra money for higher quality

Reviews.Title: Terrible do not buy
Reviews.Author: Networker59
Reviews.Content: This device was not only awful,  but we had the most difficult time returning it. It took us 4 times emailing  them regarding all the issues the device was having for them to understand I work with computers and networking for a living and the issues could not be resolved. They then waited until we had not only returned the device, but they had received it at their warehouse to again deny our claim. It took another 2 emails and 5 days before the matter was resolved. I couldn't be paid enough to try any product through Zeepad again.

Reviews.Title: Wallet computer
Reviews.Author: Rajan
Reviews.Content: It works great. I bought this for myself using to view movie from you-tube and contact others through skype etc.

Reviews.Title: no skype
Reviews.Author: Randy Carr
Reviews.Content: Tablet works great but will not sign in to skype,same result after a factory reset.not sure whose at fault but my daughters not happy about it.We have other tablets on the same skype account and have no problems

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Jacktut
Reviews.Content: not at all what it states it is, its slow, force closes, and very cheaply made. worst investment EVER!you will regret this machine just as much as I do

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Guyfromtexas
Reviews.Content: I got two of these for my teenage boys 14 & 19 for a Christmas gift. Being as small and the awesome low price I was sort of nervous at first. Here we are over a month later and they continue to be their favorite gift. These tablets work great, the play store for aps is on there and picks up wifi with no problem. There hasn't been any crashes, malfuctions or any problems that I'm aware of. The only thing is I'm having trouble finding a cover for it but other than that I highly recommend this tablet and thinking of buying another for myself.

Reviews.Title: Won't be buying this ever again
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 7 year old.  I wanted to get him a tablet but didn't want to pay a whole lot for it.  I liked the system but the product itself was poorly made.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids not adults
Reviews.Author: athena
Reviews.Content: Brought it for my children because it didnt have alot of features just wanted educational games. the screen looks like plastic hard to see but good for your children to play games on, not good for netflix.but great for little children.

Reviews.Title: Just as expected
Reviews.Author: Cpj8456
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my 8 year old after reading the other reviews that suggested it would be good for kids.  It is perfect size for him and does everything he wants it to do at a price that I liked.

Reviews.Title: Defective, returned item but NO refund
Reviews.Author: Jbee05
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my daughters for Christmas. It did come in on time, but we decided to send it back because it was defective. Surges the web ok, but did not allow any apps to open.  Followed all the sellers directions for the return & I received confirmation from the USPS that they received the package.... Still NO refund & they have left the amazon marketplace.  Worthless product & scamming seller.  I should have bought a better product from a reliable seller, but I have never had something like this happen ordering through amazon before. I am very disappointed.  I hope and expect a refund or I will not be shopping at amazon again :(

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!
Reviews.Author: pissed off
Reviews.Content: NEVER GOT MY ORDER THESE PEOPLE WILL  TAKE YOUR MONEY AN WILL NEVER RESPOND TO YOU AGAIN!!!!!!! DON'T FALL FOR IT!!!! THESE PEOPLE STOLE MY CHILDS CHRISTMAS GIFT!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: JUNK JUNK JUNK! Avoid this item!
Reviews.Author: kmiles
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 9 yr old daughter for Christmas and were very disappointed.  The second you add maybe two apps to the thing, it completely freezes, crashes or simply turns off.  DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM.  If you are looking for a tablet for a kid, you're better off spending a bit more for something that actually functions, or even a Nintendo DS (they can play games and watch netflix/youtube on that too!).  I should have figured that it would be junk based on the price, but the fact that they're still trying to charge even this much is a joke.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: iginah
Reviews.Content: My two girls (9 and 7 yrs old) love their tablet. They do their basics. Go online to play games and thats pretty much it. I wouldn't recommend it for an adult. It has sort of a lag and the screen resolution isnt the best. But overall we like it!

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy!
Reviews.Author: Dell L Rice
Reviews.Content: This thing only lasted a week. We had to go to a local store and have it replaced with another one which means we spent more money. The battery did not hold a charge.

Reviews.Title: Amazing... until it stopped working!
Reviews.Author: Owen Tucker-Smith
Reviews.Content: I purchased Zeepad because I didn't want to spend too much money on my first tablet. It came in a box, and when I turned it on, It looked great. It had all these applications, and in a few seconds I had temple run. I was bringing it up the stairs. At the top when Iset it down from a few inches of the ground, instead of just landing clean like most tablets, the screen broke offpretty soon I put it back together. Right when I did, the battery ran out. Really short battery! When I recharged it, I seeked it again and pressed the power button, it went to a lock screen, but I couldn't unlock t! It didn't ask me for a password, or anything like that. It just stayed on that lock screen. Thats when the power went out for good. So it was a wonderful tablet. But it breaks and stops working so quickly after you buy. Great 1 week tablet, but terrible structure!

Reviews.Title: Same as my other one. Its a replacement fomy previous warranted item
Reviews.Author: Tia Char
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd replacement Zeepad now. Since I sent for this one I have had 2 more fritz out on me within a couple days of each other so I am not too impressed with them anymore.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: Was nice for my grandchild but technology moves at such great speeds it did not get much use. I will save it for my visitors that get bored with their children.

Reviews.Title: Pathetic
Reviews.Author: Kazim
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this s***ty product. Waste of money. It doesn't even turn on. When it does it keeps hanging. I wish I could 0 star.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Ariana
Reviews.Content: Every program chashes... total disappointmemt ... didmt work from the sstart nothing wromg on my end just never worked properly

Reviews.Title: Horrible quality!
Reviews.Author: TheKewlOne17
Reviews.Content: My grandma has this tablet. The battery life is HORRIBLE!!! I unplugged it from the charger and battery was fully charged. After 30 seconds, the battery ran down to 92% already! The sound is terrible but the headphone jack sounds good. This is so slow it took 4 minutes to boot up the android OS! And the touchscreen doesn't respond half the time due to how slow this tablet is. And the Wi-Fi doesn't even work! The camera is terrible. It looks like a camera from the 1950 except in color. Zeepad sucks! Not again!

Reviews.Title: worked fine but for a short time
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: This tablet  was a christmas present for  my niece.Worked well for about six months but now the screen has frozen and no longer works at all.

Reviews.Title: A waste of money!!!!
Reviews.Author: Modesta M. Barraza
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a first tablet for my son.  It only was good for a week and then he started having lots of trouble with it.  He began to have trouble playing games and downloading new apps on it.  Do not recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: nice table
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: i bougth it for my son and he love it by his game, navigating and music, thank you for all

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Sarah Gunn
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this tablet for our 7 year old, thinking it would be a good first tablet.  It quit working after a month.  It won't charge anymore, even with switching chargers.  Spend the money on a better tablet.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and slow but what'd i expect
Reviews.Author: david martinez
Reviews.Content: I just needed something that could play angry birds and read pdf's while in bed. While it is a good deal considering price and all i think i could have done better. With a galaxy tab being 10 and a nokia 3310 being 1 this scores about a 4, it's just enough to run Netflix and and pdf file viewers and some easy apps, Don't expect it to run without a hitch, lags hard with web browsing and sometimes just switch screens, the touch screen can be a little finicky with it's recognition of inputs so understand what your paying for. It's not top notch but if you just want something to mess around with this would do the trick,

Reviews.Title: Product good, nice and cheap. Producto Bueno, bonito y barato.
Reviews.Author: Aura Consuegra
Reviews.Content: Producto bastante sencillo y util para solo lectura. La conexion a la red por wifi es buena pero algo corta de alcance. Se reproducen excelentes videos de youtube a alta calidad. Yo lo uso solo para leer libros y realmente es muy practico. Es economica y muy sencilla. Se pueden cargar peliculas y reproducirse sin ningun problema. La bateria es muy buen y me rinde mucho. Le coloco 4 estrellas ya que deben mejorar el procesador de datos. Es algo lenta cuando tiene 3 programas abiertos.Quite simple and useful for read-only product. The connection to the wireless network is good but somewhat short range. Excellent youtube videos are played at high quality. I use it only for reading books and really is very practical. It is economical and simple. Movies can be loaded and played with no problem. The battery is very good and pays me a lot. We placed 4-star as they must improve the data processor. It's slow when it has 3 open programs.

Reviews.Title: Excellente Buy!
Reviews.Author: william olivares
Reviews.Content: excellent product complies with the description by the seller, but inexpensive equipment complies with offered. recommended this tablet. good performance.

Reviews.Title: awful
Reviews.Author: laurynnsmom
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughters 5th birthday, the day she got it she dropped it on carpet maybe 2 feet and it literally blew apart into 15 pieces. We very carefully put it all back together and it worked fine, happened again, fixed it, etc. but that didnt even bother us, the main reason we could not live with it was the speed. It took 4 hours to download wheres my water. 4 HOURS!! And it was NOT our wireless's fault. we returned it and got her a nook hd used on ebay with google play on it for the same price.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad , Bad choice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "oceandreams123"
Reviews.Content: This is by far the biggest rip off. I barely used it, and it stopped working, I did everything the way the directions, said.Not only did my Zeepad stop working,my 2 grand children who got them stopped as well they got them for Christmas new, and they stopped working a couple weeks later,The manufacturer should be sued!

Reviews.Title: not as advertised
Reviews.Author: David Hofland
Reviews.Content: Screen was scratched, must have been a refurb rather than new as advertised. Not happy but not worth trouble sending back

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for anyone
Reviews.Author: eb71
Reviews.Content: I bought my first one last year for my grandchildren to use as a learning tool.  I chose this tablet originally for the price as I felt it wouldn't hurt so much if it didn't survive the little ones.  It was durable and provided lots of access to learning applications.  The kids and I both have had lots of use with out issue.  I now have a total of three tablets and still believe they were worth every penny.  The camera fuction was an added bonus too.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time!!
Reviews.Author: Peter F Neurohr "PandJ"
Reviews.Content: Sent it back, it took forever to charge and that is after struggling for it to maintain charging status, was so slow...took forever to download or play anything on it. Basically, not worth anything except frustration.

Reviews.Title: Cheap piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Quidditchmom
Reviews.Content: My son received it for Christmas and it lasted exactly three months. Now when we turn it on we get the white screen of death. Even when it was brand new out of the box, it ran very slowly and simple tasks took way too long the convenience of a table inherently promises. I wish he wouldn't have spent his birthday money buying a very nice keyboard case to go along with this. That being said, if anyone is in the market for a keyboard case, I've got one that has been in use for not even two weeks. Please, spend the extra bucks and get a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: melissa piatt
Reviews.Content: The product I received is NOT a name brand ZEEPAD! False advertising! My neighbor ordered a zeepad also and hers says zeepad on the back of it and mine don't! From the day I got it there has been a glitch in it and when you touch the sides of the plastic it will go to whatever it feels like going to! And one morning I had left it on all night and woke up to the stupid thing BUZZING!!!! I am NEVER going to order anything like this from any website EVER again! LIARS LIARS LIARS!!!!! The only reason I haven't tried to return it is because I don't know how. This is my first time ordering electronics and my LAST!

Reviews.Title: Needs better unpaking instructions.
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Haus
Reviews.Content: Opening the box one finds a printed insert on charging the battery and a second insert explaining that this is a brand new tablet and only looks refurbished. The battery insert says 1, never charge for more than 3 hours or the unit will explode. never operate the unit while plunged in , it will explode. Unit is shipped with an uncharged battery, charge batter for 24 hours before first use. (But you said never charge for more that 3 hours?) My Zeepad came with a fully charged battery. (a sign of it being a refurbished unit.)The refurbished Note says the unit is shipped with a screen protector preinstalled and though the screen may look scratched up, it isn't. It's just the screen protector. My unit did not come with the screen protector installed and before I realized that I managed to scratch the screen up a bit. My Zeepad fell off the table yesterday while I was charging it and it  landed on the carpet , about a 3 and a half foot fall and a soft landing. and yet the power supply connector snapped off and I now need to replace the power supply, Note: the power supply connecter is very fragile! Battery life seems to be about 2 hours and is very disappointing as You shouldn't run the zeepad while plugged in (Or it will explode!) Some areas of the touch screen are very unresponsive.  On the whole I am not thrilled with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Save your money and DON'T BUY THIS!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Pogue
Reviews.Content: This was the worst product, we started having problems with in a week. The operating system would just shut down or freeze in the middle of her using it. Then we had to reset it several times. Eventually, the tab let's shattered without falling, it just started a small line in the corner and went to the middle of the screen and shattered. Save your money and just get a Samsung, Kindle, I-Pad, etc.

Reviews.Title: Dud
Reviews.Author: Joseph A Myler
Reviews.Content: Very slow, does not react well to touch, freezes up constantly, etc. Bought it for my 3-1/2 year old and she doesn't play with it but will play with my iPad and iphone constantly, not exactly a fair comparison but I thought it would be better.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: CH
Reviews.Content: Won't hold a charge even when it hasn't been used, so we have to keep it plugged in all the time. Now the wi-fi is failing, so it's sitting right next to a wi-fi hotspot but says there's no internet available. We can try toggling the wi-fi on and off, but that only works part of the time. The other half of the time it gets stuck on the "Turning wi-fi on" screen and we end up restarting it... and then still have no wifi. Apps somehow seem to freeze up and crash constantly. I'm a big fan of Android but if this was my first introduction I'd think it was the pits.

Reviews.Title: It just doesn't work
Reviews.Author: C. Lohrmann "Lane"
Reviews.Content: My 9-year old daughter has been able to play a few games on the Zeepad, but it's terribly hard to load anything.  The reaction time on the touch screen is so bad, it makes it difficult to do anything and most of the time it just crashes.  This was a waste of money.  I wish I would have spent more on something that worked.  I would never buy a cheap tablet again.

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: Kissy Miller
Reviews.Content: We constantly Have issues with the pad charging.  It Won't charge one day and then the next day charges fine.

Reviews.Title: WARRANTY ISSUES - NO CONTACT INFO. BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Cristina Palmerin
Reviews.Content: Bought three (3) and one of the three has given us problems from day one. Was able to return it for a new one but I am skeptical now that I received a new one being that a couple weeks the screen is going crazy. The product comes with a 1 year manufacturer warranty but good luck trying to register and/or let alone contact the vendor for warranty issues. Doesn't matter where you purchase this item - BUYER BEWARE if you get lucky with one that last you for a at least a year you got a good deal, not the best but good. The other two tablets are working just fine for now but I'm not getting my hopes up and will probably have to invest in better quality tablets. So if you decide to buy one keep your fingers cross that you get a good one. Only have been able to obtain an email address... "The best that I can do for you is to refer you to our supplier and hope that your item qualifies for a warranty. You can also contact the manufacturer to assist you with any product related questions at helpdeskworryfreegadgets@gmail.com" Sent an email and still waiting for a response.

Reviews.Title: bought for 4 year old,
Reviews.Author: James M.
Reviews.Content: she plays with it but she's quick t o grab mom's ipad. it's a decent starter pad for a young child but, an adult will have to assist in the set ups.

Reviews.Title: broken item
Reviews.Author: Marilyn hawkins
Reviews.Content: It came broken... i need a refund or another item...im trying to find out how to return it. My son can not even enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: bought 3
Reviews.Author: jacky
Reviews.Content: bought 3  one wont stay charged,one isnt coming on after a week and one works perfectly but we love the one

Reviews.Title: My kids love it
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: Perfect starter tablet! Has everything my kids need. No worries about them having trouble using the tablet. Nice for long car rides.

Reviews.Title: OK for the price
Reviews.Author: SCK
Reviews.Content: Have had it for 6 months and it still works fine, accept for the touch screen calibration is off so I use a mouse most of the time, was thinking of looking at the calibration config file to see if it was tampered with.Plays most simple games, adding the setcpu app and lowering the cpu speed below 400MH gives me about 4 hours on a plane with Wi-Fi off, that along with a usb charger pack it will get me through most flight playing games or watching movies.Downloaded 3gpp files videos youtube and put on 16G SD card and they play wellUsed as web/email machine on vacations and it served the purpose using mouseincreasing the cpu to 800MH it chromecast youtube videos well if the network connection is good

Reviews.Title: great, love it.  A+++++++++++++++
Reviews.Author: dee bowers
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted, enjoying it very much.  A++++++++++++++++++  My GrandDaughter really enjoys the games on it and plays with it more than I do.

Reviews.Title: not good.
Reviews.Author: minimedia bad
Reviews.Content: Breaks easy. Too slow. Charger breaks really easy. I purchased this table for my 6 years old daughter,  but it was frustrating how easy the charger breaks, and everything was too slow. Expend a little bit more and avoid this.

Reviews.Title: So disappointed
Reviews.Author: Courtney Come
Reviews.Content: My daughter has had this tablet about 1month and its charger port has a short in it. No matter what charger we use, you have to fiddle with it for a few minutes just to get it to charge and then the slightest movement and it stops charging :(

Reviews.Title: it was bad from the start
Reviews.Author: Emoneydh
Reviews.Content: It was slow build quality was awful. My little sister got a case for it and she dropped it and it broke with a case!!! DONT BUY THIS ANYONE BE AWARE!!!!!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: This tablet has issues with connecting to wifi.  I did research about this specific problem, unfortunately after I received it, and it there is a long list of complaints about this problem.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this item
Reviews.Author: Heather W
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this tablet, it was a good price, for my 4 year old.  We had this for her Christmas present. Today it stopped working completely. I couldn't turn it on, and when I finally did lines, and nothing more. It just won't work. A real waste of money for 65.00. If you want something that will last, spend a little more and make sure it's not a Zeepad. The only warranty is pretty limited to so many days bought. However I would still not buy this again. Its rediculous that it only lasted 3 months. IT's in perfect conditon screen protector, and taken excellant care. I'm really dissapointed with this product.

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Helen Gimson "collector of many"
Reviews.Content: this could be better its slow loading and battery lasts very short time so if you can get a better one

Reviews.Title: was fine until the item on/off switch broke
Reviews.Author: R. J. FOYT
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a decent tablet for our 4 year old. Until the on/off switch broke completely off rendering the tablet nonoperational.  They were quick to refund the cost of tablet however.

Reviews.Title: Save your time and money
Reviews.Author: Emily P. "Novel Seduction"
Reviews.Content: My daughter got one for a Christmas gift. The very first night, the adapter that came with it, broke. Then charging with a usb cord only worked sometimes. If we DID get it to fully charge, it died in about 15 minutes. Downloads were SLOW. To the point that it wasn't worth downloading anything.I would save your money and get something like a Kindle Fire instead. You can get a refurbished Gen 1 for not much more.

Reviews.Title: Great digital photo frame, not very good tablet
Reviews.Author: R. Power
Reviews.Content: First, three cheers for using standard Android and not re-skinning it.  That it runs the standard Google Play Store and standard apps is wonderful.  But aside from the software, the hardware is about as minimal as possible to still run Android 4.2.  I got one of these for my parents and one for us, with the sole intent of making them both digital photo frames.  It's great for that purpose, but I wouldn't suggest it as a regular tablet.  We also have a Kindle Fire HDX that's about the same size but twice the price, and the Kindle is still the better bang for the buck tablet-wise.  This Zeepad tablet has a terrible viewing angle if you try to use it in portrait mode.  But if you want a pretty cool and inexpensive digital photo frame, this is a good option.  I run the Dayframe app and replaced the standard charger with http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001EJHH20/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_15 and http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00A9PO5AM/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_27 and have it sitting horizontally (landscape) in an AmazonBasics stand http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B006ZT4VA0/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_29 at about eye level when sitting.  It beats any other digital photo frame I've found for less than four or five times the price.

Reviews.Title: cheap and not well made
Reviews.Author: Melissa @ just one opinion "mel"
Reviews.Content: I wrote this post months ago for my blog after buying the zeepad I'm not the type of person to just blast a company but I am so sad, frustrated and had my limit with the Android Zeepad 7.0 Tablet PC. My kids have had these tablets a week one of the chargers is broken (yes already) The tablet freezes if it works at all, the volume is bad I can't even explain to you... Nothing works! So I go to the manual which is a joke to call it that... as only one of the Zee-pads came with the "manual" which is written in broken English to the point it's hard to even comprehend what there trying to say. The tablet is a cheaply made Chinese product missing its correct accessories.. And so I contact the "seller" to finally get a reply after chasing butt for days. Oh they will take it back but I have to pay for shipping, I can't get a refund but an exchange after fees and only if they deem no damage was inflicted on the tablet...At this point I can't even cope with this, the tablets are horrible! My kids are in tears and I have no answers for them. I refuse to waste any more money on these things after the $153 to buy them.. I try and refund with Amazon but see here is the catch they were opened ( yes well hello how was I meant to know they where broken) and Amazon only fulfilled shipment so of course I'm stuck with the seller who has no number for me to call. USA wholesale you suck what kind of company doesn't even have a contact number? I can't tell you how bad I feel for my children.. Money does not grow on trees it's not like I can just replace these. I advice anybody considering a tablet for your kids to stay clear of these... iPad, kindle, Nook etc is the way to go... You get what you pay for when it comes to technology :(Since ive posted this review I have had 19 people comment the same thing  happened to them and thousands of page views

Reviews.Title: Broken after 7 months
Reviews.Author: Pat Pim
Reviews.Content: Have been trying to get an RMA # for this and am getting the royal run-around.After this treatment, I would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: DONT GET IT
Reviews.Author: Kayla Sigmon
Reviews.Content: I had it a year I got it for my 17th birthday present from my mom I loved it at first but now its broken it lasted almost till my 18th birthday, it sucks now I don't have a tablet anymore..

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Rory Cockerline
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be a good tablet to buy for my daughter. I was wrong the tablet fell apart the first time she dropped it. The seller says it is great for kids, but I will agree to disagree on that statement. Besides the tablet not being durable what so ever it is very slow and I am constantly having to go into settings and fix things for her. About a month ago I gave her my old nook and she has not had a single problem that she has had with the Zeepad. My advice spend a few extra bucks on a better tablet or go buy one of the thousands of quality used ones you can find online.

Reviews.Title: Painfully Slow
Reviews.Author: Lee Toland
Reviews.Content: This tablet from day one has been painfully slow in the amount of time it takes to do anything: turn on, turn off, slide screens, unlock, loading the apps, games, books, movies or anything else you've put on the device and would like to watch/read/play, downloading items to the device, connecting to wifi, etc, etc, etc. I got this for my four year old as I was tired of filling up my phone with her games so she's happy despite it's slowness but I would never recommend this for anyone but a child and only for children that have a bit of patience.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE
Reviews.Author: NaTasha Johnson
Reviews.Content: If I can give -5 stars I would. This device didn't last a week before having issues. The vendor refused to refund my money and the so called service plan refused to service the device. It is now in the garbage where it belongs. TERRIBLE!!!!!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: lalywright
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, this purchase falls under "you get what you pay for".  The item lasted just a few weeks before the power button broke and now the device does not turn on. It was cute while it lasted though.

Reviews.Title: The charger broke down, the camera does not have a flash. Work to slow, and its difficult to get it on.
Reviews.Author: INANGELIS GUERRA
Reviews.Content: The charger broke down, the camera does not have a flash. Work to slow, and its difficult to get it on.

Reviews.Title: Did not work out of the box.
Reviews.Author: Debbie Y
Reviews.Content: Did not work right out of the box. Triple checked it was fully charged but would not go past home screen to do anything.  Battery or software issue..

Reviews.Title: Quit after 5 Months
Reviews.Author: A. Garrett
Reviews.Content: This tablet started randomly sensing touches on the screen after a couple of months. Eventually, when I turned it on the unit would start going nuts as if I were pressing all over the touch screen. Getting my refund via Square Trade now. Poor choice on my part and poor quality product. I won't make that mistake again.

Reviews.Title: Hardware needs improving.
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: The charging port is too easily broken, especially if it is to be handled by kids. The buttons could be more sturdy as well. Apart from that it is a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: Horrible horrible Product
Reviews.Author: LaQueena
Reviews.Content: The zeepad stopped charging. Have had it a little over a month. EXTREMELY POOR PRODUCT. EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED. Poorly made and very cheap.  I URGE YOU NOT TO BUY ONE!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Maureen Henson
Reviews.Content: Some of the loaded apps don't work, even after uninstall and reinstall.  The battery life is very short.  It hangs up easily during some functions.  Takes forever to boot up.  Spend a little more money and get a better product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Derrick L.
Reviews.Content: We got this for our 6 year old daughter for Xmas. This little tablet is great for kids, She plays with it everyday! I would definitely recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Kathy M.
Reviews.Content: This worked well for my 7 year old granddaughter. She has enjoyed playing games on it. I would recommend it

Reviews.Title: Review for Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: ERIC O.
Reviews.Content: The device performs more functions than anticipated. However, the speed leaves much to be desired. The battery also runs down too quickly.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Kiril Dimoski
Reviews.Content: i got product on time and it is as described ... i still have it and i am very pleased how it works ...if u have need of tablet this is the one

Reviews.Title: Already Broken : (
Reviews.Author: Lizzie
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for Christmas, and it is already completely broken.  We just missed the cut-off for return, which was January 31st.  I would not recommend this product.  When we try to turn it on, lines come across the screen.

Reviews.Title: cheaply made
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: VERY cheaply made. Buttons felt like they were going to fall right off. Nice and light and slim but returned because I didn't think it would last a week...

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kristen M Bass
Reviews.Content: I have two of these. They work great! I have had one over a year, it's been dropped and used by 3 different kids of all ages and still works great. So I got my oldest son one and he loves it! Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Buyer BEWARE! Junk!
Reviews.Author: Alisa Dickson
Reviews.Content: First, to clarify, I did not purchase this item from Amazon. But my review is for this model of Zeepad. I am so disappointed and frustrated with this purchase that I wanted to submit a review to save others the time, hassle and money. The first problem occurred when I attempted to read the user manual before doing anything with the tablet. It was horrific! The manual was written with english words but the grammatical errors, spelling errors and everything else about it was so poor that I couldn't make sense of it. It was like reading a different language with english words. Once I let it charge for the day I gave it a try, only to be completely disappointed! I realize I didn't purchase an iPad so I was willing to give it a chance. I tried to play a netflix from it only to find that I could hardly make out the image on the  screen. I also had to hold the tablet at one exact angle in order to even see anything. The sound was so poor I couldn't tell anything was even coming out of the speaker until I turned it over and held it right up to my ear. (That was after I had turned up all of the sound). The final complaint and what lead me to my decision to return it, (as if the above is not enough) is that there is such a delay when pressing an icon that I felt like I had to keep pushing it to make sure it was recognizing my touch. Actually, I can't say there is anything good about this tablet. Buyer beware, Do NOT but this! I don't even want to give it one star. It doesn't deserve it!This is by far the worst item I have ever purchased off the internet.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Dobiedude
Reviews.Content: I am using this as an engine monitor in my truck. Downloaded an app for this. Internet is a bit slow.

Reviews.Title: Grandson's gift
Reviews.Author: fangal
Reviews.Content: I sent this to my grandson.  He loves it! He is able to look up his own videos and play games he likse. We are looking forward to his learning a great deal from it. And he doesn't have to borrow our phones to play!

Reviews.Title: Horrible purchase
Reviews.Author: Ben O.
Reviews.Content: The Zeepad was purchased for my 10 year old nephew for Christmas. It arrived and I could tell from the beginning that we were going to have trouble. The earphones would not fit into the Zeepad. We chose to keep it anyway at that point. Within 5 days, we started having trouble logging on and staying logged into wifi. A week later, we could not even get the thing to turn on. It was fully charged and would not turn on while plugged in or not plugged in. Needless to say, my nephew was disappointed and I felt like a complete loser aunt!

Reviews.Title: ugh
Reviews.Author: Tonisha Houston
Reviews.Content: i never knew how to operate this thing and the sound on it was horrible. I could have it on the max volume level and I still had to strain to hear something.

Reviews.Title: Granddaughters lovr them.
Reviews.Author: glory
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my 7 & 8 year old granddaughters,  my son says they love them, no problems.

Reviews.Title: Ya get what ya pay for.....
Reviews.Author: S. Moore
Reviews.Content: Slow, very limited space and one week after I had it when I went to use it ALL my stuff was gone and everything was Japanese.

Reviews.Title: better than I though
Reviews.Author: ZacPR
Reviews.Content: No its not perfect, but its pretty great for a great price.  I really like it and I am really happy with it.  I have had it for about 6 months.  Bettery could use a little improvement but thats it

Reviews.Title: What headline!!!
Reviews.Author: Kellie S. Green
Reviews.Content: The power botton poped off which my daughter could not play with it anymore. But other wise my daughter loved her Zeepad.

Reviews.Title: Gift  very well enjoyed
Reviews.Author: gread53
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my granddaughtershe is so pleased with it and loves it,  she takes it every where with her

Reviews.Title: Not so good tablet
Reviews.Author: christina
Reviews.Content: Tablet broke in a month. Screen isn't great quality. Save your money it's not worth it. But another tablet this one is low quality
