Reviews.Title: You get what you paid for.
Reviews.Author: Tasha James
Reviews.Content: Ok products for the price.My kids love it.wouldn't recommend for adults that are into high price,speed,and qualityon tablets.Cool gift overall.

Reviews.Title: The worst product ever.
Reviews.Author: marsha mathis
Reviews.Content: First of all the tablet stop working 1 week after I received it in the mail. I returned it so they sent me another one. This one stop working and would not come back on also. It would charge but not turn back on. This all happen with in the first 2 mos of receiving this product. Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Peice of JUNK
Reviews.Author: benjamin bird
Reviews.Content: This thing DIED within the first couple of weeks of having it..It consistantly would error out when on an app, was very slow to download anything, overall just junky...Finally it wouldnt charge anymore, and the screen went white..Dont waste your money on this cheap peice of crap... Invest a little money and get the Kindle

Reviews.Title: Great starter tablet for a young child
Reviews.Author: Jessica Carbone
Reviews.Content: This is a great starter tablet.  We bought it for our two year-old for Christmas because she loves to play toddler apps on our phones.  I just couldn't justify the price of some other tablets for a kid her age.  I'm happy with the zeepad overall.  It runs a little slow, but for the price I expected that.

Reviews.Title: Love that Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Milton Boston
Reviews.Content: It had a great viewing screen. Quickly picked up information. Small enough to carry it anywhere. Preloaded and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: could be much better
Reviews.Author: Jacques
Reviews.Content: Not really impressed, rear camera with very low resolution, screen with very poor quality and battery charger very sensitive and can break easily

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i bought this tablet for my 4 year old son as a Christmas gift, thinking for the price it was a good starter tablet.  But in roughly 3 weeks I had to send it back because it stopped turning on.  I would not recommend it for anyone else.

Reviews.Title: i love my zeepad it's a great tablet
Reviews.Author: mary Underwood
Reviews.Content: i love it ,it work like a charm it's a very good and fast tablet and it's not that expensive i love it

Reviews.Title: very slow
Reviews.Author: Penlug
Reviews.Content: I got it on time. The day I got it I used it right away. This crappy machine is way slower than my cell phone. It makes want to go to sleep. I hardly use it anymore cuz it's way too slow and the applications that I download always either crashes or freezes all the time. Now I have to buy another one this time one with a quad core processor.

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Victoria Coward
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 9 yr old son for Christmas gift paid 60 bucks and free shipping as well and they delivered it just  in time. Delivery date was the 24th of December but  i received it the 23rd so we got it right before christmas and it works good and its just perfect for him he enjoys playing games especially minecraft.  I would recommend this to someone else perfect for kids.  So I give 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Presant for a 8 year old
Reviews.Author: j.Linduff
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 8 year old for his birthday and it works great. Now when it comes to Minion rush it is a little slow, but since my 8 year old is a HUGE mine craft fan and plays all the time, its perfect. He loves it and takes it everywhere with him.

Reviews.Title: It's alright
Reviews.Author: ALS23
Reviews.Content: Good price, cool colors, but poor screen view.  It kind of hurts the eyes to look at. Is not HD at all.  The operating system seems to be okay, but not the best.  Next time, I'd rather spend the extra $50 for much better quality.

Reviews.Title: Very poor product!
Reviews.Author: YVONNE BOWDEN
Reviews.Content: I would advise you not purchase this product.  I bought three of them for my grandchildren, and they are all a problem.  The screen blacks out, chargers don't work, and if you do get it charged, it lasts for maybe 45 minutes.  If it was jus one of them, maybe just a defective item, but all three are bad.

Reviews.Title: Didnt work from day one.
Reviews.Author: shadwina
Reviews.Content: I would rate a zero if I could, it did not work from day one, I charged it per the directions and it came on but cut right off, I tried to turn it on again by holding the button for two minutes as directed, it came on but went off again within a few minutes, I got this for my daughter as a christmas present and had to send it back. I read the reviews and seen this was a problem for other buyers, I did buy a blue one for my other daughter and that one is working, but for the problem with the pink one I wouldn't suggest anyone buying one.

Reviews.Title: Really Fast and a must have for fisrst timers
Reviews.Author: Chalie Ann Davis
Reviews.Content: Got this yesterday. I really like it. I bought it for someone and he asked me to put the games and stuff on it. I have a Motorola Atrix 2 so I know that dual core and A8 cortex means something good lol because my phone runs fast and nice. Any way I really like this tablet the dispalay is nice! The camera has flash (I was surprised at that) and there is a front and rear facing camera. I know its only 4gigs so that doesnt matter all you need is a mini sd.I have to order one of these for my self just to have being that they are only $63....when i was loading the games the tablet did reset and stay on the welcome screen but after I pluged in the charged it continued to load. I hope this isnt a problem that he will encounter alot.But none the less I will be purchasing another! Maybe a pink one becuase even though my husband has his own 10" tab he likes new stuff! -____- Now that im thinking about it my 6 and 5 year old girls having a pink tablet might draw there attention o.0

Reviews.Title: Busted!
Reviews.Author: A User
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these and all three broke very quickly.  The power buttons break and are hard to get to make a connection inside.  One started showing the script that runs in the background on the screen in the foreground and the others screen cracked far too easily.  You get what you pay for I guess.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Kerri
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and within a month it was not working right.  I wasn't able to understand the instruction guide very well when trying to fix it.  Resetting it just seemed to make things worse.

Reviews.Title: Summary
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hilliard
Reviews.Content: For the price, very good. Purchased for a 7 yr old and a 3 yr old, both use it quite well for games. Have tried it myself and prefer it over FB for one particular game,

Reviews.Title: CHEAP QUALITY DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: April Epps
Reviews.Content: The quality cheap brought for a gift a month ago my niece jes got in town to use it the charger do not charge the thing & was using USB charger 2 times now the thing wont charge at all and since we jes discovered cus it was a gift now I'm stick with crap & my 6 yr. Old niece which was excited about her gift is now sad.........

Reviews.Title: great for the money!!
Reviews.Author: chrisha emmanuel
Reviews.Content: i fine it worth it. oh GOD !! i have no tips leave meh alone. i gone laterz. stop it now eh!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work anymore
Reviews.Author: nichole sibu
Reviews.Content: This device quit working after about 3 weeks. Screen is now blue and does not function. Very disappointing. Also, for me, the screen resolution, when it did work, made me dizzy. Although I didn't expect high quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: A. Cherry
Reviews.Content: This tablet works exactly as you would expect for the price.  Applications run a bit slow and the battery life is very poor.  Great starter tablet for a tween.

Reviews.Title: Great my children loved it and the colors were amazing! Thanks will shop again.
Reviews.Author: Kristin S.
Reviews.Content: This Tablet is a show stopper, its choice in colors help my children determine which one is theirs. It came with the Angry birds already downloaded and the shipping was extremely fast. Sleek looking and excellent quality. Just what we needed! Thanks

Reviews.Title: stopped working
Reviews.Author: m tate
Reviews.Content: It was ok for a few days but stopped functioning at all. There is absolutely no support for this product, nor any manuals, etc. I absolutely would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: great for kids first tablet
Reviews.Author: andrea spears
Reviews.Content: Good for the money. great for kids first tablet. not the best but for what u pay can't get any better . def get your money worth ..

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: Amy Williams
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my 6yr son. He loves it, I am impressed with the Zeepad. It runs very quick doesn't take a long time to load videos or download apps.  The only thing negative would be the screen is hard to see with the way the light glares. My son seems not to have any problem seeing the screen . I love this tablet it is well worth the price..

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Gene A. Fisher
Reviews.Content: Splendid tablet for what it does, e.g. read kindle books.  But there is much that it can not do, e.g. blue tooth, connect to computer.  The battery life is terribly short, 3 hours at best, and you are warned not to charge it over 3 hours.  That is, you can't charge the battery overnight.  Needs a faster processor.  Memory not much, but no problem if you have a hefty SD card.

Reviews.Title: Thought It was a great buy
Reviews.Author: Felicia Billie
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product in blue for my 7 yr old grandson and pink for my 5 yr old granddaughter for Christmas.  After reading the reviews, I thought they were going to be a great buy but much to my surprise, they didn't last.  After receiving them, I opened them to check them out and everything seemed fine except I kept hearing a slight humming sound while they were powered on.  I was immediately concerned, but it was so close to Christmas that I didn't want to risk sending them back for an exchange and end up not receiving them in time for Christmas.  It didn't take long before I realized that I probably should have.They have all of the features that I was expecting, but within the first 4 hours of my granddaughter opening hers, she dropped it one time.  The screen cracked and it completely stopped responding to touch.  I sent it back for an exchange, but was only able to get a refund.  In less than a week, I had to return my grandson's tablet as well.  After the first couple of days, the screen turned all blue and it stayed like that for at least 2 days.  It eventually came back to life, but that only lasted for another day before it was completely gone.  So after less than 7 days, I arranged to send his back for a refund as well.The reasons I gave it a 3 star rating instead of one star has nothing to do with the product itself, although the colors are rather cute.  But it has more to do with the excellent customer service regarding order processing, shipping/delivery, and returns/refunds.  Delivery was very quick and refunds were issued immediately upon Amazon receiving the defective items, which only took a couple of days.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Elaine Jordan "elaine"
Reviews.Content: My husband wanted a small tablet for reading library books and kindle books at night.this was perfect.he uses his bigger tablet for everyday,but for travelling,uses this one more and more. I stripped all apps he was not going to use,added sd storage and got a good m edge case. He takes good care of it and it works fine.it is jerky and does have that weird screen if you look at it sideways,you can't see it,like the old tv screens when they first came out.the touchscreen is not very good.....if you buy for a kid, the kid either needs to take care of it and be patient....it is not as responsive as a smartphone,or it will be brokenOne thing,there are two ways to charge it, special provided adapter or micro usb ,which is nice if one way breaksThis one is very nice as it accepts Google play and I assume but have not verified Amazon app store....several cheaper tablets do not

Reviews.Title: Christmas gifts
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought two for my granddaughters and they love them. Good gifts for Christmas for a 9 & 8 year olds.

Reviews.Title: decent product for kids
Reviews.Author: KCG "curious"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for a kid.  The battery has a short life, but you get what you pay for.  It runs fast for basic games and apps.

Reviews.Title: pocket friendly price
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: Bought a red one and a pink one and my kids love them great buy would buy from this seller again great gift idea and you can't beat the price

Reviews.Title: Well... You can turn it on and off
Reviews.Author: Jose Carrasquilla
Reviews.Content: Considering that my 3 year's old daughter doesn't complain when it freezes or because of it's weak built I can say It's ok. But I would not recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: bobbie
Reviews.Content: We ordered three for our girls for Christmas and overall they worked great one of the tablets camera would not work by Amazon replaced the tablet and have not had any problems. The only complaint would it would not allow me to download Subway Surfers and many other games that my daughter's were wanting on their tablets

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7" is Great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought two, one for a 5 and 6 year old and it works!!!  Keeps them off the adult tablets and they have all their age appropriate apps right at their fingertips.

Reviews.Title: NOt as good as I expected
Reviews.Author: Kimberly S.
Reviews.Content: I have ordered 2 of these tablets.  They are decent for the price but dont last long.  They stop turning on, sometimes they dont charge , and not durable at all, not even with a case! I did order the square trade warranty which i will have to use again. i will not be buying a 3rd one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Shernise Curry
Reviews.Content: It does what I expected and allows my son to play games as well as stay off the desktop as much.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Love this unit for the price. it is all worth it fast and clear and fun.an awesome and more fun.

Reviews.Title: SEEMS TO BE OKAY
Reviews.Author: Euthemia McMahon
Reviews.Content: I just turned this on and was trying ensure that it would operate properly. It seems to work well. Does not have that many apps loaded but the ones there seem to operate also. I like the cool blue color! I purchased this for my 5yr old to read books and play educational games. I was unable to load scholastic estoria app. Hopefully I can find another reading program for children. I like that it is a little bit smaller than the normal 7in tablets. But it has the same size screen.

Reviews.Title: Great android tablet
Reviews.Author: P Augustus "peaches"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my kid. It works well and its great for beginners. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: My daughter likes it
Reviews.Author: Melissa Rex
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter.  The batteries do not last very long, but she shouldn't be on it for more than the battery lasts anyways.  Not the best screen/clarity, but it works for a 5 year old to play games.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEVICE
Reviews.Author: JEWELLZbennett
Reviews.Content: LOVE MY TABLET. ITS GREAT OVERALL. GOOD PRICE, GOOD FEATURES. GREAT DEVICE. I ACTUALLY BOUGHT 3 OF THESE BUT ONE IS NOT WORKING . THE SCREEN KEEPS RUNNING, GUESS ITS A MANUFACTURER DEFECT AND WHEN IT START I COULD NOT RETURN IT, ( DON'T THING THEY REPAIR THEM EITHER) BUT THEY ARE GREAT OTHERWISE

Reviews.Title: Touch Screen Dont Work
Reviews.Author: emmanuel
Reviews.Content: i manage to use it for a week until the screen went out and i really wanted it for my daughter and now she is without a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids.
Reviews.Author: michael kimball
Reviews.Content: Great for kids.  All 5 of my kids have one the youngest is two and she loves it.  Doesn't stay charged for long so must leave it pluged in while being played.

Reviews.Title: battery life is low
Reviews.Author: raghavender macherla
Reviews.Content: unit gets heated up very fast.. and battery life drains out fast. apart from that no other major problem..its a kids tablet

Reviews.Title: for my 3 year old
Reviews.Author: jerryca
Reviews.Content: this is a great tablet for its money this item came faster than it said it would be here by battery does not last as long as i feel like it should but i have done a lot of video streaming has great picture and comes with a screen protector my advise on this screen protector is keep the one on that comes on unit i applied the screen protector it came with which was a big seller for me it has made bubbles under the protector maybe i am just not a pro but i was kinda bummed out but i would recommend this tablet

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: rodney
Reviews.Content: Brought 3 tablets for my kids one of them lost it's volume now I'm sending all of them back I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: 6" tablet
Reviews.Author: Wilma Postoak
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use.  Enjoying it very much. Grandchild loves it. He has loaded several games and only 6 years.  I cannot download anything.  DUH

Reviews.Title: cheap for a reason
Reviews.Author: Lobelia
Reviews.Content: The display is terrible. Buttons are displayed on top of other buttons. Extremely slow. Spend the money and get a good one.

Reviews.Title: Great for children battery life is not very good.
Reviews.Author: annette
Reviews.Content: This tablet was great for my 5 year old daughter, however the battery does not last long AT ALL. It barely lasted a 2 hour plane ride.

Reviews.Title: cool for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Jones "Steff"
Reviews.Content: My son really enjoys this. A bit of a lag with the screen and glare but not bad for a pretty cheap tablet the android market is great he has his instagram fb twitter kik and all the apps he uses no complaints

Reviews.Title: Great girl gift
Reviews.Author: lane
Reviews.Content: I got this for a 11 year old girl at church, she absolutely loves it. She has it with her constantly. So glad that I got it for her. Would definitely buy another one as a gift

Reviews.Title: Screen gone
Reviews.Author: Telly L
Reviews.Content: After only two days, the screen just went off. it has to be pressed really hard inorder to see the items on the screen.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 Zeepad for our daugthers's Christmas. They are great! More than enough for kids!Many apps like Netflix and Skype are pre-installed, but we had the instal a newer version of Skype to do video call!One thing that could have been better: the cord is quite short! So if you want to use the tablet when charging you have to be pretty close to the outlet!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: very good lil tab the only thing i dont like about it the battery life sucks.... buy a kindle or samsung if u want longer battery life

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: cassandra
Reviews.Content: bought this item the beginning of this year and we used it for two weeks and for the last year i have been trying to get this piece of junk to work. it keeps saying too many pattern attempts and refuses to let us login. there is no reset button to be found on this tablet and hard reseting it is impossible. so im stuck with a junk tablet and a waste of money!!!!! finding a site for the seller or product is hard and cant get any help to see what to do to try and fix it. i would recommend staying away from this brand of tablet. if you search the internet you will see where so many people are in the same boat as me with the same problem!!

Reviews.Title: Failure out of box
Reviews.Author: Jasbir Sidhu
Reviews.Content: I bought Zeepad online and failed out of box. The device was not able to get beyond initial screen and not able to unlock the device. I would recommend anybody to purchase this device

Reviews.Title: nice!!
Reviews.Author: mary_clyne
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my grand daughter and it seemed to be working OK for now. will give a better review after i see if continues working.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy it!
Reviews.Author: lace
Reviews.Content: My daughter's father bought this tablet. We followed the instruction's and let it charge for the whole 5-6 hrs. Poor battery life, screen freezes up and then the display went out. I ordered the tablet on amazon which I do not shop any more. When we tried to return it there were lots of problems. Amazon said to contact the seller the seller said contact the manufacture, so we contact the manufacturer of the tablet. They give him a address to send it to along with a money order request to fix the tablet. He sends the money order and the tablet the same week he spoke to them via phone. Two weeks later when he calls he talks to random people at the company. They tell him they have the tablet but did not have the money order. To make a long story short. He was out of a tablet and the money he spent on the tablet also the money order for the repair. Too much trouble for a cheap ass tablet.

Reviews.Title: Android
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: I really liked it - but I dropped it and had to buy a new one.  I thought maybe there would be some kind of an insurance for replacement - but since it was my fault - I would guess not.

Reviews.Title: gift for my son
Reviews.Author: charity
Reviews.Content: He really loves it. He takes it everywhere we go. It also seems very sturdy. Not very thin like other tablets. It also came with ear buds a stylus and data cable and extra screen protector.

Reviews.Title: I am happy
Reviews.Author: J. Ford
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned about ordering since this was a Christmas present for my great grandson aged 4.  I was afraid it wouldn't arrive on time for his visit with me.  The tablet arrived on the day promised and was a wonderful gift.  (I had time to set it up so he could begin enjoying it as soon as he received it).  I would recommend this seller and won't hesitate to use them in the future.

Reviews.Title: touch pad
Reviews.Author: Richard Eagleston
Reviews.Content: This was an inexpensive way to get my granddaughter introduced to a touch pad. It works perfectly and does everything an introductory pad should.

Reviews.Title: First review below...NEW REVIEW...AWFUL
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was my original review below...I am going to let you all know that these tablets are JUNK!!!! Both stopped charging after two months...one of the chargers literally SHREDDED exposing all the wires. The power button would stick on both tablets, not allowing you to turn on or off. Thank goodness I always purchase the SQUARETRADE warranty because I would be out of money!! I called SQUARETRADE to see about coverage.... this product would have normally been covered under the manufacturer given the timeframe, BUT since this is made in China and it's based out of there...they were nice enough to let me return the product to them, get my amazon gift cards and be done with these ZEEPADS!!!! Now on to finding a better quality tablet for my girls!!!We purchased two tablets for our 4 & 5 y/o girls. They play on my android phone and ipods continuously. These tablets are PERFECT for the game play and NETFLIX that they enjoy on a regular basis. I am very pleased so far with the quality for the price. I plan on purchasing one for myself in the coming weeks

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Terrie Phoenix
Reviews.Content: It was a Chrismas gift for some children. They are so happy, they're sleeping with the tablets. Now I need to purchase one. They won't share with me.

Reviews.Title: peice of crap
Reviews.Author: glc
Reviews.Content: bought it as a gift for my niece's birthday. got 'stuck' in shipping and came a MONTH AFTER her birthday. then froze up and stopped working two months later!never again.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: karen
Reviews.Content: this one tablet was great. everything worked and my daughter loved it. thank you it was a great gift thanks again

Reviews.Title: Defective/Damaged Upon Opening
Reviews.Author: Madison
Reviews.Content: Was bought for a Christmas gift, and was malfunctioning immediately upon first use, and then just got worse. The screen is malfunctioning to the point it will not acknowledge when you click on something, and scrolls violently even when you are not touching the screen. Would not buy from this seller again. EVER. Bought the 7" inch Dual-Camera version, and will definitely be looking to return it.

Reviews.Title: my daughter loves her Zeepad!!
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: it has netflix and snapchat...the only thing she can't get is SubWay Surfers but other than that she loves it!

Reviews.Title: A GREAT BUY AND GOOD GIFT!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Y.
Reviews.Content: Purchase 4 of these as Christmas gifts.  My Grandchildren loved them.  We charged them prior to giving them out, and once the wrapping was undone, the kids did not put them down.  It was as though they were the only gift they received.  These zeepads were the best thing I could have chosen!  They are good for all ages ranging from child to adult.  I'm thinking of purchasing one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Total junk...
Reviews.Author: Online Shopper "onlineshopper"
Reviews.Content: The description says it all.  I bought 2 of these for my granddaughters Christmas in 2012.  They didn't last till February.  Don't waste your money.  They are crap!!!

Reviews.Title: Crapola...
Reviews.Author: JK Honeycutt
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 zeepads. At first everything seemed great until I noticed the micro USB port was missing from 1 tablet. In its place was an empty hole where the port should've been installed.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last at all
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately we bought this for our 4 year old daughter to play games on and didn't want to invest a lot of money; however it only worked for about 6 months.  It was nice while it lasted but now it won't hold a charge.  Even with a new charger, it barely powers on while plugged in.  Won't turn on at all without being plugged in.

Reviews.Title: For the price ...
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: Better not be too rough with it, it's not cheaply made but it is a rigid plastic that I think could crack if it gets tossed around much.  The OS is Android so it's reliable as any other Android device and the screen is nice and clear.  The camera is a little low res but, that's one of the sacrafices for the cost right? and I'm not trying to set the art world on fire with my tablet photos anyhow.  All in al, not bad at all for an inexpensive tablet that isn't going to go mountain climbing or river rafting with me.  I would recomend it if someone asked me about a tablet running Android OS for under $100.

Reviews.Title: I bought for my 11 year old cousin
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: He seems to like it.  There was an issue with it powering down and messing up.  It was returned for another one.  So far, there haven't been anymore issues.  I have to be somewhat neutral because I don't use the item myself.  But, I gave it a 3 star due to having to return it and get another.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last long
Reviews.Author: dquin656
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son-in-law and it barely lasted 6 months before the screen started having problems and then it wouldn't connect to the wifi in the house.

Reviews.Title: Love the Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Karen M Davis
Reviews.Content: Love my Zeepad it is more than I thought it would be. It was as described love it and great price.

Reviews.Title: buzzes and gets hot
Reviews.Author: Eric Staab
Reviews.Content: It has a horrible buzz.  It also seems to get very hot.  It no longer works with netflix (may be a netflix problem or may be a software problem): it used to show movies but no longer finds the movie file when you go to play it in netflix.  I am going to try a memory chip (expansion) to see if it helps.  Cheap, but you kinda get what you pay for.  I have no idea how to update the software on this to try to get it to work again.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift for Kids
Reviews.Author: Patricia Neal
Reviews.Content: Love this item. Small and compact but works great. Clear screen and does pretty much what a computer would do. Great for kids who love to play games.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Purchase
Reviews.Author: Ercillia Tyson
Reviews.Content: My tablet was not what I expected when I got it. Yes, it was green like the picture, but when I turned it on the tablet read Android 4.1 instead of 4.0. Not only that but it only had 504mb instead of the 512mb, and it had more options to choose from than in the 4.0 I'd ordered around the same time with the choice of making an owner profile under Security and to calibrate the screen under Settings; however, this tablet didn't last long at all. One drop from my 4 year old niece and the device split a little on one side and both the power and volume button popped out cleanly with no clear way to put them back in besides to take the tablet apart, something I had no plans of doing, and put it back in. Thank goodness for the SquareTrade warranty!Before it broke, I found that I could not connect this tablet, or the other tablet for that matter, to my computer using the provided USB cord without it shutting off automatically. Meaning that I couldn't add any of the pictures or music to the tablet like I had planned to. Not only that, but the camera quality is absolutely TERRIBLE!! Even in a bright room or direct light from a desk lamp wasn't enough to help when trying to improve the images. Each picture left the person several shades darker than they actually were and with a red haze of sort over it all.

Reviews.Title: Fully recommended, excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: morivic perdomo
Reviews.Content: excellent product for my son, it is fast, very good picture, if we compare price and quality is an option maginifica actually buy two more.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Iwona Zrodlo
Reviews.Content: it is a good tablet for biggniners for kids becouse it is easy to operate and my kids like it

Reviews.Title: CAMERA DOESNT WORK WITH APPLICATIONS!!
Reviews.Author: Amy Kim
Reviews.Content: When we try to video using skype or oovoo, his camera doesnt work. It works fine when using it for regular pics and videos but when we try to use it for the applications, the applications dont recognize that the device has a camera! We tried every setting and option but for some reason, the camera on the device is unrecognized.Though we can still talk, this is quite annoying since the main reason why I got this for him is to be able to see him...Other than that it works fine. If anyone has any solutions to help with my problem, please help.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Taramatee Cindy Bhukal
Reviews.Content: I bought this item from Amazon and it arrived today.  I checked it and the camera is not working properly.  It comes on but you cannot get to take a photo.  The video icon is also sticking.  This part of the tablet is sticking and i'm wondering what it is really working.  It is slow. I am not pleased with this.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my grandsons.  The produce allows them the game experience as well as watching T.V.  It is easy to use and great in the car.

Reviews.Title: Spend a little more and get a good tablet
Reviews.Author: ESTEBAN MORENO
Reviews.Content: The display broke after a few days. I don't know why. The battery didn't  last very long, like two hours.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price, recommended.
Reviews.Author: Gregory Lunar
Reviews.Content: The price appeared to me excellent, although it is not a recognized brand of tablet but is very well built, has been charged with good applications and games and dferencia other also brings the playstore and good accessories. It was received in perfect condition thanks to that it was well packaged.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: evelyn
Reviews.Content: what an awesome tablet for the money.  Does more than I expected. GREAT BUY FOR THE KIDS OR TEENAGERS OR GRAMMA.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: valerie armstrong
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet so far no complaints. Runs fast hasn't locked up once. Good quality product. Cameras take decent pics.

Reviews.Title: Cheap tablet....break easy....not worth the time and money
Reviews.Author: Alireza Torabi
Reviews.Content: I looked a relatively descent tablet...I bought it for my niece and mail it. However, the screen and monitor become blurry after 2-3 weeks....thought to return it and get a new one...but not worth the time...quality is poor...better to get a more expensive that last

Reviews.Title: Disappointed -
Reviews.Author: satisfied customer
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with this tablet. Purchased for my little computer genius, only to have it freeze, not take a charge, and just completely give up and die. The screen was never clear. Locating warranty information was useless.

Reviews.Title: The best investment that I have made for my grandson who just turned 2 on Nov 1st.
Reviews.Author: Gail Forsythe
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandson who  just turned 2 on Nov 1st. I had already taught him his numbers 0 - 9, basic colors, 7 shapes, and 30 sign languages. I was trying to figure out how to teach him the alphabet. One day we had the magnetic letters and he told me 7 of the letters correctly. He now knows about 1/2 of the alphabet and it's from an APP that I downloaded on his tablet. He had several educational apps on it, including flashcards. He is learning different vegetables, body parts, instruments, animals, along with other information that a child of the age of 2, usually does not learn. The only problem is, the battery runs down too fast. It is though, very well built for even a 2 year old, although he is monitored with it and does not just carry it around without supervision.

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: P. Manley "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I would give this a five but the sound is very weak.  I got this for my toddler grand daughter so she would leave my galaxy tablet alone.  It was cheaper than the kids tablets and works just as well.  She still prefers mine tablet when watching videos because the sound on this one is so weak but other than that, we love it.  And since we have had it a few months and it's being used my a 2 1/2 year old--I would have to say it is sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Good item, but battery life is too short
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love it for myself.  I wanted it for the games due to the screen being bigger than my phone.  I plan on moving to an Nexus 7 one day.  The only problem I have is the battery life.  It does not stay charged a long time, but that is something that I over look due to I like it.  I plan on giving it to my grandson once I get another tablet.  It will be great for him.

Reviews.Title: cool tablet
Reviews.Author: Gabriela
Reviews.Content: nice tablet, good quality and excellent connection to internet. i really really recommend this tablet. i shall be back for more.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet for my kids!
Reviews.Author: Sagebrush Dragon "Sagebrush Dragon"
Reviews.Content: I purchased three of these tablets and overall we are very happy with them. My kids use them and they have held up very nicely.  So far everything works as expected. The only issues we have had is that one of the chargers (out of 3) doesn't stay connected properly resulting in an uncharged tablet.The seller upgraded our tablets to dual camera which was a nice bonus!

Reviews.Title: not a good product unless!!
Reviews.Author: denise jones
Reviews.Content: it will not download certain games! it will not allow me to watch certain cartoons! the battery does not last long!!

Reviews.Title: Battery Life is my ONLY issue
Reviews.Author: Donald Cruz
Reviews.Content: I like this item, it works and it's very cheap.  Unfortunately, battery life is terrible and you will only be able to use it for 2 hours max on a full charge.  Other than that, it's good value for money.

Reviews.Title: It works just fine for a child
Reviews.Author: K. Kindle "Katie"
Reviews.Content: Tablet is "OK" I purchased it for my 8 year old nephew and for him it should work just fine to play games and browse the web. The Tablet is not very sturdy and the charger was broken upon receiving the item (it shot sparks when plugged in) but if you dont want to spend a ton of money and your pretty sure your child wont be too hard on it then this is a good buy. Hold about an hour to hour and a half charge if playing games.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: LA
Reviews.Content: Great product perfect gift for my daughter the only thing I did not like was that the ups left my packet on the side walk and I was home to receive the packet they should be more responsible!!

Reviews.Title: it was ok. nothing special.
Reviews.Author: kaylee orsillo
Reviews.Content: the screen wasnt as bright you have to hold it a certain way to even be able to see it clearly. i got two over six months ago that were better quality.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Kendra Briese
Reviews.Content: I chose to buy my 7 year old daughter a zeepad cause of the price, I was surprised that it turned out to be a pretty good product, its a little slower but that's ok I wanted to buy my daughter something that wouldn't be expensive if it needed to be replaced. over we are very happy with it

Reviews.Title: Terrible product
Reviews.Content: Very cheaply made! The on and off button as well as the sound button  came off! The device freezes and also takes a long time to load!Would not recommend this, defiantly wasted my money since we only had it a couple weeks

Reviews.Title: My wasted money down the drain and I can't even get any results to help recoup my money are new tablets....Will never buy tablet
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: It stopped working and I bought 2 of the one for my grandaughter and one for me, hers stopped working 3 months ago and mine 2 months ago.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Michael Wells Glueck "EditAndPublishYourBook.com"
Reviews.Content: I agree with reviewers who found the Wi-Fi reception weak or intermittent. Sometimes it was necessary to switch to airplane mode while on land or sea. And it wasn't always possible to enter words in a search box. Finally, the battery lasts for only one hour before requiring recharging and causing the tablet to shut down automatically. I bought and sold this tablet within four days. Enough said?

Reviews.Title: Junk.  Pure junk.
Reviews.Author: Salty
Reviews.Content: Returning this tomorrow.  Perhaps I'm just spoiled by my previous tablet, that sadly quit charging, but this is a piece of junk. I found that the screen was impossible to change the settings.  I first thought it was the brightness, but had my bf check it out, and he couldn't fix it so it looked even halfway normal.  It's the slowest ever when attempting to open a browser to the internet.  We messed around with googling quite a few sites, and found that our patience just ran out.  Even attempting to play Candy Crush on this messed with our eyes and minds.  The gems moved at a snails pace, and the colors were so skewed, we just quit.  Rather disappointing.  Netflix took forever to load, often stopped to buffer, and the color/brightness/settings were so distorted, it was unwatchable.Not gonna mess with it, perhaps it could just be this unit, but I'm returning it to find a different product that actually has some quality to it.

Reviews.Title: ONE OF A KIND UNIQUE.AND IS COMPACT AND NOT DIFFICULT TO HANDLE.IS CUTE AND I LOVE THE SIZE GREAT ELECTRONIC FOR KIDS..
Reviews.Author: BARBARA REYES
Reviews.Content: THE COLOR.THE SERVICE.THE WHOLE TABLET I LOVE AND ENJOY.ESPECIALLY AS A GIFT FOR CHILDREN.I BROUGHT MULTICOLORS AS WELL.AND IT WAS EASY TO ORDER.

Reviews.Title: Never buy this!
Reviews.Author: jennifer cook
Reviews.Content: it worked for an hour after that it would never load back up again. so i hate it and would never buy this again.

Reviews.Title: No worth it, spend the extra money
Reviews.Author: April Lessig
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my boys...they both stopped charging within 6 months. I have had someone at my job, an IT tech, to look at them and they are not repairable. Completely not worth purchasing. I wish I could return them both now. Lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: portia hardin
Reviews.Content: zeepad freezes up constantly, have had less than a year and the on button is stuck. cannot turn on. I guess I got what 79 dollars is worth. will stick with ipad next time. thanks

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the money
Reviews.Author: Brittany McClearen
Reviews.Content: Has a few glitches and sometimes is pretty slow but for the price, this isn't a bad buy at all.

Reviews.Title: 7"Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sharon C. Smith
Reviews.Content: My daughter is very happy with her Zeepad purchased through Amazon. She lives on it. It does pretty much what the expensive tablets do. Its really a great buy. If I didnt already have a tablet, I would buy it for myself.

Reviews.Title: Good product! but i cant find a case please help
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: I love the wopd 8!!!! Its huge!! Bigger than i thought!! But if anyone can find out where to get a case for this product plese tell me.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: Fanny Torres
Reviews.Content: Broke after only 1 week of use, the battery would die after only 1 hour of use. Terrible product. Unhappy

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this one.
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: Came with JellyBean 4.1.1 installed, and unlike previous versions it has no root access. Battery life started out at 2 hours, but since some new batteries improve after a few cycles, I figured I'd give it a chance. 3 days later it won't last 1.5 hours before the low battery warning. Screen is inconsistent, sometimes it's extremely sensitive, and sometimes it just won't register, even with the included pointer.

Reviews.Title: Work fine but having some problems.
Reviews.Author: travis
Reviews.Content: Well it has been working fine,but charging it becomes the problem where the cord plugs in it,you have to hold it or prop it up so it will take a full charge.

Reviews.Title: Will NEVER buy another Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Butterflykisses1781
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd Zeepad and each of them has had a unique issue.  The manufacturer doesn't even have a phone number you can contact for support and there is no one that will service these devices.  This on in particular stopped charging with the provided charging cord 2 days after we got it.  Thank God I purchased a Square Trade Warranty on it so I could get credit to buy a Kindle for my daughter instead.

Reviews.Title: Loved this tablet until it would not charge
Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday and he loved it. Now it's three months later it will not charge nor come on.

Reviews.Title: Three and a half
Reviews.Author: valerie mclean
Reviews.Content: It did not have skype on it nor did it have any pre loaded games but over all not to bad. I give it 3.5 stars

Reviews.Title: Great android
Reviews.Author: Eva Simon
Reviews.Content: This tablet really surprised me, its great i don't feel the need to bring my laptop everywhere with me because it practically does all what the laptop can do. However the one problem with the zeepad is that it can't handle too much pressure otherwise it just freezes and then you would have to restart it and the camera well mine worked for like about a month and then it just stopped working really don't know why to this day. But still i would recommend it for adults, kids, grandparents it fun and easy to use too

Reviews.Title: Great Product for a Great Price!!!!
Reviews.Author: Erin Storey`
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sons birthday present, we wanted a tablet for him that wasn't crazy expensive but he could play games and read books, and even go onto facebook.  It is the perfect size and works great!!  The only problem I had was once trying to connect to the internet. I fixed the time zone and it connected right away. It is set up just like my Galaxay Tablet so the set up for us was real easy. Great product for a Great price!!

Reviews.Title: It's alright, few serious things though.
Reviews.Author: Michael Riddle
Reviews.Content: My tablet came with Jelly Bean 4.1.1 NOT ICS 4.0.4, and was NOT rooted. Luckily there's a program called Uberizer that can root 4.1.1 for any A13 device. The downside right now is there is a 4.2.2 update, but it's not rooting right...Overall, if you're just looking for a simple tablet for a kid to play with or something it's not to bad -- I plan to use it for my car's touchscreen/computer and am going to have to do a lot of tinkering to get it working how I was hoping.

Reviews.Title: Not the best tablet
Reviews.Author: GrammaBarbara
Reviews.Content: I am a bit disappointed with this tablet.  It is slow coming on.  The manual gives very little info and in poor English.  It is not as easy to use as I hoped it would be.  I should have read the reviews on this before investing in it.

Reviews.Title: Tablet Review

Reviews.Content: I was looking for a low cost tablet for a Friend in the Philippines and this Fit the BillIt has a good price and the product works fineI needed assistance setting up the Wifi for this Tablet, so I did a search on the Internet and there is a lot of information  for this tablet, I followed the instructions and the WiFi is workingIt has been in use,for several months and so far, so goodI feel that this tablet is very good for the price

I contacted to company who was more than happy to assist me with an exchange. The delivery time was shorter than expected and the prices for the product you just cant beat. This ultimately resulted in my return business now purchasing another Zeepad with this company. Keep up the great customer service!!

Reviews.Title: Nice!!

Reviews.Title: zee tab

Reviews.Title: Great for my 8 year old!

Reviews.Title: It works - Kinda
Reviews.Author: ariona_lie
Reviews.Content: Well where do I start with this thing. I read the review, but they were pretty mixed so I decided to try it myself. Now, when we first got it, we let it charge ALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL Night (xmas eve) My daughter was so excited, but - well it wouldnt turn on... FINALLY after another day of charging it turned on. My daughter who was 9 at the time started downloading apps - Youtube, Sugar Crush, Instagram, Angry Birds.... welllll......................skype didnt work too well, You cant see the whole game of sugarcrush - but Pandora and Youtube work just great (as long as its charged) I would next time keep my money and get a better name brand - but I guess now my 3 year old can have it...

Reviews.Title: THIS IS JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!! AMAZING

Reviews.Content: Works perfect. I am going to place 2 more orders. My friends and family will do the same. The tablet is amazing. I recommend it 100%  Thank you for my happiness!! God bless this company!!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet

Reviews.Content: These tablets are at a great price and have so many functions. My grandkids love them! And I like them too!

The first one I received on here didn'[t work properly. The screen did not respond on one corner. The newest replacement works fine. For the price it's a decent buy, but I do wish the processor was a bit faster and the wifi would connect faster. My smartphone runs circles around this. But what can you expect for the price? Just plain and simple...........IT WORKS!! Browse, email, and play games. That's all I do with it.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: Victor Pinkney
Reviews.Content: Was not a good tool for me for my line of work. Which is storing, comparing, and sharing data. Was not satisfied

Reviews.Title: My son loves it!
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 6 year old because I didn't want to spend $400 on something he may end up breaking.  It worked perfectly, google play already loaded and he has so many games to keep him occupied on car rides.  We did have an issue and Wholesale California promptly addressed and corrected the problem, - couldn't ask for better customer service.

Reviews.Title: Really nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: E. Scinta
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 10yr old daughter because she wanted a tablet of her own. I didn't want to spend a lot of money in case she broke it or didn't take care of it, so after looking on here and reading all the reviews I bought her this one. I gotta say I was really surprised with this because I was expecting it to be on the lower quality side because of the price. But it's actually really nice. Have a lot of pros and some cons for this tablet:Pros:-Very heavy duty but still light weight which I like. Seems like it'll last longer and it doesn't seem like it'll break easy if dropped.-Came with a bunch of stuff including charger, stylus, headphones and 2 USB chords-Very easy to set up WiFi and all the time/location settings.-Going between screens, closing out programs and personalizing tablet is super easy to do.-WiFi connectivity is great and have had no problems connecting to the house router and actually picked up a ton of other routers in the area too when it was searching for connections.-Touch screen works great. Using the stylus works even better.-All apps seem to work well - liked how there were a lot already installed like YouTube and Angry Birds.-Big pro for me was that you can turn this tablet off and on to save battery life. And it doesn't just go into "sleep mode" like the ipad, it actually turns off which is very nice.-Like how there's a slot for the SD card to add more storage to device.-Camera seems to work great. Can take pictures or record video and switch between the dual cameras. (Resolution is meh though - see below in 'Cons')-Charging is actually really quick. Takes maybe an hour or so to get the battery up to 100% once it's down to nothing.-Gets all the same apps as the iPad using the Google Play store (pretty much it's just like an Android phone but bigger and you can't make phone calls)Cons:-Will lag if you have too many programs open at the same time (which makes sense as the memory isn't that high).-Speakers aren't all that great. I think that's why they included the headphones because the highest volume is still kind of hard to hear sometimes depending on what you're listening too.-Resolution is alright. Not as good as the ipad or Windows tablet though. But it's not horrible, just not HD or anything.I'd definitely recommend this for a kid that wants a tablet. So far my daughter LOVES this and hasn't put it down since we gave it to her.

Reviews.Title: Lasted 6 months with light use and no abuse...
Reviews.Author: Cevyn L. Miles-monaghan
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my wife to play casual games on.  For that purpose, and considering the low price, it works great.  Mine came with Jelly Bean pre-installed.  The box even says "Jelly Bean" on it.  The About screen in the OS confirms this as well.  Unlike other ZeePads with Android ICS, this updated model was NOT rooted out of the box.The first thing I did to prep this for her was to root it using "Root with Restore by Bin4ry", from the XDA forums, and then installed Ad-Away and Root Cleaner.  I also uninstalled the apps and games she doesn't use to free up some memory - root not required.Battery life is so-so.  A couple hours of gaming will kill it, but it lasts a decent amount of time for other tasks.  The back of the tablet does get quite warm while gaming.  Performance is decent, however a task killing app is useful for freeing up some memory.  The screen is OK as well and responds to touch accurately.  The viewing angle is quite limited compared to a high end IPS display, though the update speed is plenty fast for her games and doesn't exhibit motion blur.I didn't find any Chinese spamware on this tablet as I did on the Star N9500 phone that I purchased and reviewed here on Amazon.UPDATE 02-20-2014: The tablet has degraded substantially with light use.  Random lockups, reboots, green lines on the screen and other anomalies make it pretty much unusable.  I even flashed the latest stock firmware, and without any additional apps installed the same problems are present, indicating hardware failure.

Reviews.Title: Mixed feelings
Reviews.Author: Wayfinder
Reviews.Content: I hate writing this kind of review, because I don't know whether to review the product or the advertising/shipping.  So, giving it 3 stars as a "belated thumbs up".THE PRODUCT.  The Zeepad itself is fairly awesome.  It's decently fast.  Decently responsive.  I like the way Android is set up on it-- not a bunch of extra brand-specific garbage.  Easy to use.  Speaker is acceptably loud.  No bluetooth but that's as advertised.  Love the multi-function USB port.  Love that it charges either from the charger port or USB.  For the price, this is an impressive little tablet.  Didn't like the 800x400 screen pixels... too few really.  But it works and aside from typical "short freeze" lag factors common in Android devices, this is a great little system at $70.  The device itself I give a solid 4+ stars.THE SHIPPING and ADVERTISING.  Not so spiffy.  The ad seems to change from time to time and what was originally listed as "up to 1200 x 600 graphics resolution" turned out to be significantly less.  In truth, 800x400 just doesn't quite cut it.  It limits the number of icons one can have on one screen.  Now if that had been advertised would be fine.  Noticed at times the screen says just that.  But at other times it advertises the 1200 x 600 and (while I don't know why), that's going to cause problem expectations.But the real problem I had (and what knocked this down to 3 stars), when purchased from "WorryFree Gadgets"... it came shipped in its own box loose-packed inside an Amazon box-- no padding to keep it from bumping around.  Meh, these packages take quite a bit of bumping anyway, so not too worried.  But... Amazon box was in fine shape while the Zeepad box was significantly crushed.  Since the outer box was fine, that means it was PACKED in that condition.  As a result while the Zeepad itself seemed okay, the screen protector packed as a "bonus item" in the top of the box was also crushed.  Not happy with that.The bonuses were nice.  The Zeepad stylus, the screen protector (if it hadn't been damaged *at the time of shipping*), the mini-usb adapter, everything was fine.  But I don't have much tolerance for a merchant taking a visibly and significantly damaged box and going ahead and shipping it without even inspecting the contents.  That's lazy and it's just not right.So... three stars.  Like other users I give the Zeepad itself a thumbs-up value-for-the-buck rating.  For the shipping and merchant care, not so much.  The question I have:  was it shipped directly from the merchant or from Amazon itself?  The screen said "Sold by Goodios and Fulfilled by Amazon."  So which is it... Worry-Free Gadgets, Goodios or Amazon to blame for shoddy packing?  Who crushed the inner box and who sent it out in that condition?  Dunno.  It got it returned though, and Amazon was great about that as always... with a refund to my account in less than 24 hours and free UPS pickup (just cannot beat Amazon on customer service).This is a product that cannot be exchanged, only returned.  That's fine because in truth, I want a bit better resolution screen if available-- and the new Zeepads are just now hitting the market with DOUBLE THE MEMORY for about $10 more (nice coincidence there).Despite the problems I still <3 Amazon, and the Zeepad is everything everyone raves about.  For a starter Android tablet or one for kids... this is a good choice.

My computer tech has it now.........he may be able to get rid of the voice command problem but it is going to cost me........I figured out how to turn it off......but it keeps turning itself back on...........tried putting a piece of tape over the microphone............didn't help.  As far as directions / operating instructions..................horrible.................definitely a poor Chinese translation with conflicting instructions and false info.JUST WANTED THIS FOR MY MOTHER TO PLAY WORDS WITH FRIENDS WITH ME AS HER IPHONE IS TOO TINY FOR HER TO SEE....................THIS WoPad IS ........SoBad...........she can not even use it.............shoulda got her the Kindle HD.  at least Amazon has some support and can help get it running..............but hey, its a pretty pink.........paperweight.
