Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this a month ago for my 5yr old son.Only lasted for a week.shipment was great, came a day early.The item I received didn't say any brand name it's whatever chinese writing? As what they advertise here.The tablet itself was very responsive, the volume wasn't so great, the quality of the screen pictures wasn't so great either.Plus the charger that came with it was a piece of crap, sorry for my language, I said this because it didn't FIT RIGHT to the charging port, it was sticking out.One night I charged it, the following day I was checking it, to my surprised, the metal tip that goes into the charging port  came off &was; melting.Thank God didn't burn my house.then the USB charger that they sent was too loose, my son can't even use his tablet anymore because don't have any charger to use.Went to 3stores NOBODY sell it, they said the charger I have was made CHEAP...Lesson learned, I WILL NEVER EVER PURCHASE ANY KIND OF ELECTRONICS HERE.I tried to be cheap, now I'm paying the consequences.

Reviews.Title: GOOD TABLET FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: CARLENE
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS TABLET FOR MY SONS BIRTHDAY, HE LOVES IT VERY MUCH I WLD RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE. IT CAME WITH ANGRY BIRDS AND FRUIT NINJA, SINCE THEN I DOWNLOADED ABT 5 MORE

Reviews.Title: Awesome, great customer Service, excellent product!!
Reviews.Author: D. Booth "tddbbs"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife, she uses it everyday, she is obsessed with facebook and she video skype's with her brother that lives quite a ways away, I also got the matching pink keyboard attachment and extra stylus'.  Earned me allot of points ;)  D/L apps, check your email, anything a PC can do!! Makes a GREAT GIFT!!!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: jamie gilliam
Reviews.Content: This zeepad is a very good tablet for such a low price.  My daughter is very happy with it, she uses it all the time.

Reviews.Title: this was terrible
Reviews.Author: Raphy
Reviews.Content: the screen is crappy it broke the second day i got it and its really slow an they wont let me return it so dont get it its a waste of money

Reviews.Title: my screen was all scratched up
Reviews.Author: vanity
Reviews.Content: my screen was all scratched up it doesn't want to stay connected to wifi I have to keep making it connect

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: taysmom
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter as a cheaper alternative to an iPad or galaxy but I should have just bit the bullet and spent a few more dollars. I had to return it with in 2 months because it wouldn't charge. It took weeks to get it back and 4 months later we had the same problem. It is JUNK! plain and simple. Engine29 is not a great seller to purchase from either. They are very hard to get ahold of.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad Tablet
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Branigan-Taylor
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with the tablet and the time that it took for me to receive it. I purchased it for my granddaughter for her birthday and I had plenty of time to download games on it for her.

Reviews.Title: Worthless
Reviews.Author: Martha McGough
Reviews.Content: I had it less than three months when the case melted while it charged.  I would not recommend it to anyone as the quality is sub par.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL FOR KIDS!
Reviews.Author: Taismine Beasley "ocd mom"
Reviews.Content: I HAVE A TEN YEAR OLD WHO LOVES THIS> IT IS PERFECT FOR SOMEONE WHO DOES NOT NEED ALL THE BIGGEST BRANDS WITH THEIR BIG BRAND PRICE> T>B> CORAL SPRINGS< FLORIDA

Reviews.Title: Power Cord Required...
Reviews.Author: M. Gibson
Reviews.Content: Battery life if really poor.  You only get an hour and a half, then you need to plug in a recharge.  Very disappointing!

Reviews.Title: Great for the kids
Reviews.Author: jvi
Reviews.Content: This product is great for my kids.  It does not play all games but plays most that a 5 year old would want to play.  Everything said it is a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: It Crashed
Reviews.Author: Jailyn Cabrera
Reviews.Content: It crashed do to an app, it wasn't backed-up like it said. I lost EVERYTHING! But otherwise.....its pretty good. I dont like how the wifi diconnects itself though

Reviews.Title: not bad for price
Reviews.Author: adam
Reviews.Content: Its a great learning tool and starter tablet for my son. We use it for his learning games and for abc mouse.

Reviews.Title: great for kids
Reviews.Author: josienj
Reviews.Content: This zeepad is the right size for my my six year ols. It was purchased as a birthday gift. A perfect escape from him always needing my phone to play games and read things on. Great Great investment.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Cressie Fraiser "Cressie Fraiser"
Reviews.Content: It is a nice Android for a teenager but I wanted a little bit more for my husband.A very nice pad.

Reviews.Title: just in time for christmas
Reviews.Author: lajune hallman
Reviews.Content: My 17 year old daughter loves the zeepad. Just as described and is perfect for games apps or internet surfing. Awesome buy for the price

Reviews.Title: It was great, while it lasted
Reviews.Author: J. Grunenberg
Reviews.Content: Synopsis: A cheap tablet, with all that entails.I was looking for a cheap tablet. I wasn't sure I'd like, or need a tablet and didn't want to spend a lot of money trying to find out.I purchased the Zeepad in January. It had ok reviews, and the price was good.The good:CheapWorked fine for the games installed.Worked with Google PlayWorked as a decent, but not great, e-reader.No problems with connecting to Wi-Fi or using the SD card.The bad:The charger was bad out of the box. (Luckily charged through the USB slot).It bricked just past 6 months. (It wasn't rooted, and only had a handful of apps installed.)Slow and would lag on internet.Took time to render pdf pages.Not much information on how to unbrick online.Would I get another one? No. Was I happy with it while it worked? Mostly. I was mainly using it as a reader and even though it would lag rendering pages, it worked for what I needed. It never lagged during any of the simple games (Fruit Ninja/Angry Birds), but would bog down on youtube and other internet things.I'm now looking to replace it with a first generation Nexus tablet, or something similar. If I can unbrick it, I'll put it into the hands of the kids, but if not I didn't spend a fortune on finding out that yep, I did want a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Ayanna Wickham
Reviews.Content: This is a cool tablet for my daughter. Very neat. Comes with all the features needed by a young child.

Reviews.Title: good buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 8 year old son and so far its been good for what he uses it for (games mostly) and its been durable surviving my other 3 sons as well! haha My 17 year old daughter liked it too and bought one for herself and so far no complaints from any of them!

Reviews.Title: affordable
Reviews.Author: Vw "tech geek"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter who  loves to read. We  didn't use it a lot in the beginning and that was a mistake because we didn't notice that it was defective. The ZEEPAD  wouldn't turn on. We made sure that it was charged but it just wouldn't turn on. I contacted the manufacturer and returned the item. We had to pay for the shipping because it was past the three month guarantee. They sent us a brand new one right away. This is a very safe investment for the price. I am addicted to Amazon because they have excellent customer service. Just be sure to check your pad right away to make sure it works.

Reviews.Title: Why did I buy a Zeepad?
Reviews.Author: On Time
Reviews.Content: If you want a tablet that you can actually do something on, don't buy something cheap. The zeepad is slow and it's annoying how badly it's reaction time is. It's a terrible product.

Reviews.Title: worth what I paid for it
Reviews.Author: Anita M. Reyes
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my 8 yr old. She loves it. Comes with a few games already. She has no trouble accessing all its features.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad Tablet
Reviews.Author: sherelyn johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband who has never used a computer of any kind.  He is in love with his tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: hg088
Reviews.Content: I think that for the price this is absolutely a bargain. You can't compare this with other pricier tabs but i works really well and you can  do most tasks these tabs do

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK!!! (Most helpful comment!)
Reviews.Author: J. Morgan
Reviews.Content: Within the first WEEK this thing stopped working. It gets stuck at the Android screen and refuses to boot. I checked everywhere online for a solution and there isn't one. Not to mention, this is a VERY common issue with this product! Search yourself!I went on Youtube where the guy was doing a Zeepad review, and I advised others to not buy this thing. And guess what? A few days afterward someone replied to me and told me it just happened to them.Thank god this was backed by Amazons return policy and happened within 30 days.I don't have any frets against the seller, everything was received and delivered quickly. The actual product is my only issue.

Reviews.Title: Simply excellent for its price!
Reviews.Author: edgarlbh
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, all features offered are included and working properly, in addition to a fair price. Thank you very much, for your services.

Reviews.Title: 2nd Zeepad purchase
Reviews.Author: bvande
Reviews.Content: This is my second Zeepad purchase.  I have 2 nephews (6 and 5) and bought them as birthday gifts for each.  They love to play games on them and my sister has put on parental controls.  It took a little while for her to figure the parental controls, but the boys love their Zeepads!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for the Price (especially for a newbie)
Reviews.Author: Laura "Music Lover"
Reviews.Content: I bought this without having much expectations for my 4 year old daughter. It was only $70 and most tablets are hundreds. However, it came quickly, in the pink color I asked for. When I first plugged it in to charge (it says to charge first), I was concerned that it wasn't charging properly because the icon didn't show the charging symbol for more than a second or so. However, it did charge and I've downloaded several apps and have been using it. It's the perfect size (to me) because it isnt so big that it is cumbersome and it isn't so small t hat it is annoying. My only complaint is that it doesn't hold a charge for too long (about 2 hours). So as long as you remember to charge it, you are fine. I imagine my daughter will physically break it if I don't get a case for it, but that isn't zeepads fault. I sort of want one myself. OH.....I got the single camera. It has one camera on the side where the screen is. If you want to take pictures and actually see the thing you are taking pictures of, you may want to get the dual camera.

Reviews.Title: Good bang for the buck.
Reviews.Author: DonÂ Tuleja
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a great little tablet. If it had more RAM it would be even better. Plays streaming HD video no trouble. Good value!

Reviews.Title: Terrible!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Beatrice
Reviews.Content: Very Slow, not a good buy. Wish I had spent more money on a better faster tablet. This tablet should definitely be taken off the market, pronto!

Reviews.Title: Good but broke easily, if for a child then make sure you get some sort of protection
Reviews.Author: Julie Moss
Reviews.Content: My sons  broke in the first week. Worked well until then. It was a birthday present too. Its a good item, just breaks easily

Reviews.Title: Hate It
Reviews.Author: Kortni Wiegreffe
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this item......had it a few days did fine, the next day it started freezing up. Then I went to put the screen protector on it that came with it. I was pressing down on the screen to get the air bubbles out and the screen cracked all the way across it. I sent back and got my full refund that I paid for tablet........ waist of time and money !

Reviews.Title: Just stopped working
Reviews.Author: Katherine Harder
Reviews.Content: Without trauma or exposure to moisture, it just wouldn't turn on today. Worthless product if the lifespan is only 6 months. I'm glad I didn't store anything important on it, or I would be livid.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Renee Wilson
Reviews.Content: lasted four months thats it slowly stopped charging then went to charge it and it wont turn on bought this for my daughters birthdaywhat a let down

Reviews.Title: It and miss
Reviews.Author: A. C. Pyle
Reviews.Content: I have bought 2 of these Zeepad tablets and 3 other off brand tablets since May. It seems they all either work great or not at all.  This review is specially for the Zeepads.  The first one worked so great (the best one of the 5) that within 2 weeks I bought a second one, the second one is horrible, screen is fuzzy, runs much slower than the first, most of all the wifi will not turn on at all.  When you slide wifi to "on" it automatically turns itself back to "off"  I have tried everything suggestion I can come up with:  try at McDonalds, reset router, clear cache, factory reset, the list goes on.

Reviews.Title: Is very slow, Discharge after half hour
Reviews.Author: Micoman "Micoman"
Reviews.Content: I charge all night, and in mornig I use half hour and discharge, I try charging again and .. work 20 minutes - 30 minutes and turn off. The screen is not very clear.

Reviews.Title: You will LOVE it,!  (HIDE IT!)
Reviews.Author: Raggmopp51
Reviews.Content: This is so great.....Very good to have...I have a Google tablet,but this is great...All my grand kids were down in June... I could do everything with this,especially watch the movies....Kept the Little ones quiet,and Papa also got to watch HIS TV!!! Well, they now  have gone back home...all but.My Oldest Grandson (14) is staying for 2 more weeks! he has been using the older table which I gave him, ,but he kept grabbing my Zeepad on me! .. He said "NANA,.I love the Graphics and how fast it looks up what I need!...My grandson came to me the other evening ,and said,"Nana, I really like this Zeepad,it is so much better !!! I love watching movies on it, and playing my games."..I knew what was coming!....Guess who has got  the ZEEPAD?...It is going back too Indiana!! I will have to buy another one!  PS...You got grandkids coming???, take my advice and HIDE it! So glad I bought it! "When my Grand kids are happy, I'M HAPPY!!! (They live 800 miles from us)  THANKS AMAZON!  very satisfied with my purchase,,,,you will be getting another order from me soon!

Reviews.Title: ZeePad - Junk
Reviews.Author: Badabing
Reviews.Content: Had hopes for this $70 tablet.  It came with a keyboard (Bluetooth not supported) as part of the folding case, along with 3 styluses.  I added 8 GB of memory. The tablet kept rebooting.  It would not download apps from the Playstore.  The Browser would start to open and then crash.  No GPS either. Totally useless piece of junk.  Sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Ive had this a few months now
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I like this little tablet. Ive had this a few months now and I must say i like it. I read my newspaper on the the subway to work . I read Kindle Books with the kindle app which is great. I also use Google play extensively. I also have the option of using Amazon Apps. Its extremly light the swipe keyboard which makes it fast and easy is availible on Google play. I started with a 2gb micro card but the  more GB you add the faster is moves and less lag time. It takes one minute to boot up.  The camerea is trash but its OK for Skype ....just OK. Hardly a sell or take away point. I dropped it once and its so easy to actually put back together as long as your pieces don't breakn  This was a great find, especilly if you are careless or a teen. I keep thinking I want to get a dedicated Kindle reader but I cant justify it this really takes care of my needs. The Red color makes it look young and sporty

Reviews.Title: Cute tablet for kids, but...
Reviews.Author: Christina Fisher-Williams
Reviews.Content: Cute tablet for kids but extremely delicate. Screen cracks very easily! This is the second Zeepad I've purchased in six months ( the first one was from Sears). Having difficulty contacting the seller to arrange to replace the screen at my cost.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad Tablet
Reviews.Author: Lil_Kitten7
Reviews.Content: This was ordered for my Granddaughter and it is very nice she said and works great ! She got the pink keyboard case to go with it and they work awesome together !

Reviews.Title: This thing is Great
Reviews.Author: tiffany
Reviews.Content: Perfect for what we wanted and it is great, in fact we are going to purchase two more. Get the ones with Android and you dont have to worry about Viruses, that is why we got it

Reviews.Title: Not all that was promised was there
Reviews.Author: Broderick
Reviews.Content: Items are not bad as far as the tablets, it's not a bad tablet. I have more of a beef with the seller due to items that were promised were not in the box I received. I'm missing stylus for both of my tablets and the promised screen protectors.Seller has to do better!

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: StanF
Reviews.Content: Excellent delivery time.  Very easy to set up to WIFI, simple to navigate & quite rapid on respond time for just the rather small RAM.  I haven't tried the cams yet tho as I very recently received it

Reviews.Title: Birthday present for 8 year old Girl
Reviews.Author: Sue-Anne Orozco
Reviews.Content: Very good gift... We purchased the Zeepad for our 8 year old daughters birthday back mid May of this year and she loves it... It's been an awesome starter tablet.. You can download just about anything from the android appstore and very easy to use... She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: Chad M. "Chad"
Reviews.Content: I wanted something inexpensive for my 5 year old, he is too advanced for the normal "kid" tablets, meaning he is used to navigating android phones and other tablets.  I have only had it 2 days but so far its exactly what i need.  His last one was a bit more expensive, and even with a screen protector and a big case, he broke it.  So far this tablet is better than that one, meaning faster and able to handle movies without having to change the file type etc...and if it breaks, its 1/3 of the cost of most other tablets, plus his favorite color is red so that added to the excitement.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Zuhair Baker
Reviews.Content: For a tablet that cost about $80 it is great slow but for your kids it is what you should get them they can play watch and it has all Android stuff.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my 4 year old
Reviews.Author: Bryan "hydrophoid"
Reviews.Content: No one is going to love working on this tablet, but at the price point I hope no one is expecting to work on this tablet (you could do some work with it but you would not like it).Overall this is a great tablet for the price. My wife and I debated getting our 4 year old a LeapPad for educational games, but I was able to win out by pointing out the cost of many Android games: free.The screen has a small viewing angle and the resolution isn't the best, my daughter loves playing the ABC and puzzle games we downloaded for her. I have not purchased any software for her, but the free games on Play are awesome. This thing even runs Candy Crush (just in case you were wondering :).I wish this didn't have a proprietary charging end on it (it has a USB port, but that is not for charging) but my other tablets also have proprietary charging ports so it seems to be standard for them to make a different port.The box was full of goodies: charging cable, usb adapter (so you can plug in full sized usb items to the tablet), a stylus, AND a screen protector. They really delivered on the packaging.This tablet is really a bargain for the price, it wont win any processor speed awards and it can hang at times but if you are in the same boat and looking for something to entertain your children during long drives or you want to use some type of electronic game/learning system this is priced to be in your top 5 list of purchase considerations. On the other hand, if you are an adult looking for something to surf the web/look for jobs/ do any type of professional work with, I would suggest a different more powerful (and likely expensive) tablet.Willie-B

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "JT"
Reviews.Content: This is great for my grandson with downs syndrome. He broke the glass and they even repaired it for $20.00

Reviews.Title: Teenage daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: MommaFoo
Reviews.Content: My daughter especially loves the front-facing camera and uses it to Skype with her friends.  Does the same and more as my Kindle.  She's had it a few weeks now and so far so good!

Reviews.Title: Was the quality of this item above or below your expectations
Reviews.Author: María Eusebia Díaz Guerrero
Reviews.Content: The product is brand is not offered in the notice, did not bring security, did not bring the manual or the bonus offered in the bid. All this calls into question its quality and durability.

Reviews.Title: Great Kids Tablet, Okay Quality, Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought four (yes, 4) of these for my kids for Christmas 2012. So they have been through more than six months of regular use. For $70 these are pretty good. They are definitely not iPads, Google Nexus, or Samsung Galaxies, but they are a good buy for your average 4 to 8 year olds. At this point, three of the four are still working and two of the four are working well. They work well for playing games, reading ebooks, watching movies, or taking silly (albeit low quality) pictures of oneself. They do all this just as well a Nexus.About two months ago one the tablets stopped charging, the battery still had a small charge (not enough to power up) and the charger was working. Something stopped working in the charging circuits on the motherboard. So that one is no longer usable.All but one of the chargers has stopped working, I think the wire or plug is too weak and broke, they worked if you wiggled the plug. Also the charging receptacle in the tablets is weak, one tablet's does not work anymore. And the USB port of another does not work. This has probably as much to do with the kids jamming and yanking on the cord, as anything.Fortunately, the USB connector does charge the tablet, so even without any of the chargers you can still use the tablets.The third tablet is very slow to react when tapping on the screen. This is most noticeable on the home screen, but also when playing games, though not as bad.Very odd, seems more of a software based problem than hardware.The fourth tablet, so far (knock on wood) is working fine no problems at all. Battery life has never been that great, two hours or so max. It hasn't diminished in six months so they are good quality, just not that big. Keep a smart phone charger on hand and they will last as long as you've got gas in the car.Overall, I am pleased with these tablet. Especially for younger kids, when you don't want to throw a lot of money down the drain (literally!) Trust me, I know, before they got these, my wife's Nexus, ended up in the toilet when two kids tried to grab it at the same time. Fortunately, it still works fine.We know they can take care of them now, so we will upgrade them one at a time, as they stop working. So far only one has had to be replaced. Pretty good as far as I'm concerned.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sultan Khan
Reviews.Content: Its kind of cool Android tablet for kids but lacks little bit of speed. I would say you get what you pay for ...I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: AllLOSER -- the screen was lifted from the bezel had to return it.
Reviews.Author: Christian Glahn
Reviews.Content: So far I've not been able to use an Allwinner tablet enough to like or hate it.  I'll wait to see if I EVER get the second unit that I returned and was supposed to come back to me.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping and great project
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ordered my Zeepad on a Friday and received it on Tuesday. The product was exactly what it said it would be. It was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: great 7" tablet
Reviews.Author: joant
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for our grandson who has aspergers. He is 7 and is into computers.  He was really excited when he received the tablet.  There was a learning curve since this was our first tablet.  I contacted the seller and they sent back an e-mail with their phone number.  They were very helpful.  It is amazing what this tablet can do. Setting up wifi was easy. I wound up buying 2 more.  This is a great value.

Reviews.Title: Grand kids
Reviews.Author: Grand kids
Reviews.Content: This was a good tablet for the money! I will purchase this company again. My Grandson lives it he takes it everywhere and it picks up as good as a lap top.

Reviews.Title: Great product for thevprice!
Reviews.Author: MTBillups
Reviews.Content: I ordered several of these for my children and I am very pleased with all of them.  Does just what was promised

Reviews.Title: My new best friend, lol!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: When it comes to this product I really love this product. Not only can I get online, as well as play games, it has also allowed me have all the capabilities I had wit my laptop but now I'm able to place my zeepad in my pursue. What I like/dislike about the zeepad is the programs they said comes on it doesn't, however, you can go to the Play Store and set the zeepad up to your heart contents. I also advise against the  suggestion when looking for a case with a keybroard. Having being one of people and the suggesstion was wrong, if one does purchase the zeeppad I  recommend you search for a keybroard case with micro attachment. Hope yours bring you as much joy as mine has.

Reviews.Title: Has a mind of it's own
Reviews.Author: chelene
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my fiancé so that we could skype, but it wouldn't hang up and the sound was horrible. It also took forever to download anything. We had to do factory resets a lot.

Reviews.Title: Question
Reviews.Author: Cj
Reviews.Content: Is this tablet just for kids I'm 21 and want one but I don't want one for a kid will somebody please let me know?

Reviews.Title: Not Worth The Money
Reviews.Author: Utah Diva
Reviews.Content: Between my sister & I we bought 6 of these tablets for our kids for christmas, 6 months later all of them have broke 1 way or another.Two of them the power button pushed in & never popped back out after only a couple of months, which made it difficult to play on the tablet, they had to plug it into a wall to have it light up to swipe it open to play on it, then after a week or so of that, that seemed to stop working & the tablet became worthless.Another 1 got dropped from the arm of a couch to the carpet, that foot & a half drop cracked the screen & broke for good, 2 other ones also got cracked screens easier than should of, by little things like one was laying on the floor & my 12 year old stepped by it, the only thing that touched the tablet was his big toe, that alone cracked the screen & the tablet was useless, so out of the 6 we bought we're down to only 1 more that still works, I wonder how long it will last.We also have Nooks & I have a samsung galaxy, my tablet has been dropped, sat on, etc & is still in perfect conditionDon't buy these tablets if you want them to last loger than 2 months . . .  Oh & Did I mention all the tablets had to be set back to factory settings atleast once because they stopped doing anything

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: San-Alva "Always go with the best- investigat...
Reviews.Content: Tablet works great. Not really a lot to say. Apps run seamlessly and little to no hiccups. Google Play compatibility is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Ok for kids
Reviews.Author: Ochoa
Reviews.Content: This tablet is good a little slow but for the kids it's perfect. Can't expect better for that price,even though I bought 3 and had to return 2 already 1 because it was used and the other because it stop working 20 days after receiving it.

Reviews.Title: amazing tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet as a gift, and I was so excited! This is a great tablet and really fun to use! The only thing I didn't like about it was two things.1. the battery runs out to fast2. two apps of mine don't work no matter whatOther than these reasons I like this tablet a lot and I think that anyone would like it too!

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY. You WILL regret it.
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: Had the item for a little over 5 months and now it does not work.  I saw the negative reviews but like an idiot, I figured it wouldnt happen to me.  NONE of my apps work (even then the ones i paid for).  The color is crap.  Dont sit in the light while using it because all you will get is a glare on the screen.  I got this for my son who loves temple run, even he didnt want to play it.  You get what you pay for.  Never again.  A very poor investment.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Patricia Sarju
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift for someone. The specs indicated that this had a front and back camera...even the pictures show this. Delivery time was good....but product has only ONE Camera (on the screen section ) and not back and front as advertised. As to how it works....can't say as yet. I will have to wait for a feed back re that.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Rosetta Anderson "Rosetta Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I bought the zeepad for my grand-daughter who is 6 years old.  She loves it.  It locked up one time and I couldn't get it to turn off or anything.  My husband finally held down the power button until it turned off.  Overall, its a great product.  The downside is it takes a long time to charge up, but she usually does it overnight anyway.  You can download lots of games on it.  She has downloaded temple run I & II.  I am happy with this purchase.  My brother had bought her the meep pad and it didn't last 4 months.

Reviews.Title: love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Forquetta Cooper
Reviews.Content: We got it for my son he loves his tablet he never put it down yet . And for my comment before disregard it. My son love playing the free games from the Android market and it's very kid friendly. Very happy mom.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Kimica Reynolds
Reviews.Content: This product does exactly what it says. I bought it for my mom who isnt tech savy. She really enjoys it. This product is great for a person who is just getting started. Dont expect it to be like the i pad. Its also a great start for a child. Its great price wise also. Overrall its great.

Reviews.Title: I Like it
Reviews.Author: Marishka More
Reviews.Content: I like it but sometimes stops when using it. For the rest it works all right. I am satisfied with my purchase. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jetonz
Reviews.Content: To Lagy freezes to much waste of money the display is horrible also the gets scratch so easy.........................................fgjoffidiztyssdyufcxxxggfccghj bugged chick. Cugfigffyictghcgjufguxhxghvjhcyvn b vcv

Reviews.Title: zeepad warranty is no good.
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: I purchased two zeepads for my grandkids for christmas. They both died. Amazon would not return them because it was after the 30 day warranty. It was a waste of money. No one can fix them. I just wanted them to send a new One out or find somewhere to get them working. The little android man just fell over. Never worked again.

Reviews.Title: For the price not bad
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my grandmother. She wanted to learn to use a tablet. For the size and price this little unit is not bad. The android platform it has is basic and easy to use. I can download just about anything I have on my phone or ipad and the resolution is decent too. Though my grandmother is still learning how to use it. It is a great little tablet for apps, games, travelling and connecting to the internet.

Reviews.Title: Slow piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Bigt
Reviews.Content: This item is a waste of money, i purchased this tablet as a strater for my wife.  She has only used it to read books on.  The thing takes forever to turn on and up to five minutes to load a simple book over a high speed cable wifi.  SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!  If I could return this i most definitly would.  Buy a Kindle or name brand first!!!!

Reviews.Title: broken tablet re received
Reviews.Author: judy blair
Reviews.Content: i bought,this tablet never opened for at least a month and a half.  i was in hospital goi ng thru breast cancer.  i left it in the box  when i opened this item to my surprise the screen was broken in several places and their was no on  & off button. they refuse to make it good will not replace this item. nor a refund. i am out 76.95.i wish  now i had never bought this item.  i will never buy from the company called GOODIOS. i do not recommend any item from them.  there is a company called usa wholesale with basicly same tablet for 69.00 and stands goof on their policy, this had really upset me i will be more careful with companies that do not honor their refund policy for damaged unusable products. i am out 76.95 and a broken tablet.  that doesn't seem fair to me...........thanks, judy blair

Reviews.Title: Product not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Brenda E. Fulton
Reviews.Content: Worked for one day. The manual sucks. Can't return item. The website for Zeepad is in Chinese..........Do not buy this product!

Reviews.Title: my daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my daughters kintergarden graduation and I am very impressed with it. Its very kid friendly but I love using it too.......and it arrived 5 days before they said it would......would definitely recommend this tablet to anyone else...

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter for her birthday which she was turning 8. She loves it so much . Not only does she play with but basically the whole family does nice job .

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: Michelle Dill
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 13 year old daughter and it came with a charger and a stylus plus a film protector for the screen. It works great if you have WiFi. My daughter says it's slow which it isn't she just has no patience to wait on it.

Reviews.Title: good one
Reviews.Author: Lewanda
Reviews.Content: the chager itself dont work but it nice  i like its everything that i need for a growing preteen.now i need rubber casting.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Sonia
Reviews.Content: Love this item I had bought one before from a different seller and i bought this one and it is so much better newer works better and this one also brought all the accessories with it and the other ones didn't earphones, pen for screen and a extra screen protector will absolutely buy from them again

Reviews.Title: Love the product
Reviews.Author: Kristina Downing
Reviews.Content: Works like a dream awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!! Will use this product for many years to come. Same quality as IPAD but better price and cheaper apps.

Reviews.Title: I received other brand
Reviews.Author: Alberto Zapata
Reviews.Content: don't was Zeepad, was other brand and that annoyed me a lot, because i wanted a Zeepad and I received other brand bad

Reviews.Title: it's a great tablet and also, it has a very good price.
Reviews.Author: Laura Smith
Reviews.Content: I really love this tablet youtube is good, google play nearly perfect [downloads games great] and it shipped really fast. the screen is clear, setup is great. overall this is a great tablet. I got it for my 11th birthday!

Reviews.Title: this would have been a good product
Reviews.Author: Lunari Grimm
Reviews.Content: if the battery actually worked. then again i'm not even sure what i had received from PCTVSHOP was an actual zeepad considering there was no indication on the tablet or box that it was. It seemed that either there was no battery in the item or it might not have even been connected. when i sent my first request for a replacement of the faulty and questionable device i got no response from PCTVSHOP so i sent in a second and finally an A to Z claim with amazon. i then received a rude note from PCTVSHOP saying that i complained to easily and killed sellers. i finally returned it through amazon and got my money back. i gave the zeepad a 3-star because i don't know if i can honestly review it all things considered. i do give PCTVSHOP a big fat F though all around the board. don't buy from them. i'm extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: nataliesmall
Reviews.Content: we bought this tablet for our 8 year old daughters birthday she had been wanting one for a while now since she got addicted to my kindle fire but we did not want to spend a lot of money for her age. We got the tablet in just a few days and came in good condition and with all the accessories. it is a little slow at time but works just fine for her connects to wi fi and really like that it has the play store so we are able to download a lot of FREE apps for her and i can also sync my kindle to her tablet and she can read the books that i have on her tablets as well. The one thing i do reccomend is getting screen protectors right away for the tablet.and the last issue that i seem to be having is after about a few weeks of having the tablet for some reason the word DEMO is now shoing on the screen in the left hand corner and i dont know how to get it off i have tried re setting the tablet in hopes that it would come off but no luck so far so if anyone has any suggestions on what i could try it would be greatly appreciated.I would definately recommend buying this for someone especially if you have a child wanting one for the first time. I know i will be planning on buying more in the near future seeing as i have 3 more daughters that are also now beeging for one!!!!

Reviews.Title: worked less than average till it broke
Reviews.Author: nemo
Reviews.Content: had it for about 4 months. Was slow and unresponsive at times and especially when it was nearing its end. Now it won't turn on no matter how long I wait for the screen to load, which on average took about 5 seconds after you hit the button to show the slide to unlock screen (not from startup.) In my opinion, not worth the money. Would rather have bought a 2nd generation ipod (and I hate apple products) that I know would hold up for a while. If u need something temporary to hold you and you have a lot of patience with technology, then this tablet will work for you. I had the patience but I was expecting something to last me for at least a year not 4 months.but the sellers were great. would buy from them again, just not this particular product.

Reviews.Title: scam
Reviews.Author: jill
Reviews.Content: They tell you it's a zeepad, but when I've received my tablet it was no zeepad at all !! and also used. It was a lousy android tablet with no brand name. And worst of all, it's stopped working within 1 month. BAD COMPANY! SCAMMER!I've bought my tablet from this company on 7 march 2013, now the have changed the picture of the tablet for you to fall in, DONT BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: Not worth a crap!
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for my son to free up my iPad. My son did not even have this a week before the screen was broke (and I had it in a case). The quality really sucks and I DO NOT recommend this product to anyone else. And you still have to pay a fee to get it fixed.

Reviews.Title: WASTE OF MONEY
Reviews.Author: myersmemories
Reviews.Content: I GOT TWO AND BOTH WERE RETURNED DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS ITEM. SPEND THE MONEY ON SOMETHING BETTER

Reviews.Title: What a great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Laurie Burke "Larke333"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 9th birthday and he loves it!  He had asked for a Kindle HD but I couldn't see spending that kind of money for him to just play games on.  I found this and read the reviews and decided to take a chance and I'm glad I did.  I may even buy one for myself now!  He seems to have figured it out pretty easily and he loves that its preloaded with Angry Birds and Fruit Ninja.  Take a chance, it's worth the money!

Reviews.Title: No thank you.
Reviews.Author: Meagan Fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews before buying this tablet.  I expected to get what I paid for.  What I got was less then 1 month of usage before it just wouldn't work at all.  It was a gift for my son and since I ordered it ahead of time, the return date was his actual birthday.  I was hesitant to buy electronics on amazon and now I have learned my lesson.  :(

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: JoAnna I Nishimura
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 9yr old son because he was constantly using my phone to go on the internet. The product has held up to the constant usage and great for netflix and games for a child his age. Only down fall is the speed, but Im not to worried about that because other than that it works great for media and social purposes. The price is great for the product

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Not at all happy with the product.  I tried to call customer service and all I got was an answering machine.  It has been on charge for 2 hours and still does not work!!

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Meg C.
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this for my daughters birthday (7) knowing nothing about tablets and was really pleasntly surprised. I didn't give it to her yet because her birthday is still a little ways away but I have been playing with it, setting up the apps she likes moving the things she will play the most to the home screen, things like that, and its very easy to use and manuver. The size is going to be perfect for her and the price you cant beat. Its not an ipad so dont expct perfection, but if u have a tech savy kid and are tired of the old " its my turn on moms phone!" between siblings then this is for you! My only complaint is I have yet to figure out the parentel controls but close monitoring should be a close second to blocking. And I also wanna give it up to Goodios for prompt delivery and a courtesy email asking how I liked my product so far. I feel if you wanna buy this tablet, this would be the company to buy from.

Reviews.Title: I did not receive ** Bonus: Earphones, Stylus,Screen Protector
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: I just got the tab in teh mail yesterday and have yet to figure out how good it is, but I am disappointed that i did not receive the ** Bonus: Earphones, Stylus,Screen Protector that was promised.Will update ASAP

Reviews.Title: Inferior Screen quality but the price isn't that high
Reviews.Author: Himanshu Anand
Reviews.Content: i got a device with a faulty screen and I returned it but irrespective of that the device was inferior in quality in its screen and speed as well. I tried installing the groupon app on it multiple times but it just won't work. The touch sensitivity wasn't great too. It is a cheap device but I decided to pay more and get kindle fire HD after working with this for couple of hours.

Reviews.Title: 57donn
Reviews.Author: Donn "Donn"
Reviews.Content: This item was just right for the person it was ordered for, I ordered it for my 13 yr. old granddaughter and she loved it.

Reviews.Title: Meets Expectations
Reviews.Author: Mirna
Reviews.Content: Its good for downloading apps, but the reason i give it 4 stars is because sometimes it just freezes. Its an okay product

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Lana Lee
Reviews.Content: Is does all the things it said it could do.  It had enough 4 GB capacity to do just about anything.  Love the portability of the Zeepad, screen size, Skype capabilities and Netflix movies.  Would be a great gift for a teen in high school or for anything that you can imagines.

Reviews.Title: Only lasted less than a month
Reviews.Author: ldb3
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift for my 7 year old daughter. It was a good tablet for a 7 year old. Able to download apps, upload her favorite music, watch her cartoons. Till one day the screen just popped off and once I snapped it back on it just wouldn't turn back on. Returned it back to Amazon, no exchange just refund. Ordered another one and again the screen popped off and snapped it back on and would't turn back on. Returning the second one today. Will pay a little extra and get a Kindle Fire. When it works I would give it Four and half stars, but poorly made product.

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: S. Edmundson
Reviews.Content: It is a great size, made well. But the android system locks up quite a bit. The touchscreen freezes at times. But I suppose for the cost, it's good.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: ryan alton
Reviews.Content: i bought the zeepad for my daughter for her 6th birthday and she loves it! the touch screen is great however there is a delay sometimes but nothing that seems like a big deal. The company that shipped it was right on time. All in all its a terrific gift.

Reviews.Title: slow  to touchy w/ stylist too  short battery life  when strowing it enlarges way to easy  maybe 10yrs will like it
Reviews.Author: nadeen j puczylowski
Reviews.Content: it's a nice pink.  the stylist needs a home  it was for fun but to much time to get anywhere

Reviews.Title: Can't complain for the price
Reviews.Author: S. Atwood
Reviews.Content: It's a cheap tablet so for the price it is good.The things I didn't like was that the volume is very weak, and it is very slow with loading. also sometimes i thought the screen wasn't sensitive enough and i had to push harder...which often messed up my typing. Also I often could not load movies.Otherwise I think it's a pretty ok tablet

Reviews.Title: really like this
Reviews.Author: Tiffany M.
Reviews.Content: I really Like the Zeepad. It works really well for me so far. oniy gripe I have is the battery life wish it stayed on longer through out the day. also brought a case with a keyboard so I use it to type reports and take notes in class. Good product overall.

Reviews.Title: fraud
Reviews.Author: wade
Reviews.Content: This item arrived on time and has everything as listed except the post stated it was 7" it very far from that size was very disappointed in that cause i was expecting 7 inches tablet!!!

Reviews.Title: Where Do I Start
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: When my pavkage arrive the screen wasn't all the way close. The 2 charges that was sent would not charge my son tablet. I tried contacting the seller twice no responds. The tablet would not come on had to open the tablet to find out everything was taped down and the tape on the video card was loose.  The reason why my son's tablet wouldn't come on. If I could do it over I would just go to HHGreg or somewhere and get what I paid for

Reviews.Title: THE TABLET HAVE A LOCK CODE DAT WANT RESET I TRIED EVERYTHIN
Reviews.Author: tracy
Reviews.Content: I FEEL LYKE DIS IS A RIPOFF I BOUGHT DIS FOR A GIFT AND HAVNT USED IT BT ONCE ITS NT WORTH MY MONEY

Reviews.Title: Two out of Three broke in less than Three Months and NO support
Reviews.Author: Russell E. Holland Jr
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for my kids for Christmas - seemed like a cheap alternative to see if they would like this type of thing.They worked great at first, but within a week one charger burned out, then another so they were sharing the third charger or using the alternate usb charging.Then 2 of the 3 stopped taking a charge all together.  Terrible construction on this product.And the service was worse - they first offered to sell me 2 new chargers at the same price I could just order them from amazon and then offered to fix the pads IF I paid for the fix because it was past 30 days - shortest warrantee I ever heard of...Do yourself a favor and splurge for the ASUS or Nexus right out of the gate.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I wanted something for my grand daughter that she would enjoy it is being return it only stays on for a maxium of 45 min even fully charged..

Reviews.Title: Volume sucked!
Reviews.Author: gaox
Reviews.Content: 5 DAY UPDATE! : I've been trying to return this piece of crap since the second day I received it because the volume is not cooperating with me, but no response from the seller. >:( Getting REALLY frustrated, and I have it just sitting in its box now! I just filed another return request, and if nothing happens again and it surpasses the 14 day policy, I'm FILING A CLAIM!Just received my pink Zeepad today. Really disappointed because the volume SUCKS! I have it at its highest and can barely hear. It sounds terrific with headphones on, but I don't wanna use headphones every time I watch Netflix or listen to music. Other than the volume issue, everything seems to be working fine. Camera quality is pretty bad, but I've seen worse.

Reviews.Title: Dont spend your money
Reviews.Author: Daniel D. Saiz
Reviews.Content: It did get here very quick, I bought it for a class I was taking. It worked very well for what I needed it for, looking up homework on dropbox. I bought it in January, now in May it stopped working, the on-off button broke and fell into the tablet. Now i'm having to send it back, and pay for the repair myself. It was great for a while, but I really should have spent the $30 more and bought another one.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase, doesn't work straight out of box!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Andy'sMommy"
Reviews.Content: I wish I could give no stars!!  I charged as it says in the instructions and the item will not come on for more than a second!  Junk!  I am so mad because I bought accessories for this.  I can return this item, but how will I get those returned..hope they work on another 7inch tablet that will be better than this crap!  ugh!!  :(  I wish I had listened the negative reviews instead of all the stupid positive ones cause this things is pure crap!  It doesn't even have a smart charger that will shut off if you over charge and the instructions are weird and confusing and the stupid thing can't even be charged unless it is totally out of charge..too much to do for a kid to use this.  I guess I am glad it is broken now so I can return it rather than a month or so down the road when I wouldn't be able to!  :(

Reviews.Title: Good first tablet
Reviews.Author: Ryan Harris
Reviews.Content: Everything worked great on the tablet but the mic, i ordered two one from a different seller and this one. The pink one i ordered for my daughter's birthday worked great. The main reason of purchase was to skype with her. Given this ones mic did not work or at least it did not on skype, i sent it back. prior to, I checked all the settings and could not locate anything that would cause interference from the tablet and the program. The two tablets were suppose to be the same as well, but seemed the pink one had a different/newer desk top, even though they were both listed as the same product with the same system.

Reviews.Title: CHEAP JUNK - NOT A HAPPY CAMPER
Reviews.Author: Babsy 314
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet 4/9/13 and received it in early May.  It did not arrive in a timely manner in my opinion. The tablet that I received (I ordered two) loaded the wi-fi easily enough but the charger cord did not work after three charges and usb port did not work after the second plug in.  Yes, I opened it and saw that the port wasn't connected.  Then the tablet no longer accessed the wi-fi so I could not connect to the internet.  Because both tablets have been used and neither one works, I am stuck paying over $150.00 for items that do not work.  I have a few items that require a usb plug in and haven't had a problem at all with them. Maybe I got a lemon but either way, I will not order electronics from Amazon any more because the return policy is to restricted.

Reviews.Title: its not worth it at all
Reviews.Author: Yecenia
Reviews.Content: i just got my tablet on time and everything was fine but now its not working after 1 month of using it '-'

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for These zeepads are junk
Reviews.Author: Big Boy
Reviews.Content: I purchased 5 of these for my girls within a week 3 of them had technical problemsIf you can afford better go ahead and buy better

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Linda Samplawski "OzarkRoze"
Reviews.Content: I bought two for my daughter and myself.  Mine quit working the second day I used it.  Wasn't happy at all.

Reviews.Title: DO I NEED ONE?
Reviews.Author: Nyah W.
Reviews.Content: DO I need to buy an SD for the "Zeepad Tablet" or do I need to buy one by itself? The "Zeeped Table" is great I play on my cousins. LOVED IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: yes we love our red zeepad
Reviews.Author: tamara
Reviews.Content: Yes it  works great my kids play with it everyday and just love it. The apps that r already o it are great

Reviews.Title: Camera inop
Reviews.Author: Alexis Pointer
Reviews.Content: Shortly after purchase, my daughter found that she was unable to utilize the camera to take pictures or record video.  Otherwise descent tablet for the money.

Reviews.Title: ashley
Reviews.Author: ashley
Reviews.Content: this item is really great for all ages just be sure to not put in the wrong password too many times

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: judi b
Reviews.Content: this is not worth the money.  won't hold a charge... wont charge 100% only 96%.  so not happy  do not buy this product!

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: nikkih
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my seven year old son for his birthday. I did not want to put a lot of money in it being I was afraid that he will drop it. After reading reviews after reviews I bought it. This is perfect for him. I have not had any problems with it freezing up. While he has an account for g.c. to buy games there are plenty of free games and books.  The stylus has already torn. It has a rubber bottom that is used on the screen and it has come apart. No big deal use your fingers. There are no set parental controls on it, but my husband went on google and manually set controls for graphic material. So you can set controls it just takes a bit to do. THe battery isn't as long as an Ipad or other high end tablets, but that is a positive in my book. It usually last a good hr to hour and half of active use.  Overall I believe this is a good buy for a kid to have a tablet. If he breaks it I feel like I don't have a ton of money in it.

Reviews.Title: Both were defective
Reviews.Author: Mary Lewis-Chacon
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these pads hoping to get a good one.  Both were defective and the seller who took the money 2 months before they sent the product would not even answer my e-mail.  All I wanted was to have this fixed.  I would recommend only buying products sold by Amazon.  The customer service they give is eccellent.  I now watch who is selling the product.  I will never buy from bestinternational agian.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Brought this for my daughter....she loves it. She dropped it really good once..I snapped it back together and it still works. Great for a kids; Angry Birds,Temple Run, all those work. Buy this for ya kids.

Reviews.Title: Little detail
Reviews.Author: Eduardo
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablets a few months ago, the carrier company had some troubles transporting my package (to Venezuela) and I've recieved it 2 weeks ago. I'm very glad with 2 of the 3 tablets, very usefull, fast and elegant, but one of those came with a problem in the charger output, I have to push a bit left the charger or it will not charge the tablet, i though it could be some crashes in the travel. I recomend this product 100%

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Tablet
Reviews.Author: Keith Johnson "Livon"
Reviews.Content: This item was a gift to my mother she always wanted a small tablet to work with by doing her daily task to keep up with todays world of smart techs. So you know how it is with the older people to learn these computer gadgets.

Reviews.Title: horrible!!!!
Reviews.Author: maria marion
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter, everything was in Arabic, and I couldn’t find any setting in English,When I tried messing with it, it kept turning off and on .  I called the store but nobody Answered

Reviews.Title: Zee Pad
Reviews.Author: kelly mancini
Reviews.Content: Great tablet, awesome for young kids! Second zee pad I have bought, I suggest getting the gel skin cover though to protect it from dropping by the kids.

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift
Reviews.Author: melinda trosper
Reviews.Content: I bought this zeepad for my 7 year old granddaughters birthday. She LOVES it. I love that she LOVES it. It does everything she wants it to do.I am very pleased with this zeepad. No regrets, and certainly not any disappointments.

Reviews.Title: purchaced 3 not 1 works!
Reviews.Author: Jeana Simon
Reviews.Content: purchaced 3 of these for my children. 1 won't connect to the internet, 1 of the screens is broken (view) and the other takes about 5 minute just to get to one site.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made
Reviews.Author: C. Carter
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 year old grand daughter and she LOVES it. I just didn't like how it distorts the screen when pressing on the back of it. It was cheaply made. Luckily, I purchased a case for it so that provides protection to the back and prevents my grand daughter from having issues with it. I give it a 4 star rating because it runs the OS extremely well and it runs the top apps also. Overall I think I made the right choice purchasing this for my grand daughter. She uses the Kindle and Netflix apps with not problems.

Reviews.Title: People claim reviews are fake which scared me, but I've given the time after receiving the product and have no complaints!
Reviews.Author: B. Mortinson
Reviews.Content: I ordered quickly after seeing high reviews. There was a delay with it being sent, and after closer overlook of reviews I found some pretty bad ones. I was fearful, so I took a couple weeks to be sure all was well. The product arrived within the time allotted. Weve had no problems with a power button, or battery problem, charging, nothing. It is a great product! Especially for the price!!!! Thanks!***UPDATE almost 6 mo later** A couple months ago the product stopped charging. Ive seen others on here also complaining of problems with the charging port but figured Id figure something out or it was cheap enough to just buy my daughter a higher quality tablet in the future. What I believe to be the problem it on the charger the metal piece is wobbly. Its loose and it makes sense because ive read of others piece getting stuck within the port. Ours hasnt. I hope to get some sort of response or help because were trying to find a charger for it and I have no idea what to do. I understand this product is low cost and it is a quality product for the price but if the chargers arent working and keep being loose we cant use the product. *****

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Wardell Willis
Reviews.Content: I love it and also my granddaughter.  It was a replacement for a Christmas gift which was dropped and destroyed.  She love it.  Will order another.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Randy Countryman
Reviews.Content: I love the color of it. It was a gift for my daughters birthday. She enjoys it. It's kind of slow, but does what she wants.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Mama Cayenne "Marie"
Reviews.Content: Great price, really gets a lot of use.  Easy to use no problems.  Will probably order another one for my 8 yr old.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Cati Holker
Reviews.Content: Wow, I wish I would have taken the bad reviews on this product more seriously.It took a LONG time for the product to come.  Shipment tracking was poor and non-specific.When I finally received the tablet, I was relieved (I was beginning to think I had been ripped off), and overall, I was happy with the tablet.Not ONE MONTH later, the power button became depressed/lodged and now my tablet is rendered useless. The tablet charges and the screen is active, but I cannot turn it on.  I contacted the company and have received no answer.This company is based in China, so correspondence can be difficult due to the language barrier.  This isn't a deal-breaker on it's own for me, in addition to everything else, it's just a tad bit frustrating.$80 wasted.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Arnold Keith Thurston "Keith"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift. The feedback has been positive.  It was compared to a large version of a phone.  Only complaint was a little slow at times.

Reviews.Title: no so bad
Reviews.Author: Gabriel
Reviews.Content: sometimes it freezes, and the scrren does not work, you press and press and stay like nohing happens, i purchased it for a little girl,,,,  so she is not going to use it that often... so, it is ok for her

Reviews.Title: Mine came defective/damaged can't get through to amazon cs.
Reviews.Author: yeahaboutthat
Reviews.Content: The 2 stars is for this product's performance, not amazon's poor customer service of course. (Just wanted to say that before anyone jumps down my throat) Bought for my mom, who has cancer and lives with me. I handled it mostly to help her set it up and we noticed problems right off the bat. We weren't expecting anything fancy, but to work and be able to get some use out of it would have been appropriate for the price paid I think. We charged it to full first thing, set it up a little bit, turned it off with the charge at 74 percent and turned it back on 30 minutes later to discover the battery had completely drained. To our disappointment, it does that every time. The touch screen is unresponsive at times especially in certain areas, you have to press really hard and sometimes even then it does not respond. There are specks in the back of the lcd screen, enough to be bothersome when using. My mom is too polite to want to return it when I mentioned it she said no, she already threw out the box it came in anyways and said it'll be alright and she feels bad. At first it was extremely slow to charge, taking hours to just get even halfway, and sometimes after it has been charged all the way and she disconnects the charger the full charge goes right back down to only a barely charged within seconds without doing anything. I have been trying to contact amazon's customer service, I remember years ago they had the best customer service if ever there was a problem, now I can't even get ahold of them. I don't have a phone with minutes right now but have been trying to submit their online forms and have been getting a "We're sorry. There was an error trying to send your e-mail. Please try again in a few minutes or contact us by phone." Message. I have been trying several times a day everyday, it doesn't look like they are fixing the form problem. I have scoured the internet for their customer service address but it seems like all of them have been disabled. Extremely disappointed with this product and with amazon's customer service, they lost a long time customer. Again, rating I gave strictly for product performance only, just had to throw in my problems with customer service in this experience to maybe save someone else the trouble.

Reviews.Title: This product is pretty awesome
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I love that the pc devices are becoming so small and we still can do so much with them. Looking forward to seeing what technology will come up with next.

Reviews.Title: 7yr old daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: Natasha S.
Reviews.Content: Tablet is being used by my daughter. She loves it, great size for a child. We added a microSD card and downloaded about 15 games from the Google Play store. User manual is pretty thin but if you are familiar with android operating systems you can figure it out. Probably not great for heavy usage as it can lag but like I said, great for a kid.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: denise harris
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my seven year old. she enjoys it. still figuring out the capabilities and functions. its okay.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jo Ann Holliman
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for my grandchild.  It was in excellent condition upon arrival, it arrived in a timely manner, and it made my grandchild very happy.

Reviews.Title: great tablet but....
Reviews.Author: Edie Lyons
Reviews.Content: The charge cord broke within a week. So I have to use my daughters charger. Cord needs to be longer

Reviews.Title: A now happy customer
Reviews.Author: Omiyika
Reviews.Content: I was just not what I need.  A great product. But the customer service  is what was great.  It is great to know that when I order something on line and something goes wrong the company will take care of it.  And that is what happen.  The customer service department went that extra mile to make sure that I walked away a happy customer.  Something that is hard to fine these days. Thank you DracoTek for being that one company that values their costumers and a special thank you to Sissi for you  help on my behave.

Reviews.Title: great value tablet
Reviews.Author: B. Ward
Reviews.Content: This tablet is easy to use.  Does what it is made for as being a tablet.  Connected easily to our wi-fi.  My 5 year old is able to use it and plays games easily on it.  quick to get on the internet for quick look ups or long browsing sessions.If you want a tablet that is a good price, lightweight, and connects to the internet with good ease, this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Too Small
Reviews.Author: Gail Potts
Reviews.Content: Too small for me to read.  I guess I'm too old ! I'll stay with my PC for now!!!  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Poor quality product; terrible purchase.

Reviews.Content: This item no longer works at all. I should have given it the minimum rating. A total waste of money.

Reviews.Title: good service

Reviews.Content: i like the product and service i got from this seller. the product works good with little problem and i think the product is a good product and i would rate this product as a good product

Reviews.Title: I love it!

Reviews.Content: I ordered this a few days ago and it got it in a short time.. I love it, and its a nice little tablet.. I wanted to have one for myself, and I got the hand of it in no time. Since i am a Apple product user, I thought it might be hard to learn Android, but it's a peace of cake.. I gave it five stars because, It came fast and it's really good... :)

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13......
Reviews.Author: CHARLES WILLIAMS
Reviews.Content: I am in the Middle East at the moment, the kids said they love them and asks that I should some for their friends, it helps to keep them busy and explore new things as well.They loved to have that, they are happy and am okay with it.

Reviews.Title: Does the job nicely.
Reviews.Author: Danger
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter.  Seems to work well and is cheaper than an ipod touch.There are plenty of apps and it seems to work well, other than the battery life is about 3-4 hours.It's screen is lower resolution than the iphone 5 or ipad 3,  but it's perfectly fine for her usage.  I don't want her on the internet or doing e-mail or facebook yet!*** Update,  after not using the device for a week and attempting to boot the device,  it never got past the post screen.  I even tried entering Android diagnostic mode and couldn't get it going.  So I've returned it to the manufacturer for a refund.  I guess you get what you pay for and the fact that nexus 7 and galaxy tab 2's are only $50 more these days,  I was taught a lesson in not skimping on the kids ;-)

Reviews.Title: Great product for kids
Reviews.Author: Happy customer
Reviews.Content: The zeepad tablet works great, my kids love it, they enjoy playing angry birds and other preloaded games.I can check my email, facebook and use skype to talk to my mom. It really works great.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Tubbs
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my 11yr son who loves "screens", and as a trial for owning this type of electronic. If he took care of this, we would move up to something like an iPad.  I decided to play with it first and perhaps add a few apps and music.  All went well until I got hooked on playing Angry Bird.  During my many nights of playing Angry Bird, the screen began to freeze.  I had to hit the power button once to turn it off (but not shut down) and then back on again in order to continue my game.  I certainly decided to NOT buy this for myself, but he seemed to enjoy it and worked around that problem.  He even watched Netflix movies and YouTube videos on it.  I'm not sure it he still had problems with it freezing.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Sherell Hill
Reviews.Content: Very great buy! I had an issue with it and sent it back to the manufacturer. They sent a new one back and its been awesome since then. I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: 7" zeepad
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: it works but is a bit slow .....roku is a better buy thans this,UNLESS you want it to be portable

Reviews.Title: Happy with this product!
Reviews.Author: T. Hill
Reviews.Content: Received this tablet on time. It is responsive and easy to use. I would recommend it if you are seeking an inexpensive tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Pamala W. Gambrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my tech savvy 3 year old nephew. He LOVE it! When he has this Zeepad in his hands, he doesn't tear up the house.

Reviews.Title: worst tablet ever.
Reviews.Author: Jmerc
Reviews.Content: I don't get the persons who gave these tablets high reviews because they stink.  I understand for the money you get what you pay for but man these turned out bad.  First off the power supply broke all on it's own then the port became loose and you had to hold the cord on a angle for it charge. The screens scratched easily and one even cracked. They would freeze up and you had to reset it and the battery didn't last long at all. My cell phone worked better than this product. So save yourself the trouble and don't waste both your time and money! Your better off spending some money and getting  a good brand tablet. As always "you get what you pay for!"

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dina J Green
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a xmas gift for my grandson and according to my daughter it is awesome! Its even better than the one she at a different story and different maker for my oldest granddaughter. Now my granddaughter wants the same exact one!

Reviews.Title: Make a different purchase
Reviews.Author: meshop2
Reviews.Content: This is a purchase I regret making.  It has many issues- including disconnecting from the internet, screen freezing up, slow to respond to a command.  Sometimes it won't turn on or off.  Also the front screen is plastic.  It came scratched and since then has bubbled up in places.  Very cheap.  I guess you get what you pay for.  I would not recommend this Zeepad to anyone.

Reviews.Title: hmmm
Reviews.Author: Nicole Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: i got this for my 6yr old and well i guess i didn't pay attention to where shipped from but got it way earlier than expected so that was nice but it was from China and some of the alerts pop up in Chinese and well i don't know how to change it since didn't come with instructions and i cant read Chinese lol so that doesn't help but she really likes it otherwise :)

Reviews.Title: Like my Tablet
