Reviews.Content: I bought my tablet around the holidays and I liked so much that i purchase one for my daughter and my husband. and the both like their tablets. I was a great deal it meet my needs plus. I usemy tablet for e-mail and music and reading book.ths a geat puduct for traveling. I like my zeepad.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Timothea Bow
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my daugter and she loves she uses for downloading music and for the internet, facebook,e-mail. It just right for her and what she uses it for.  She loves her tablet.

Reviews.Title: I hate it
Reviews.Author: Hilda Rosado
Reviews.Content: My daughter hates it it does not do what we expected it to do she is really disappoint with this product so am I. I would never recommend it to any one.

Reviews.Title: will not work and its old
Reviews.Author: christopher foster
Reviews.Content: I will never buy anything from these people. the screen is scratch and it broke, thanks a lot. I wont my money back

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price, the functionality is fine.
Reviews.Author: sshjaguar
Reviews.Content: This tablet is about as cheap in price as you can find... on that same note it is a bit slow and glitchy with multi-tasking, but hey it's less than $80 so you can't expect it to compare to a $300+ Galaxy or $400+ iPad. It works great for my needs!

Reviews.Title: Save your money, get the real thing
Reviews.Author: Richard Hull
Reviews.Content: Don't  buy this knock off! All this is, is a glorified android phone (minus the calling features).I bought myself a Kindle and my GF this, it's crap. After a week of using it and only 5 applications downloaded, it runs EXTREMELY slow. Not even just the internet, but loading the apps themselves is laggy and sluggish. The pink is cool, but the texture is very slippery and will fall often. Buy a case!Overall, if you can spend the extra $20-40, buy the real thing. This knock-off doesn't last long nor will it make anyone happy.

Reviews.Title: I paid for what???
Reviews.Author: Melissa Ryoppy
Reviews.Content: The first day we had the tablet it worked great.  My nine year old was in love, she finally had her own tablet.  After the first day, apps kept dissappearing.  All of the apps it came pre-loaded with are now gone.... in cyber space somewhere.  We have a very nice tower, yet my daughter cannot get wi-fi in her bedroom 20 ft away.  No netflix, no youtube, no angry birds....  Very dissappointed

Reviews.Title: does even work
Reviews.Author: josh
Reviews.Content: this product is horrible. it didn't even work out the box, I suggest pony up a couple more bills and get a good tablet

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: shamburger
Reviews.Content: Bought this for myself and love it! It works perfectly, no cliches..delays..nothing! I wanted a tablet that I could do the basics on (games, Facebook emails)

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: K Henderson
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter and we love it. The graphics are good and it's just the right size for her. My husband played with it the first night and wanted one for himself.

Reviews.Title: No problem
Reviews.Author: Victor alfonso
Reviews.Content: no have any problem with this product, only the charger model is not appropriate for the tablet, the product need other input to load better. I compared this tablet model with Zeepad 7.0 multi-touch in black color.

Reviews.Title: muy buen producto
Reviews.Author: dalia patricia
Reviews.Content: Excelente, llego antes de la fecha prevista, y el producto es muy bueno cumple con mis expectativas, me siento muy cómoda con esta pastilla

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Elisabeth Champion
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet. I enjoy the games and the portable of it. It is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: very satisfy . good tablet for kids I would definately recommend this to anyone...oh and I love the one year warranty. .

Reviews.Title: sucked
Reviews.Author: Alissa
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these tablets in Dec and already 2 don't work. From the beginning none of them would let a phone download pics.  The picture sucks irs blurry on all of them..  never again

Reviews.Title: Works great.Great seller.
Reviews.Author: Robert Anderson
Reviews.Content: I have it hooked up to my wifi and it is a bit slow.  Maybe because my girlfriend synced it with my cell phone apps.  Great for browsing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: shell "urs truly,chele"
Reviews.Content: I just received my zeepad everything was in perfect condition.....the seller packaged my product very good and kept me happy this is a nice tablet ..there's a lot of people saying negative things about the product even though mines came from china everything is excellent so far....

Reviews.Title: highly recommend this tablet.
Reviews.Author: tablet user
Reviews.Content: It exceeded my expectations. No problem accessing google play store, amazon app store, and others. (I have seen other tablets not recognized by google store.) When I opened the box, I was surprised to find a short adapter cable that is micro-USB end to regular-USB-female end, which is useful for two things. I can watch movies on a USB memory stick just by plugging it in using this adapter, or I can connect to a carrying case with a USB kepboard. I do both (not at the same time), and they work beautifully. It also came with a very nice stylus and all the other usual stuff. Best 7" tablet under $100 I have seen.

Reviews.Title: do not waste money.
Reviews.Author: shell
Reviews.Content: these are very cheap! I bought 5 and all them had problems within two weeks.1 came in broke,still waiting for its return.Takes forever to get here.Although the company says can return,you have to pay for shipping back then they will refund you with a copy of the receipt. The charging ports get loose and they are slow.with any wi-fi. I would not get,spend a little more for something better.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Becky Porter
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item as a gift for my kids thinking it would be a great starter tablet.  Once we received the item, I was very happy with how easy it was to start using and the speed of the apps, specifically Netflix, as my kids watch their favorite shows on it.  And then it went downhill.  I had this product LESS THAN ONE WEEK when it completely stopped working. We used it to watch a movie on Netflix one evening.  I turned it off after using it and we went to bed.  The next afternoon, I attempted to turn it on so we could watch a movie since it was raining.  And nothing.  Would not turn on. I tried charging the tablet and nothing worked.  Needless to say, I was less than pleased.  What pushed me over the dissatisfaction edge is that when returning this item, I had to pay for return shipping; that shipping (since it is international) costs me $26.  So not only am I currently out the money I spent on the item, I am now out an extra $26 because I was sent a defective product.  I can understand if I wanted to return this product for my own simple reason paying the shipping. But when this product was defective and lasted less than one week after I received it, making me pay the return shipping is not the way to keep me as a customer.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the money.
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Have an ongoing problem with using the charger.  Have to wiggle the plug around to get it to charge.  Other than that, the tablet is a pretty good item.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Came with Angry Birds, Fruit Ninja, and a few other games pre-loaded which was nice. I was also able to download various apps from the Google PlayStore with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Took awhile, but its good
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Took about a week longer than they said and it practically was bare bones, no games or apps on it like the first one I ordered. But it wasn't a problem since I still had the history of my Google store from my other one. I simply downloaded the apps and its working fine. Power button does have the tendency to get depressed into the case sometimes though and is a pain to take apart and pull it out, but overall happy with the device.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad tablet
Reviews.Author: travistodd
Reviews.Content: Hi I only had this produced for a few hours , In that time I spent the first two hours charging the tablet at the instructions said to do . Once it was Charged I tried to look  throw the programs , and how to get around all the wig jets and icons . I am not all the happy with it I found it to be a bit to slow , the camera 's picture was very grainy. I Think this would be best for some one that is real good with android systems . And some one that has real good eye sight. The price is grate. the size is grate for a child, and it seem;d to be made quit good .

Reviews.Title: after a week it would not turn on
Reviews.Author: patty
Reviews.Content: it worked fine for awhile then i went to turn it on and it wouldnt turn on realize it was inexpensive but was expecting more

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: nicole
Reviews.Content: I knew buying this I was not going to get top of the line. It freezes occasionally (usually when it idles for a while), but I just simply turn it off and back on. Easy to use system, only took me about 2 minutes to figure it out without using the manual. I bought it for my three year old son and serves its purpose. I would say if it can hold up to my three year old it is pretty durable.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Raffi
Reviews.Content: Works great form my 2 1/2 year old. little slow but for the price it is a ok product. Not as sturdy

Reviews.Title: nice product
Reviews.Author: destiny N.
Reviews.Content: i bought this product and gave it to a family member in another country, and they love it. It came in excellent timing and i still shocked as to how they got to me so quickly. Easy to use as well, thinking of getting 2 more for my kids.The price isnt bad but my boys are 4 and 6 and dont want to spend that much on it.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED AND EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "BiloxiGal"
Reviews.Content: I got this for limited use while traveling back and forth to work on public transportation. I use it as an ebook reader more than anything.  It's exactly what I wanted.  I tried the least expensive Kindle, and found I just couldn't live with no color on the screen. I can download my ebooks from Amazon using the wi-fi at home with no problems.  The wi-fi setup didn't take any time at all.  The cost of the tablet is such that if I lose it or it disappears while taking it back and forth, I won't feel too bad.  I can also check my email once I get to work on a nearby open wi-fi network if I want to.  I installed a 16 gig sd card on it with some music files yesterday, but haven't tried it yet.  However, the transfer was a breeze.  My computer recognized the tablet, and the tablet showed the USB symbol that let me use it as another drive.I am very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Deion
Reviews.Content: i got scrathed really easily but it was good and it also legged aloti couldnt play bike race and stuff like that

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET!
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: First of all it came straight from China and took almost a month to arrive. I bought it for my 14 year old daughter who is very tecno savvy more so than I. It worked for one day then half the screen stopped working and the image wouldn't rotate when you moved the tablet up and down. I shipped it back and it cost me 28 dollars to do so. Still haven't heard any confirmation on whether they have revived it yet and still no refund for the tablet or the shipping cost. Learn from my mistake and stay clear of this product and spend the little extra for a quality Android.

Reviews.Title: Great first tablet for your kids
Reviews.Author: A. Rodrick
Reviews.Content: It works like my Ipad , but the price was far less and I wont feel bad if the kids break it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent first tablet for my 6 year old
Reviews.Author: A. Rodrick
Reviews.Content: Pros: The price was great, the ease of use is great,Cons: Very hard to find replacement wall charger,car charger, I have one on order from engine69, hopfully its the correct one.

Reviews.Title: the zeepad works great but
Reviews.Author: Gregory sudds
Reviews.Content: i brought two and one of my 14 year old daughters power button has been push in now it won't work at all. what can we do about this ? i really like your products and would like to continue to buy but.  I need the peace of mind when something goes wrong we can resolve it in a timely you have my contact info

Reviews.Title: it was broke
Reviews.Author: Gregory sudds
Reviews.Content: This product was broke when shipped or received the screen did not work and was cracked i shipped it back to china and have not received any info yet ,and cant seem to find a number on them please resolve this problem

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: jwjaram
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday.  He loves it!  It does everything we need it to do, movies, music, books, games...and more!  Android devices are easy to work with!

Reviews.Title: Kid friendly tablet
Reviews.Author: NolaBigDawg
Reviews.Content: I purchased the tablet for a four year old, I didn't want be an expensive in fear of it being broken by children.  I was expecting it to be just something for the kids to play angry bird on. To my surprise it was really a good tablet, you can download from google play, screen was really responsive, and the micro Sd slot was really a plus.  I would definitely by another in the future

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: DJ BRAND-X
Reviews.Content: Dont buy it.  I cannot for the life of me figure out how to download anything with this piece of junk!  So disapointed.  I thought it would be a pretty good deal because it was at a good price and it would have made a good xmas gift.  Its been sitting under the coffee table since the day after xmas because its trash!

Reviews.Title: Did not work for me!
Reviews.Author: Jade
Reviews.Content: This would have been a great product for my 8 year old, if I could only get the touch screen to operate to input the Gmail info. Maybe I just got a defected tablet. *shrugs* It has been returned and I ordered something else. Hopefully this will work much better.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Pamela Dunbar
Reviews.Content: Love the color, awesome item and received in good time. This was a gift for my oldest granddaughter she will be using it as she goes off to college in the fall.

Reviews.Title: very nice for Grandma
Reviews.Author: servozoom
Reviews.Content: a nice tablet for "disposable" use, give it to the kids or seniors without worry,  Cheap and that's the way it should be.  The KISS rule....  a simple basic tablet.  Use free app Wifi Oh Player and stream from your network.

Reviews.Title: Kids love the Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Wasn't quite sure what to expect since the price is so much lower than others out there.  Delivery was way quicker than they estimated. Came in perfect condition. Kids love it and haven't put it down since it arrived. It does everything it said it would and they love the color. I am planning on ordering another for the kids and one for myself!!!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7"
Reviews.Author: bobbye
Reviews.Content: It met my standards. Just wish it had Bluetooth and a backside camera. The battery life was a disappointment, after on a few moments of movie watching it had died.

Reviews.Title: Better Then IPad if you just what something small.
Reviews.Author: Jason Pittenger
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife that is not a techie. She has a I phone a uses it but her Nook was first gen. This works like a good e-reader, Facebook, and Pandora tablet.

Reviews.Title: Its actually not bad.
Reviews.Author: Arnie Posadas
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandmas 1 year old nephew and I had the chance to test it out first and install things before letting the baby handle it. It is pretty responsive for its price and it even got most of the common things that are available in most products like camera, wifi, OTG cable. Although this one did not come with bluetooth, probably for the cost. I was planning to use a bluetooth speakers because although this device comes with speakers..... the sound is really low when trying to play a lullaby song.Overall, you get what you paid for and for this one, I think we got more than what we paid for.

Reviews.Title: Barely adequate...
Reviews.Author: Nick L Coombes
Reviews.Content: I knew at $65 that I was pushing it but this tablet is very buggy. I have a permanent pink line to the left of center screen and it has lots of issues...That being said...useful for travel...but that's about it...

Reviews.Title: Not a bad Tab
Reviews.Author: Thomas L. Cole
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 18 year old daughter who likes it very much. It can Skype and works with Google Play so you can get new apps. She uses it as an ereader and for chatting with friends. In all it is a nice tablet, comfortable in your hands, is very thin and has a good picture. The battery life is not as good as high end tablets about 4 hours of use but, is better than expected for the price of the tablet. I did not expect it to be this nice of a tablet and have been very surprised with its performance. She has not used it for watching movies yet but it works well for checking email and weather when you are in a hurry

Reviews.Author: Tyrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my wife a week before Christmas, the price was awesome.  I recieved it on Christmas Eve, just in time for Christmas morning.  And my wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: Really good tablet
Reviews.Author: Gina Paola Cepeda
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the product, it is easy to use and I bought it because is going to be a surprise for my mom. Although I cannot find a way yet to use the keyboard I bought with this tablet.Please I really need help finding out how I can set the blue tooth up on the tablet if this this is the only way to make it work.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Decent product for the price
Reviews.Author: Andrew A Beach
Reviews.Content: I purchased two.  They are fine for what I wanted.  I wanted something that our kids could play games and watch movies when we travel.  It's not an everyday device.  It doesn't sync properly with google.  The headphone jack is sensitive in order to get both sides to work.  It's less than 1/2 of the price of a kindle and 1/4 of the price of an iPad mini.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Discret product
Reviews.Author: Luciano Zuniga
Reviews.Content: The tlablet is good. It has not connectio 3G, but is so good for read, and play some games. It is slowly, but It has all what you need for watch videos and some page web.

Reviews.Title: Started off perfect and a 2 weeks later, its crap
Reviews.Author: Aisha
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my twins 8th birthday. Two weeks after palying on it my son's won't come on at all. There is nothing telling me how to trouble shoot and it is one week past the return date so I am stuck with a tablet that doesn't work and my son is unhappy. I will never buy this product again.

Reviews.Title: QUESTION
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I am big on music I read that a memory card is best but dose it work with Facebook games and if it did how dose it work smoothly????I gave it a 3 just cause I'm being fare with the reviews that I have seeing I DO NOT OWN ONE

Reviews.Title: works good, shiped within time
Reviews.Author: Cory G "cory g"
Reviews.Content: iv had this product for about 2 weeks its worked great, it shipped in a timely manner. i would recommend this product to someone looking for a good low priced tablet. orderd a micro sd and case.

Reviews.Title: THis is a great little pad
Reviews.Author: Carol "Mother of 3 rugrats"

Reviews.Title: I am amazed!
Reviews.Author: N. Bolser
Reviews.Content: It works! and works well.  I have almost no experience with tablets, really have no idea what I'd do with one, but for the price, I figured I'd find out what its good for.  Still working on that part, but this little device is way more than I'd expected.  I nearly sent it back, could not get it to connect up to my wireless at home.  Took it into a local shop and asked nicely if he could get it to connect.  There it was.  Went home, reset the router and the Zeepad immediately connected.  It was me, not the Zeepad.  Off to the Google Play Store...A month later.  I still very much like this little tablet.  Had a terrible time connecting it to the computer by USB, but finally figured out that an option to "debug the USB connection" was checked off.  Sounds like a good thing to do whatever it is, but it stopped the USB connection.  Unchecked it, and bang, it was connected.Haven't found any apps it would not run, mostly games.  Battery life isn't great, but it uses the same micro USB as the cell phones we have, so finding a charger and cable is no problem around the house.  Added a 16 GB memory chip, so the Zeepad is loaded with videos, talking books, epub books, and handles all well.  It did not like the high resolution videos, so ran those through Format Factory to knock down the resolution and shrink the size.  Very watchable.

Reviews.Title: Very Fragile, Very Poor Quality, Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: rickangabi
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these things for my twin boys birthday, complete pieces of junk.  Touch screen is not very responsive, keyboard attachment port wore out within days. All little electronic devices are going to get dropped eventually, one of ours fell out of the keyboard/case we bought, the unit fell right apart, not durable what so ever, buttons fell out and when put back together no longer worked.  There are issues with the google play store app. and one of them is stuck on the Android start up screen.  What a waste of money.  Beware, check to see if they have a warranty before purchasing.

The cords did not fit properly, the tablet was unable to turn on after charging.  What a big waste of 76 dollars.  The company that sent it did not have very good packaging, poor customer service, etc.  will not purchase from this company or Amazon ever again!!  Buyers beware!  We are shipping back (which we have to pay for) what a horrible experience.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: IMPORTANT RUN AVG OR SOME ANTIVIRUS AS SOON AS U GET TABLETThe tablet comes installed with games and 2 of the games came up as potentially threatening so if u just hand it to your kid and they try to play those games u are at risk I use avg pro its still$15 bucks but I have it installed on 4 devices so worth the money u can get it in the play store this tablet is awesome but an adult should go thru all the settings and run spywear b4 handing it over to kids as I said in my updates whoever rooted the device changed the settings if u run avg it will walk u thru the settings at the end of the scan to protect your deviceI bought this tablet for my 18 month old daughter because she is determined to keep up with her older brothers and loves all the learning apps available for young toddlers I must say this tablet is great for her im going to try to find a kid tuff case of course the tablet is on the cheaper side I only paid 76 bucks im not complaining all the apps work and this tab has options to delete installed apps and options to move apps to sd card I did not have those options on my galaxy so not bad at all shes gonna be so excited to play her word games when she wakes up from naptimeUpdateJust realized this tab comes rooted I know this is a high selling point for some it makes me a little nervous but so far so good I will update again if anything else pops upUpdateSo my daughter loves it the abc phonics games are a must for anyone with young toddlers the zeepad is definatly great so far of course the speakers suck and itscheap plastic its only $76 bucks I recommend going thru the settings whoever rooted it set those kind of weird still tweaking them my daughter doesnt want to let go of the thing its great for kids and budgets I cnt afford an ipad and if I could im not handing It to my child so this is a great way for u to let your youngster play without losing out on $500 or more if they drop itUpdateDay 2 with the zeepad the charger works its battery life definatly isnt great and it depletes even when your not using the tablet but I also believe those small annoyances to be the reason the zeepad is available for such a cheap price its a wonderful beginner tablet for young kids it comes already installed with kids games and is obviously intended for kids but as I said before if your on a budget an adult could find this useful also its not the fastest or the best thats why its so cheap but its still more than enough for my daughter to watch her shows and play her apps I would definatly recommend this tablet to others great purchaseUpdateThe tablet is still working despite the fact my 18 month old has been drooling and pushing on the screen a little harder than I like then again I bought her the zeepad so she wouldnt abuse my galaxy anymore so I guess I shouldnt complain reading the reviews are what helped me make my purchase and they are also how I determine what seller to purchase from that is ehy I keep updating I feel like this tablet is a good deal if u purchase from a reliable seller and supervise your kids charge it for them its not a tank they can still break it make them sit on the couch while they play it instead of running with it this tablet is cheap and has tons of features but its not durable or it would cost more if u want durable spend $100 more bucks and u will get higher quality this is a great beginner tablet its still quite fast for a single core processor and has tons of features runs netflix youtube and my comcast apps all fine on comcast I have to log out then back in somtimes for it to work but for it $76 delivered its not that big of a deal plus u can install apps that require root access my tablet doesnt do that and to buy higher end rooted tablets is at least $100 more on top of what the going price is so im assuming the negative reviews are the people who bought from the seller at the very bottom offering the dual camera on the probably fake zeepadsUpdateIts been a couple weeks now the zeepad is still charging and works great I only charge it about once a week but I also shut it off when my daughter isnt playing it I think this was a great deal my daughter loves it and it plays all her movies and games without any problemsUpdateThe zeepad is still working just got done loading a bunch of free mp3 songs for my daughter off of the free app I got off google play I really dnt understand all the bad ratings for my$76 bucks this is an amazing deal we have 3 samsung galaxy tab2 also and this tablet does just as much a little slower at times and not as good quality but for the price this is a great dealUpdateSkype works and all of the other apps we have loaded on here just got done reading elmo and dora ebooks we downloaded on the kindle app I still cnt figure out why people dnt like this tablet I'm writing my review on it rn the battery isn't that bad and why would u want your child playing 5hrs of games a day anyways either way zeepad still works and we still love it

Reviews.Title: ZEEPAD, SELLER DracoTek Please Read
Reviews.Author: Damita J Pannell
Reviews.Content: I had to contact the seller because the shipping address was incorrect. I chatted with Amazon and they sent a request to Draco Tek. I also sent an email to Drack Tek and they responded within 48 hours...I was impress with the seller and Amazon for helping me correct the shipping address. I purchase this item on March 9,2013 I received this item on March 23, 2013 sooner than promised. I brought this product for my grand-daughter she is 4 years old and is very savvy with my iPad 4. I brought this product for the price and for what it can do. I was some what disappointed because when I received this product everything was their except the stylus pen, the box came with 3 different type of chargers. One was USB, AC adapter and one for using a flash drive. The USB and AC Adapter does not work I tried it and the charge stayed at 1%. So I tried a different USB and it started charging so I left it to charge overnight. I tried it the next day and it did not charge more than 2%. The product request that you charge it the first time 6 hours...so I was disappointed that I still could not use this item. So I tried another charger that I had and this charger was charging I started charging at 9:00am and it was fully charged be 2:00pm.  Finally I was able to see what this could do and so far it works okay. I know folks say this was inexpensive...however you should always receive what the seller is selling and the item should do what the product states it should do no exceptions.  I brought this base on what the product offered. Money should not be a factor...just because some items cost more does not make them a better product. I could send this product back after all if the product cannot work because you cannot charge it then it is no good to you...major flaw. I think Drakco Tec Store which is located in China should read their customers reviews. I did read the reviews and had mixed emotions. Being a buyer at Amazon and trusting Amazon I took a chance. I have purchased a lot on Amazon since March 9,2013 and I'm learning a lot about the sellers and shipping. I what have rated this product higher because it does work and it is a good buy...however not being able to charge this item is very huge for me. Please take the time to read all reviews...their was a lot to read. I read all of the reviews after ordering. So I did know there was a possibility that the charger would not work. So I did gather up all of the old chargers I had collected over the years from old cell phones which save the day...so in the end it did work out. I will do a much shorter review after using the product longer.

Reviews.Title: Definitely got what I paid for!
Reviews.Author: MIssMerrMerr
Reviews.Content: I was always told if I have nothing to say, then say nothing.  However, after a very disappointed 10 year I must say this is the worse 90 dollars I have spent.  It arrived on time and after two weeks it is now on its way back.  It doesn't keep a charge,lasting only about 2 hours.  Two weeks later my son goes to turn it on and it won't.  All of a sudden it comes on and it has reset itself and erased everything!  It no longer will connect to wifi.  I contacted te seller and they told me I had to contact amazon.  So I contacted amazon and they told me to contact the seller.  Seriously! Amazon finally sent me a link to return it.  It's now on its way back and I am patiently waiting for the return of my money.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet just because the price was so low.  You definitely get what you paid for in this tablet.  Low graphic quality, and very slow.  I hardly have any apps downloaded and the tablet creeps so slow that it gets to be a pain even trying to do a simple search on the internet.  Also, the battery dies so fast you pretty much have to keep it plugged in to use it.  I would recommend spending a little more to get a higher quality tablet...I wish I would have!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: M. Marcotte
Reviews.Content: Don't bother with this 79.00 doorstop.  I purchased 2 as christmas gifts.  Big mistake.  Returned 1 immediately.  The other got wrapped and given as a gift.  When opened 3 weeks later we decided the capacitive touch screen was worthless and proved it.  Being beyond our 30 day return policy I paid an additional 45.00 for shipping and repair fees to suppusedly have it repaired.  Received it back 2 weeks later in the same condition.  Both units appeared used and screen scratched on initial delivery.  Now I have a 125.00 frisbee (doorstop).  Not to mention the 100.00 worth of my time invested in screwing around with trying to make things right.  Please learn from my mistake.  I have an Asus and a galaxy tablet and love them both.  Spend the money, you get what you pay for in this case.

Reviews.Author: mike ferraro
Reviews.Content: could not get a connection at all,tried several times and had help from a tech also. will not purchase anything from you again,thanks

Reviews.Title: Good for toddlers
Reviews.Author: Blaire roy
Reviews.Content: My 3 year old never let me have my kindle so I got rid of his mobigo and bought this zeepad. Has great storage capacity for the games for kids. Even downloaded some videos for him to watch offline almost all games are available for play without the Wi-Fi on. The only thing I don't like is the screen it's seems like 3d and sometimes makes it hard to see. The touch screen is perfect and comes with some pretty cool accessories. Perfect for younger kids.

Reviews.Title: Should have read more
Reviews.Author: Edward Amarille "Edward Amarille"
Reviews.Content: for a basic tablet, this isnt too bad, but with only 512 MB of RAM, memory management is an issue. The battery doesnt quite last as long as I would like, but it can handle basic social browsing if you are not trying to rush through your apps.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Marco Perez
Reviews.Content: My brother loves this tablet to death. Was purchased as a christmas gift. You pay for what you get pretty much

Reviews.Title: zeepad..wont hold up!
Reviews.Author: priska
Reviews.Content: Ok..so I bought this for my fourteen year old and eight year old for Xmas..unfortunatly they didnt even last a couple of weeks..the screens are extremely fragile and they both ended up shattering..I own a kindle fire.my kindle has survived both boys and a three year old and has been dropped numerous occasions and still manages to work perfectly! My opinion is to save your money until you have enough to buy a good tablet.one that will withstand time. Like a kindle or galaxy tablet. Both of those tablets can do exactly what this one did and then some!

Reviews.Title: For the price I guess its OK.
Reviews.Author: Kevin A. Hendricks
Reviews.Content: Pro's: Its cheap and screen is very bright at nighttime. Touch sensing seems to work just as well as the top brands. Is already rooted before you receive it so thats a bonus.Con's: Seems to be made with some cheap plastic. Screen is hard to see when its bright outside and you pretty much HAVE to be right in front of it to see it. Doesnt run very fast and does seemed dated. Definitely make sure you get a Micro SD card for this model, cause 4GB just is NOT enough room, especially considering you have slightly less than 2GB available with the OS on it.

Reviews.Title: instructions
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: It would be OK if you are smart at these electronic devices. The instructions are not easy to understand and able to read

Reviews.Title: Good purchase for my children!
Reviews.Author: Hernan
Reviews.Content: Used for about a week by my children of 5 and 7. Hope these tablets continue working well! The only issue with the 2 tablets received is the quality of video calling by using Skype (better to turn off the video and just talk).

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Julie Miller
Reviews.Content: The kids loved thier new tablets, easy to operate, and very durable, we had purchased 2 other tablets that lasted 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: francisco rodriguez
Reviews.Content: used it for a few months and enjoyed but it but something happened with the power cell and now its just a big old paper weight. now i have to get it fixed..

Reviews.Title: Too slow for YouTube and Pandora
Reviews.Author: P. Pan
Reviews.Content: Hello,  This product is good for basic internet search and e-mailing.  I was hoping to use it to watch YouTube videos and listen to Pandora radio while traveling without having to have my laptop with me. It was very hard to control the volume as it would constantly go to zooming instead, disappointed, I chose to return the item, paid $11 shipping and they charge 15 percent restocking fee.

Reviews.Title: Recomendado como vendedor
Reviews.Author: franklins sifontes
Reviews.Content: Muy responsable , productos llegaron a tiempo y en buen estado.. recomiendo  abiertamente. . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: Great deal for a tablet. Works good and great apps on the android store. I like everything about it and am 100% satisfied

Reviews.Title: great little tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: Patricia Moorman
Reviews.Content: I consider it money well spent, it is very easy to take it with me everywhere I go. great buy

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Maria Adams
Reviews.Content: This small pad is easy to use and light weight. My daughter who is 10yrs old enjoys it the most.

Reviews.Title: Good little Zee Pad
Reviews.Author: Patricia Folsom
Reviews.Content: After seeing my Granddaughters that she received for Christmas I thought this would be something to pass time with while on field trips and waiting for the kids. It's not real fast but gets the job done. I just wish the battery would last longer because sitting on a bus you have no way of charging it up. All in all it's a great little pad & my other 2 Granddaughters are getting them for their birthdays.

Reviews.Title: Well
Reviews.Author: celestine butler
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. I got it for my son because he keeps messing on my iPad. This is not a product I would use but it works for him.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: B. Wells
Reviews.Content: Too bad Amazon doesn't allow a zero star rating.  It broke the second time I turned it on, which was really no surprise when I opened the package and saw what was being considered a user's manual.  Here is an excerpt:1. If you long time don't to use this Tablet...Yes, the entire user's manual is written this way.  Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money to get a decent tablet. This one is garbage.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad purchase
Reviews.Author: ranman43072
Reviews.Content: I actually recieved this tablet 2 days earlier than expected which was a good thing becauce it was for my Grandson's Birthday. Well packaged and it worked right out of the box. I did however charge it for 6 hours as suggested from other reviews before setting it up. I have hade no issues what so ever and have recommended this tablet to many friends for the smaller fingers in thier famlies.The price was great for my budget and I will probably buy another one for my youngest Grandson as soon as he is old enough.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This Product
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Olson
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this product. I bought two for my granddaughters. One granddaughter locked hers up before we could put anything on it and information I was given from Zeepad did not work to reset the tablet. Just do your homework first before you buy this. Now I have a tablet that no one can use and I was not able to get a replacement. I will never buy from another seller on amazon again if it has to do with electronics. I ended up buying my granddaughter a kindle fire and she just loves it. This product is a loser!

Reviews.Title: Great for my husband!
Reviews.Author: mandy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for valentines for my husband, and he loves his new tablet. This is his first tablet, and he found it easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: It showed only the android screen when I tried to turn it on.  I had to return it.
Reviews.Author: bobbie wortham,
Reviews.Content: Did not meet my expectations,  The instructions were not clear and had bad grammar.  Hard to understand.  It has no comparison to the Kindle Fire

Reviews.Title: First ever tablet
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Bidlack
Reviews.Content: It does do almost all of what I expected except the camera is terrible.  The tablet surface is like a mirror and there is not eye hole to take picture, so uhless you want pics of yourself it's awful!!!!

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: butler
Reviews.Content: We are happy with this,  but would be happier if the skype video worked. It was for my grandson , it was so he could video skype with his nana. But other than that he likes it and plays on it . The directions need to be a  bolder and larger print for easier reading.Thank YouTerri G Butler

Reviews.Title: Great for the price and if you only want to browse the web.
Reviews.Author: Frederico DosSantos
Reviews.Content: The pad is quite durable; I carry it with me everywhere on my backpack and it gets tossed around quite a lot. A plus is that it comes with a screen protecting sheet(that you have to apply) but its one less thing you need to worry about buying and if you are looking at this guy, you value saving some $$. The plastic cover is quite solid but the edges do scuff up pretty quick. The battery lasts about 2 hours and that is acceptable for the price. If you are thinking about using this as a PC substitute please keep in mind that after the OS you only have about 1.9Gbs of space left; bought a 32Gb microsd from scandisk and the system recognized it right away; but only as a 29.8Gb device(might be file system configuration, but that's enough space for me. It comes with angry birds and fruit ninja installed and it was a great excuse to have some random children play with it and although they handled it as if it was made of solid titanium; it came out with minor scratches, but non on the screen because of the protector.The major down side for this device is the charger; as noted before it doesn't fit all the way and most of the time you have to "giggle" it around so that it will start charing; but the usb cable charges perfectly, just takes longer; I get a full charge from 2% to 100% in about 15 minutes on wall charger and about 23 on usb.I would have given it a 5, had it come with bluetooth or at least gps support. Tried a few bluetooth adapters but was not able to get it to be recognized; but did not do much other than plug it in and wait a minute or two.

Reviews.Title: ZEEPAD
Reviews.Author: Michael Stone
Reviews.Content: Basically got the item for the Grand kids, it has performed well, a little slow but for the money it has stood the test, was shipped in a very timely manner, easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: 7.0 Zee pad
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: We got a 7.0 zee pad for our son for his 8th birthday and we love it, very simple and does everything iPod does but 100 dollars cheaper thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Zeepad issues or is it from the seller? But, I do have some positive info too
Reviews.Author: April D Cobb
Reviews.Content: Not sure if all my problems with this tablet is from the unit itself or from the seller I bought it from in Hong Kong. That was my first mistake not reading thoroughly as I usually do and not buying within the United States. The tablet was slow doing anything,the battery life seemed to be short,there is no reset button to try. The settings menu for example looking up battery use you couldn't tell where you stood it says like 40% and then it would die. But, that wasn't the biggest issue as had it for a month and now it's completely dead. Now, if we go with just a bad tablet it happens and or something about the seller and overseas I can't answer about this tablet as it gets rave reviews which is why I bought it. One big positive I can say is the Amazon A-Z Guarantee. Make sure you have it. I asked them to step in when I was only having trouble before totally dying and I believe in less than 24 hrs. it was resolved and I received a full refund.  Another big positive to have on electronics from Amazon is the Square Trade Warranty. It's worth the extra money. I have had to use it in the past on another item and that is also everything you read on reviews. Easy,fast,amazing. Trying to be fair. Give it a try,buy within the United States, purchase Square Trade Warranty and that's my opinion.

Reviews.Title: This product stinks!
Reviews.Author: amk3mom
Reviews.Content: This is a piece of junk.  It is very cheaply made, the buttons do to work half of the time.  The charger doesn't work.  We had purchased two for both of our kids and we have to share one charger now.  Do not purchase.

Reviews.Title: My zeepad
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I enjoy it. But i can't delete unwanted downloads, and it's beginning to run slow. Still I would recommend it. It was delivered on time and all n all it works just great.

Reviews.Title: its not bad
Reviews.Author: Ibrahim
Reviews.Content: i bought 3 Zeepad and i found one some aria in the screen not workingbut the other two working fineso in general it good

Reviews.Title: Very good item, for the price
Reviews.Author: uveprom
Reviews.Content: I was installing a game and stuck suddenly, and never again go into android, always stuck showing zeepad 7.0 on screen, but i did find a website with the firmware, i fix it doing reflash! now is in good working condition![...]

Reviews.Title: Ok considering the price
Reviews.Author: DebRT
Reviews.Content: Tablet works ok. Skype does not work on it, as I can't get video calling to work. Tried to uninstall and reinstall and it didnt work, even though I had enabled video calling. I was very disappointed in this. Also, battery life is poor. A fou hour charge will last about an hour and a half of normal use. Otherwise, the tablet works well and I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my grandson and in the past purchased 4 others for members of my family.  Everyone loves them.  I have a larger one, but may order on in this size since it seems to be a good size to carry in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Terriprud
Reviews.Content: Only down fall is that the camera does not work for Skype  one of the main reasons my daughter wanted it.  However, great value for the money.  Bought one for my self

Reviews.Title: Awsome product for the price...
Reviews.Author: Robbie Huff
Reviews.Content: Awsome product for the price...  This is my first tablet and I love it.I really like my Zeepad tablet. For the price I got it for, I think it was really worth it. It does most of everything I was looking for in a basic tablet.  A friend recommended this table and I'm not disappointed at all for the price.

Reviews.Title: Died after a months use
Reviews.Author: Theresa2674
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these items for my children for Christmas.  Both had to get shipped back to Engine99 after a months use.  One of them, there is no longer any sound.  The other one, the power button broke and got stuck inside of the unit.  I shipped everything back at my cost (approx $25), to only get a call from them saying that I have to purchase parts for repair and that they are giving me a great deal.  Sorry, but a great deal to me is to fix the unit at no charge at all since it died after 30 days!!  I paid the $20 parts fee.  I also asked what the guarantee is on this "new part" that they are installing.  They informed me that there is no guarantee on it and if it breaks again, I must pay for it again.  I do not recommend this product.  Also, this product went on sale almost half off 20 days after I purchased it.  Fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Great for what I wanted it for
Reviews.Author: ellen.nbs
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet to use when traveling to play games and check my emails from - this is super for that. The only negative comment I have regarding this product is that it does not hold a charge very long. Need to keep it plugged in if I am using it for longer than a half an hour or so. Great for the kids to use so I don't have to give up my phone or laptop.

Reviews.Title: zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: THOMAS JACOBSEN
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as an entry level tablet /e-reader and is just about what I expected.I have experienced no real issues performance wise,I am quite satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: capacitive screen too sensitive.  random characters
Reviews.Author: M. Marcotte
Reviews.Content: 2 out of 2 were disapointing.  Don't buy cheap tablets.  You get what you pay for.  Battery life is 50 percent of similar well known tablets.

Reviews.Title: thank god
Reviews.Author: helen
Reviews.Content: Finally we have a winner. Its great. Works fast. Its durable. Last long. Great for the kids. My friends loves it

Reviews.Title: Sadly, this was a disappointment
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these for my grandsons for Christmas.  They were awesome units, but within 2 weeks of use, they both crashed a few days apart with sudden grid lines going in both directions.  I emailed them asking for a refund, but they insisted I send them back for repair.  I did, and after several emails back and forth (they couldn't find them, needed my tracking number, etc., which thankfully I had and kept), asking the status of the repairs, they finally agreed to send me a refund.  I will say they promptly did process the refund, but I am out the return shipping for the repair.  They are a great concept, but I honestly cannot recommend them, at least from the company I purchased them from on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good toy.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Rossetos
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need it to do with email, apps, and surfing the net.  Also enjoy playing a good game of chess on it.

Reviews.Title: my new tablet
Reviews.Author: teresa o'dell
Reviews.Content: love my new tablet easy to use, and cheap...and it's easy to carry around and use it at work on break...

Reviews.Title: Fantastic buy!
Reviews.Author: Gargirl
Reviews.Content: My 14 year old daughter got this for Christmas from my boyfriend & the product was great.  She managed to break it though in less than two weeks by putting it in her over filled backpack so she bought herself (this) a replacement.  Great product for the money!

Reviews.Title: Zeepd
Reviews.Author: dianamozee
Reviews.Content: I loved the Zeepad, but it became defective after only two weeks. I returned this item on January 13th, and have not seen a response one way or another from engine 29. This is very unprofessional. I liked the Zeepad just fine, it was a great little tablet, I am however unhappy with Engine 29

Reviews.Title: No Sound Search Support
Reviews.Author: BDRDJ "Ric"
Reviews.Content: This is a good little tablet for the money and I will tell my friends.The only other thing is that it don't support google sound search?

Reviews.Title: awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Lori Huey
Reviews.Content: We love our Zeepad! My kids love it. It's easy to use. It works wonderful. There is a huge selection of apps. for androids.

Reviews.Title: First time owning a tablet
Reviews.Author: Timothy Mulhill
Reviews.Content: Its my first tablet. Sometimes its slow when you touch the screen but that doesn't bother me at the moment. Its a great thing to have if it is the first one ever.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad for the kids
Reviews.Author: Zeepad Parents
Reviews.Content: We got two Zeepads for our kids. We have a 5 year old boy and a 10 year old girl. Upon reading other reviews that these might be somewhat fragile, we have drilled into the kids that they need to be gentle with them. In general, these work just like a Droid smart phone and last a couple of hours before they need to be recharged. As we don't really want the kids playing games longer than this, we are fine with the batter life. The Google Play Store works just like on a smartphone and we have had no issues with this or using the wifi. I added a couple of leftover mini SD cards I had from old smart phones to increase the storage space for the kids.The only issues we have had with these tablets have all been in with either the original seller (not Goodios) or the quality control of the product. We originally ordered these 15 days before christmas to be from Santa. These never arrived, Amazon refunded our money and that company is no longer in business. Beware of the folks with the cheapest price. We then re-ordered these from Goodios who have been perfect in solving our problems. Our first set of these arrived and one of them was dead on arrival. It was quickly replaced with another that had a bad charger. We had a new charger within a couple of days and then found out the little USB connector was also defective. They sent us one of those and now everything works fine.We got the little USB keyboards that double as covers which work fine with one exception. When the Zeepad is in the case and the case is turned vertically the Zeepad can slip out of the little claws that hold it in. As these cases are all made the same I will put either double sided tape or some velcro on ours to keep this from happening.We really like these tablets and they kids have been using them up everyday when they get home from school for over a month. If Zeepad improved their quality control we would have had no issues with them at all. The 4 stars are because of this.  But for the price we really can't complain much about that either.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: hona6969
Reviews.Content: I would review this but I haven't even got it! Very disappointed with how long this has taken! Hard when my son keeps asking me when hus tablet will be here has taken weeks!

Reviews.Title: just stopped working
Reviews.Author: Happy Times
Reviews.Content: not sure what happened bought 2 of these and one works fine and the this one just stopped working.hope they will take it back

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Happy Times
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves it and it is working great ..and it came with everything .I bought the same one from another store and it didn't

Reviews.Title: Problem with internal memory
Reviews.Author: Victor alfonso
Reviews.Content: On the second day of use I had problems with its internal memory, not saves. And will not let me use my external memory, the registers but want to see a picture I can not.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our son
Reviews.Author: AlbertS1
Reviews.Content: We did not want to spend $ for an expensive tablet for our eight year old son.  But we wanted to give him his own tablet and allow him the opportunity to show responsibility for his own electronics.  He his very pleased with this tablet and his perfect for his needs (he primarily has games and reads books on it).Update: The tablet stopped charging using the included charger.  The mini USB worked for charging for a couple of weeks, but that has stopped working as well. The tablet is now garbage, I do not recommend this to anyone who would like a tablet to last over a year! Chinese garbage!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for young adult
Reviews.Author: Jill Sullivan
Reviews.Content: My step-daughter loves this tablet.  She's been able to use it at school as well. I will probably end up getting this for my son soon.

Reviews.Title: it never turned on
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: fast shipping easy buy low price but when i gave it as a gift for x-mas the person i gave it to opened it and went to turn it on and it never worked from day one now i have to return it

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: for the price its a good buy ... i got it for a xmas gift .. i think i would buy another one i havent had any issue with it

Reviews.Title: Exceptional product
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my niece and she loves. Works as stated incredible value. would recommend to any one wanting a great tablet at a great price.

Reviews.Title: No warranty?
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my son and he received it shortly after Christmas and now it doesn't hold a charge and when he called he was told there is no warranty on this product!

Reviews.Title: From Costa Rica
Reviews.Author: Alvaro Alan Sanchez
Reviews.Content: I am very please with the tablet ,  but charger item is not working , I have to use USB unit to charge it and seems the battery takes less charge that the only time the charger worked.  I bought it for my wife and she is very happy because nobody ask for a computer in the house anymore ( I have 2 and 3 children)  For stars rated because the charger but should be 5 stars

Reviews.Title: 7" zeepad
Reviews.Author: rara
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our daughter. She is 10 and we weren't ready to purchase an expensive tablet for her. When I opened it I was concerned with the screen quality. The screen looks like plastic.She has had this tablet for a month and loves it. She has been able to download music and games with no problem. She takes it everywhere with her and there has been no issues with the screen. Great little tablet!

Reviews.Title: My son loves it!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Shalaina
Reviews.Content: He loves it soo much he has yet to pu it down. Thinking of getting the whole family one!!!!! The only thing is it wont hook up to my hotspot? :-(

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sharon Johnson
Reviews.Content: I was very upset when I ordered the Zeepad it was supose to come in before Christmas.  It DID NOT arrive untill after Christmas!!!!! It was my son's Christmas present.  If it was not going to be here before Christmas the company should have said it would not arrive in time for Christmas.  I placed the order on December 15, 2012.  On my order it said delivery estimate was December 18 - 21, 2012.  I would have paid extra to get it shipped by Christmas or ordered from somewhere else, but didn't know it would not arrive in time for CHristmas!!! When it did not arrive by December 21 I looked on line and it said it had been shipped.  The postal service told me it looked like they had just made the lable for shipping but it hasn't left company yet.  I tried to contact engine29 and could not. But when I was triying to contact them I saw where they had done the same thing to several other customers.  I emailed the company (because they didn't list a phone number - I wanted to talk to someone personally) and didn't get a responce.  By this time I was really afraid I would not receive the Zeepad, they had taken my money, but saw on Amazon where you prevented that form happening.  I would not recommend this company to anyone.  But as far the Zeepad it is ok for what we wanted.  My 11 year old son uses. it.

Reviews.Title: never could get to work right.Freezing up since day onegiving
Reviews.Author: Faye Powe
Reviews.Content: giving this a low rating because I have never been able to use it.I was told to flash it by downloading the firmware but I am not familiar with that therefore it is still not working.

Reviews.Title: Great deal &easy; to use
Reviews.Author: Justme
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these 7" zeepad for my kids. My daughter is an avid reader so now she can have ebooks. My children are young so I didn't want to spend much. I couldn't believe how impressed I was upon opening the first one today. I have the kindle hd and iPhone and while screen resolution isn't high quality hd it is not bad by any means either when put side by side with my kindle fire hd. Now I'm thinking of getting one for my husband too. It comes with screen protector, stylus, power cord, data transfer cables, and ear buds. Perfect starter for anyone on a budget!! I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Lasted one month
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: This was a fine inexpensive tablet for a month. Unfortunately the wifi quit working as soon as the return window expired and will not turn on, making the tablet useless. I've done a factory reset and tried getting the wifi to work in several different locations with no success. Trying to turn it one results in a "turning wi-fi on..." message which never goes away and never connects. Would not recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: great buy...
Reviews.Author: Qadir
Reviews.Content: came very quickly.bought this for my wife to use as an ereader...she loves it...its working very well,no problems so far...cant complain...however wanted to buy one for myself but it went up by $16.

Reviews.Title: rbowers
Reviews.Author: rbowers
Reviews.Content: This is suppose to be new I paid for the new one and got a used sratched one that runs slow.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: rbowers
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these one black one pink suppose to be new, but they both seem to be used,since the screens are scratched and they run very slow. They are for my children and they cannot understand why they are scratched and neither can I.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 before this one in local stores and neither worked great.  This one is a great deal for kids who want a tablet but parents don't want to spend the money for the more expensive ones.

Reviews.Title: Screen is terrible / wireless is not working correct
Reviews.Author: S. H.
Reviews.Content: It took a month to get it in the mail, the screen is not good quality, there a lines that go through the screen. One of my friends purchased this item as well, after a few weeks the charger piece and power button fell out, she was not able to return it. I would rather pay 70 dollars more and get a kindle fire or google android tablet, and don't have to worry about it falling apart.

Reviews.Title: broke, won't charge after 1 month
Reviews.Author: putput
Reviews.Content: Broke after about a month.  The charger that came with it broke right away and then we charged it with a cell phone charger, then it quit charging altogether! JUNK!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding item
Reviews.Author: LeRoy Campeau
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this as a gift and my granddaughter loves it. For the money this gift is awesome when it comes to down loading apps and the learning apps help her.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle
Reviews.Content: I bought as a gift for kids ages 5-10 & they seem to like it, so I guess that's all that matters. Took a little longer to arrive but I guess since its coming from overseas then it goes through customs.

Reviews.Title: Price matches Quality
Reviews.Author: Alejandra J "Zen Mind"
Reviews.Content: 79.00 for a tablet computer is pretty cheap.  Sounds good for our 9 year old son.  He had it only for two weeks.  The power button got loose and fell inside.  The screen got slightly scratched.  The screen was hard to see unless in a perfectly lighted room, not too bright.  If your child is not hard on equipment, thre Zeepad may be a great starter computer.

Reviews.Title: I am not sure i trust this tablet
Reviews.Author: Delores
Reviews.Content: Today is the third day that i am using the tablet and i am having problems with the battery, it is only lasting about an hour, I have tried letting it to discharge totally before charging it and it is still not lasting more than an hour of use. also it seems to be very fragile, honestly i bought it because i find the reviews for it was good, but right now i would prefer a refund. I am not sure i will get enough use from it for my money.

Reviews.Title: MY GRANDSON LOVES IT.
Reviews.Author: johnzee
Reviews.Content: GREAT FOR GAMES AND YOU TUBE. A LOWER COST REPLACEMENT FOR AN IPAD FOR A 4 YR OLD. HE LOVES IT

Reviews.Title: It's Okay......
Reviews.Author: Mslovwil
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my teenaged son. He seemed to like it at first. Then the touch screen sensor stopped working. At this point I don't see the value....I am disappointed in the quality of the Zeepad. Wish I had not bought it in December.

Reviews.Title: Pay the extra and buy a better tab.
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: Had to return, as it went black 1 hour after got it up and running. Seller was great, giving me credit. Went out paid the money and got the samsung tab 2  7" been very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Does the job!
Reviews.Author: Sarah D. Crandall
Reviews.Content: A very inexpensive tablet that does the job...it is a great starter tablet. It does look a little cheap though.

Reviews.Title: Not as Advertised!
Reviews.Author: Jenn B.
Reviews.Content: If you want a tablet that is cheap and good for web browsing, then this will work for you. In regards to memory, you ARE NOT getting 4.0 GB. The tablet I received has only 1.1 GB available for usage. It is very cheap and feels as if it will break if dropped. Has a tendency to freeze up just with normal usage. I would not recommend purchasing this tablet. Spend an extra hundred dollars and buy a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Hope not all androids r like this!!
Reviews.Author: schnoodle "mystery reader"
Reviews.Content: I've never owned any sort of android before and the instructions were Translated by someone who did not know English.  Therefore barely any help. I am still trying to figure out how to get my Yahoo calendar with my Gmail calendar I'm still trying to figure out how to download my books from Aldiko.  i guess i have to Find someone to help me. I wish i could find a manual somewhere.  It is frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jnicole
Reviews.Content: Love this product, great for the price! Product came early and works perfectly. Just make sure you charge it, only thing is it loses battery but I mean what product doesn't!? Just make sure you have charger handy and you are good to go! Apps are easy to use and download, customization, setting changes are simple and maneuvering everything is on simple task as well

Reviews.Title: 100% Garbage. Buy a used Kindle Fire or similar to save money before considering this
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Wood
Reviews.Content: You try to go cheap but not always win. Garbage right out of the box, through and through in every function. You will lose your money here and the Seller blows you off. I now have a claim with Amazon (big hassle) begging for my money back. Meanwhile appeased my son with a nicely priced used Kindle Fire which he loves. Imagine what I could have bought him if I put all those dollars together! You live and you learn. Very proud of my son for being patient through the process.

Reviews.Title: Rad zeepad:)
Reviews.Author: T Neely
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase, and for the price I couldnt go wrong.  I purchased two for my children, but I think I would like to purchase one for myself now. Great product!!

Reviews.Title: not impressed
Reviews.Author: Felicia W
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom for Christmas, and she only plays games on it. Since it uses WiFi only, she's not able to use the bible at church, even though that was basically the only reason I purchased it. She's unable to download the bible for use outside of WiFi.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Stephanie L Buchanan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to run a few apps.  It streams videos great.  My only very minor complaint is the viewing angle.  You must be looking at it straight on and not from an angle or you get the gray screen, which is no big deal to me.  I would definitely get another one.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: amii
Reviews.Content: good product and gret  price for a 5yr old toddler and a preteen the love it. looks nice in a case as well.

Reviews.Title: otherwise I'm satisfied...
Reviews.Author: glaudimar
Reviews.Content: actually wanted to add that the sound is very low, I buy other headphones and ecuchaba better and higher. so I advise you to throw away the headphones that brought and buy better quality ones.otherwise I'm satisfiedsaludos desde venezuela

Reviews.Title: greatly satisfied
Reviews.Author: sherry
Reviews.Content: The tablet works wonderfully.  Thank you so much. The little computer arrived well packaged with cool accessories. It's a beautiful color. The pink tablet started right up with no problems. It attached to my home Wi-Fi effortlessly.  It's really neat and is communicating with my other toys well so far. I've only used it twice now, but it seems quite cool. Thanks. Sherry

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: nisha
Reviews.Content: Very good tablet for the price. Brought for my nephew and he loves it. Referred to others for their kids and they love it also

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: meeka
Reviews.Content: It was delivered on time.The price was a steal $83.00 just hate after I ordered it the price droped to $63.00 I purchased the pink tablet for my 7yr daughter to keep her off my phone.Let me say she LOVES the tablet works it like a pro.

Reviews.Title: took to long
Reviews.Author: monica
Reviews.Content: We were happy to get it for our grand daughter we ordered it january 4 th and it took 3 1/2 weeks to get it this the slowest moving i have ever gotten on line and after it got here it had lines going through it.

Reviews.Title: help
Reviews.Author: res
Reviews.Content: now it will not boot past logo screen and I can't find anyone who knows how to do a hard reset.98q

Reviews.Title: Zee is no i, but its good for kids
Reviews.Author: David M. Fitzgerald "-Admiral Dave"
Reviews.Content: It's a good buy if you have realistic expectations of what you are paying for. My boy loves it and it works with the most of the popular apps and games from Google Play so far. It would not play Grand Theft Auto, which leads me to believe that support of intensive 3D games could be spotty. Battery life isn't great so bring the charger if you will be using it when out and about.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!
Reviews.Author: Traci
Reviews.Content: This product is terrible and not worth $1.  The charger broker the second day we had it..i sent the item back and they replaced the charger which lasted 1 day the second time.  It also is missing the power button and needs a small object to turn it on!!  I have lost the money on this item.  Its a poor product and not worth buying.  Nothing good about it

Reviews.Title: product was returned
Reviews.Author: Lanelle Reick
Reviews.Content: speakers woould not work, and then it would lock up and couldnt get it to do anything.. sent it back and got a galaxy by samsung

Reviews.Title: difficult to use
Reviews.Author: James Stevenson
Reviews.Content: the instructions that came with trhe ZeePad were so sparse and written as an oriental would speak that having never used a pad before makes it hard for me to use....

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: pimplefarm
Reviews.Content: Gave this as a gift.  It didnt work.  Right out of the box.  Embarrasing.  Be sure to keep all the wrapping and reciept.

Reviews.Title: Great price and works great
Reviews.Author: Jessica Upole
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my 5 year old. I didnt want to spend all the money on an expensive tablet since he is young. This tablet works great for all he does. Perfect!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: MARCELO
Reviews.Content: Very good for the price you pay.I recommend it. Very portable and very nice design.I recommend it for you.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Tweets
Reviews.Content: I have been happy with my tablet. I wished it would have come with a manual. I had to access internet to get information from other owners on specific issues. Other than this I have been very satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Jned
Reviews.Content: I purchased for my wife to use as a digital frame and occasional internet tablet. Maybe netflix and some basic games for my kids.  While its OK, its slow, freezes, screen is bad at any angle, and sometimes straight on. Generally its a little worse then I expected based on some reviews. Not expecting an ipad by any stretch, I had hoped it would exceed low expectations, it does not.Pros: price, light weightcons: everything else.And no I dont think I got a bad unit, I think you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Slow
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The respond time is very very slow. It's like it locks up all the time . Looking to see if I can return it.

Reviews.Title: Yes it does have Google store, that's about it:(
Reviews.Author: J. Piter
Reviews.Content: Nothing I want to download there will work. Mostly when I ask to download it says app is incompatible with device.Very few of the apps I did download will actually work.  A waste for me. Next time I'll spend $80 on lottery tickets.No charge indicator light, slow charge and about 2.5 hr out of a full charge which is just about useless.Web browsing very slow.It does bring back memories, playing most games, ones it CAN play, brings back my fondness of my PC Jr.JUNK!

Reviews.Title: excitement died quickly
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Product seemed ok upon arrival but quickly had issues with dead spots on screen and freezing up a lot. Had great hopes for it but that excitement died down quickly.

Reviews.Title: Bought two of them
Reviews.Author: trudy carey
Reviews.Content: Got these for my grandsons at Christmas. I didn't want to buy a high dollar one due to their ages. They love them! One of the boys dropped his while charging and it did not break! A adult might want something more but for the price..this one is great!

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: A.Sellhausen
Reviews.Content: I bought the tablet for my boyfriend for Christmas. i was disappointed the only way to get sound was to use earphones. We didnt find out right away. Other than that you get what you pay for. He likes it but i will buy a better one later on.

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR KIDS
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I brought this for my daughter it's a great price and I loved everything that came worth it but it would not let me connect to the internet w/wifi. The wifi button was defected b/c it froze and i couldn't do anything.

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Jon Gold
Reviews.Content: I didn't even get it this guy rips you off. Don't get it I'm telling you. Don't fall for what I did.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad review
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The first one I received was DOA. It only worked for the first 8 min and then came back on again. I had to return it back to get a new one. The second one works great and I haven't had any problems with.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Shavon Mo
Reviews.Content: My baby sister can't get enough of it.... all she wants to do is play on her tablet. So its very good

Reviews.Title: wrong tablet
Reviews.Author: shakur
Reviews.Content: I ordered the zeepad paid 94.00 and git a 49.00 cheap no name android tablet from somewhere in China with instructions written in Chinese. So disappointed! My rating is 0 stars til I get the correct tablet!

Reviews.Title: Many problems
Reviews.Author: lisa walker
Reviews.Content: So far we've had difficulty with every task: downloading games, netflix, setting up email, getting it to charge...everything. It's been a headache.

Reviews.Title: a great tablet!!!
Reviews.Author: michelle drabek "momof3_theyremyworld"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 7 year old... A GREAT PLUS is that it came with Google Play, so we can download all her favorite games and find new favorites!  This tablet is darker than it looks, it's more of a hot pink (deeper in color)...which is perfect for my daughter!!

Reviews.Title: I was very satisfied with the case.
Reviews.Author: madelyn ramirez
Reviews.Content: Since I did not receive the tablet (ordered from another vendor) I called to ask if I could return the cover. The company was very nice in letting me return it and refunding my money. The cover looked to be in excellent shape and probably would have been very nice if I had received the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Quite Happy
Reviews.Author: Fuff McDuffin
Reviews.Content: While this product certainly is no iPad, we have been very happy with it so far.  We are also happy with the amount of apps there are available at the Google Play store.  Best of all, it did not cost much in comparison with other tablets so we have a lot less to worry about when we let our kids (6 and 4) play with the apps.Some cons to point out:You have to look at the screen head on to view it properly.  If you are viewing from the side, it looks like the negative of a photograph.  Kind of a pain if my kids are using it and ask for my help with something.The sound quality is quite poor unless you hook up speakers or listen through headphones.I have no regrets about buying this tablet.  Perfect for kids or casual use around the house.

Reviews.Title: wonderfull
Reviews.Author: freddy ruiz
Reviews.Content: its wonderfull my child love it...she got a lot of game they be all day playing and watching videos in youtube

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: michael todd tucker
Reviews.Content: this tablet is perfect for my 6yr old it has all the bells and whistles any kid could ever want

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: William S Minks
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my daughter and it actually works pretty good for a starter tablet for a teen. I will be going to an ipad for her after this. thank you and it was quick delivery too.

Reviews.Title: Great gadget!
Reviews.Author: Charlo
Reviews.Content: This works as intended! I bought it for my son and he loves it! I am planning to buy another. It should have come with additional storage but other than that it is pretty fast!

Reviews.Title: An OK product
Reviews.Author: C. Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with the specs and it came promptly. When I inserted the Micro SDHC card the card overheated, burned my fingers on removal and ruined the memory card. Prompt refund. No assembly is perfect, but I didn't expect to get hurt by a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Touch screen is weak
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: The screen is almost in useable I bought two for the kids one is fine the other is very hard to use due to the touch screen not reacting or doing something totally different than what was touched. Also this vendor has no customer service and the tablets came four days past the estimated ship date I put some of that on USPS who's tracking is worthless.

Reviews.Title: Too Slow To Use.
Reviews.Author: A.P. in S.P.
Reviews.Content: I had to send this tablet back for a refund due to poor performance. For the money it did seem to have some nice features and the ability to do everything that I wanted it for. But, it was far too slow to use and it took minutes to do anything. I even added a memory card to it to see if that would boost it's speed. But it didn't help. I'm guessing from the other reviews that I may have just gotten a defect. Hopefully everyone else who purchases this in the future has better luck than I did.

Reviews.Title: Four Star quality
Reviews.Author: Anthony David Daniels
Reviews.Content: Although we received the wrong color, ordered pink for my wife but received gray. Other than that and taking the full five days for shipping it was in great condition and the packaging was more than sufficient. It turned right on, booted right up, very fluent touch, apps work great, loads very fast with wifi. Well worth the money, buying another.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: Tweety
