Reviews.Content: The tablet works great! Value for the money is totally there. Works as good if not better than the name brand tablets. Only reason I did not give 5stars is because unpaid extra $22 shipping and it was 2days later than expected arrival. Thank God it made it before Christmas!

Reviews.Title: Best gift
Reviews.Author: Steph73
Reviews.Content: I got this zeepad for my daughter. I was a little worried about how it was compared to other tablets, but it turned out to be the best investment I made. It has so many features on it for adults too. I love the apps.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: tykeisha
Reviews.Content: i love this tablet i bought it for my four year old daughter and she loves it.  I would recommend anyone to get this tablet especially if you want something small and cute to do all your little internet tasks.

Reviews.Title: Good value for price
Reviews.Author: Terri Metcalf "one happy mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Zeepad for my 5 year old for Christmas. So far, she loves it and it keeps her off my phone! I wish it were a little faster, but that could also have something to do with my internet speed.  It is certainly worth the low price I paid for it.  She loves the pink color too!

Reviews.Title: I RECEIVED THIS ITEM BROKEN/IT IS IN TRANSIT COMING BACK
Reviews.Author: DARWISHA RUSH
Reviews.Content: I RECEIVED THIS ITEM BROKEN/IT IS IN TRANSIT COMING BACK. THE ON AND OFF BUTTON KEEPS GOING DOWN INTO THE TABLET AND ONE OTHER BUTTON IS OFF COMPLETELY. MY DAUGHTER DID NOT ENJOY HER CHRISTMAS. SO, IF SHE IS MAD, SO AM I.

Reviews.Title: super deal
Reviews.Author: jodee
Reviews.Content: everything i expected n more still learning all features love it want another one  it is evev kid friendly great deal also 4 price

Reviews.Title: ZEEPPAD is pretty good for an affodable tablet
Reviews.Author: jessica
Reviews.Content: My son loves it and all the apps that he can get helps him learn a lot of cool stuff. A good bargain tablet for a 4 yr old.

Reviews.Title: amazing!!
Reviews.Author: MTLin
Reviews.Content: My wife picked four tablets for Christmas, I picked this one. She absolutely loves it!! She even got our son one after his more expensive one broke five days after receiving it for Christmas! Would recommend for ages four on up!!!

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: CLAUDIA OCHOA
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my 9 yrs old daughter for Christmas. I am very impressed it is everything they said it would be. We added a 16gb sd card to it and it helps keep the hard drive quick. We have had it for about a month it runs great and my daughter loves it.

Reviews.Title: perfect gift
Reviews.Author: hmarie
Reviews.Content: It came in on time and was exactly what I expected. Got it for my 8 year old daughter. Perfect...

Reviews.Title: Best gift ever
Reviews.Author: Amy Tumlin
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my little girl who is 6.  I have a Kindle Fire and she was always wanting it.  So i found this alternative to the Kindle for way less and she loves it.  She is able to watch Netflix shows on it along with all her favorite games.  Would definitely recommend this for a young child.

Reviews.Title: Its very successful ! I love!
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: I am very happy! My daughter enjoying every day this product. The apps it's easy use for my daughter .

Reviews.Title: Do not n I mean do not buy from them
Reviews.Author: Mad mom
Reviews.Content: Extremely mad and disappointed!!!! I had a very sad 5 years old on Xmas!! N now she questioning Santa!!! Never got my tablet! Never got a tracking number!! N never got any Feed back from the seller!! This is absurd and very bad business!!!! I can't believe amazon has third party sellers like them on her!! Scammers!! Thank good I got my money back!! But I will stick to eBay, overstock, and qvc!! Yes I got my money back but still don't change the fact of having to explain to a broken hatred 5yr old why Santa missed her house and didn't give a present when the excuse amazon gave me when I filled a claim it was out of stock!! Then u should of told me that when I ordered it on December 10!!!! DON'T NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!! SCAMMERS AND UNPROFESSIONAL PLUS AMAZON CAN'T EVEN CONTACT THEN BY PHONE JUST EMAIL!! So I you what that says

Reviews.Title: Made super Cheap!!
Reviews.Author: vicki miller
Reviews.Content: Within a couple days of getting this the buttons for the power and the volume broke and fell out of the tablet, and it was used very nicely, not rough. Very disappointed I have sent back for repairs or money back!

Reviews.Author: ivan zinkiv
Reviews.Content: i order this item befor Cristmas they never sand me thi item i lost time on my prasent for my kids

Reviews.Title: Nice little tablet that your kids might enjoy
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my 14 year old daughter. She has enjoyed it for the most part.The pros for her are the size and the screen is clear.Cons would be that it is a bit slow with only 512meg ram and it does lock up frequently while catching up.  The screen will stop responding when it locks up and she has had to hard boot it a few times to get it back.Overall a good little tablet for the kids.

Reviews.Title: Great my kids love it
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my son and daughter in law and they love it. They use it every day and have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Not worth $2.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "sand kraft"
Reviews.Content: Takes about 1/2 hour to do anything. Has good specs bit no performance.More words just prolongs agony. Gave this to my grand daughter and these are her words.

Reviews.Title: not too bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Hannah Brush
Reviews.Content: The Zeepad is a good value for the price. I wish the construction was a little more durable, the plastic seems too thin. It does offer several apps and gadgets, ect.. My daughter enjoys watching netflixs, and PBS Kids. She also likes to skype with her grandma that lives in New Zealand.

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER
Reviews.Author: maggie
Reviews.Content: Pink 7" Zeepad- came with everything posted in the add & 2 screen protectors(1 already on the tablet), Charger- works, USB cords- work, Zeepad(tablet)- it's perfect(even for adults, I am 20) no ripples, no freezing, every app needed is available in the app store(most apps are free), loud speakers, good camera(like the one on my android cell phone), no problem connecting to the internet. Plus when I contacted the seller & told them I'd lost my stylist & ruined the screen protector they mailed/shipped me replacmemts free of cost. Overall, great product!If you wanted to get a keyboard for your tablet I left the link below they have black, red, pink, blue, and purple listed.LINK:7" Tablet Stand with USB Keyboard - Black Faux Leather Carrying CaseKeybord- I bought for my zeepad and works great. It's not blue tooth, but even with blue tooth you have to be ale to see what your typing, so it's not like you can be typing in the other room, so it's the same thing basicaly unless you have to have something else plugged up at the same time. It comes with the usb to plug into the usb that the zeepad comes with so u have everything to do it plus cheeper with a durrable cover. I had no problems with the seller or the shipping.(shipping threw fedex)You might want to consider buying a car charger for the tablet, I bought mine on amazon.comLINK:Car DC 5V Adapter For Zeepad 7inch Android Tablet PC Power Supply Cord ChargerYou can also purchase an adapter from Wal-mart that plugs into the car to take house held items with house held chargers to plug into the adapter to make it charge in the car. I have one of these and it works with the zeepad house charger.I'm not sure why so many people leave the "not so positive feedback" for this product. Most of the negetive feedback came from those who ordered durring Christmass. Okay, I never order anything durring Christmass. WHY? Things get lost, misplaced, or damaged(may be the cause for those who had minor issues- package could have been dropped or slammed into another package or left in too hot or cold of environment). 9 times out of 10 it's not the company who is at fault(the postal service who is delivering the package could be) and durring Christmass their E-Mails are flooded. They may have accidently overlooked your e-mail or simply haven't gooten to it yet. Plus if your item doesn't arrive by the estimated delivery date don't panik, it's just an estimate, it may take a few more days to arrive. I orderd mine a week or 2 after Christmass and payed the extra money for "2-3 day shipping" and it arrived on the 1st estiamated delivery date. I didn't run into a single problem with shipping or ordering, I am sorry for those who did and I have confidence that the seller will indeed get back to you and fix any issues you may have expeirenced. I must say this couldn.t possibly be a scam because, I am a real, happily satisfied customer and I recieved a real Zeepad tablet w/ accessories, undamged and on time threw amazon.com(shipped by FED-EX).Copy of the nice e-mail conversation I experinced with the seller:Me:  Hey, I lost my pink zeepad stylist and messed up the zeepad screen protector can you send me a new screen protector and  another pink zeepad stylist? If this cost money how do i go about paying for these two items?Seller:  We only have the silver stylus pen in stock right now, is that ok?Me:  Yes, that',s fine thank you, and did you happen to have an extra screen protector as well?Seller:  The stylus pen and the screen protector will be mailed out for you today.Me:  Thank you so much! and ive tried to leave feedback but the computer wont let me every time i try but i just wanted to say thank you that I love my tablet and didnt find a thing wrong with it.Seller:  Thank you for the kind words, it is our pleasure to make our customers happy!Plus, they sent me a link so I could leave this product review.

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: NITA MASSEY
Reviews.Content: It was to have apps preloaded in it, It came completely empty and would not connect to wifi. this is my second attempt to buy one of these.

Reviews.Title: Zee pad
Reviews.Author: Bree
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for the price . Got it for my 10 yr old and she can do everything on it just using wifi , not on problem .

Reviews.Title: I was amazed
Reviews.Author: cyndi
Reviews.Content: Ok so i never write reviews i just read them but in this case i had to write one. The product is great. I bought it for my 7 year old as an x-mas gift. It was the best gift ever.The wifi and hot spot work great with it. I have cricket cell it like the tacobell of cellphone companys but even with all the troubles the zeepad still functioned well. It can pick up the wifi while driving in my car and the kids just watch movies making for a much more enjoyable ride.I would recomend this to anyone looking to get a tablet for there kids without spending hundreds. they also come in very "cute" or "cool" colors so you never get them confused.For the buget conscience family this tablet can do it all and fast. I sometime use it at stores instead of my smartphone because it works faster.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for daughter
Reviews.Author: nancy gronewold
Reviews.Content: Bought this for dd for Christmas. It is perfect, allows her to do everything an 8 year old needs or wants to do.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: ruben
Reviews.Content: i got this tablet for my wife for christmas and she loves it. she used to have a kindle but she likes this a lot better.

Reviews.Title: like them really well but am having troble with the charger
Reviews.Author: michael t bennett
Reviews.Content: other than that they work great AND THE KIDS really enjoy them I aam curantly dealing with the company over the one that wont take a charge

Reviews.Title: Great product! Great seller!
Reviews.Author: MJinPalmSprings
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a gift for my 10 year old to play games, go online and watch music videos on. She loves it! It was very easy to set up, arrived on time and included instructions in the box from the seller on how to set up various things/troubleshoot. The screen does have a slight glare but other then that very user friendly and perfect for a budget tablet.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: celestialbev
Reviews.Content: I really liked all the accessories that came with this product and the price was great. The tablet comes with access to Google Play, a definite bonus. My kid loves the color. Here is what irritated me to no end. The enclosed stylus had rough spots on the barrel and scratched the screen, then the screen saver. Thankfully, the scratch is small and I don't think we have ever had a touch screen without a scratch, but I was irritated that it was enclosed and of poor quality. I quickly bough new styluses for the tablet and all is well now. The table is working out wonderfully for my child and you can expand the memory with a MicroSD card, a real bonus in the realm of budget tablets. I recommend it. Just check out the end of the stylus before you let your kid use it ;)

Reviews.Title: works great!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: bought this tablet for my younger sister as a gift and it works great, this is my first time doing a reveiw but i'm confident when i say its a great product, mind you i was scared because of some of the previous reveiws on here but mabe it was just thier bad luck i mean hey things happen, but it works like a charm.1. right out of the box it was running (i told her to let it charge up first but she never listens lol)  battery life so far so good it last up to 5 hours and that is with her surfing and doing god knows what on it.2.i downloaded the kindle app for her and the goolge one as well as the amazon app store, that went well as well she got 2 books already, in the app store there is a errrow message about loading the game app conserning our adress no idea why but i havnt looked into it so i'm not gonna comment on that at this point. she uses her face book, youtube, even a site that i usally watch movies on and no problem there.3.the SD card i bought with it was a 32 GB that was installed ok and the Wi-Fi is great she uses it on the porch, in her room, the bathroom lol well just all around the house. we bought the keypad case for it but that is another story ( was working fine then just stoped) but as long as the tablet doesnt just stop i dont really care bought the case.even if its the first time i heard of Zeepads i took a gamble and i am a happy customer, now the thing is i bought a second one a black for my mom it arrived with a cracked screen, yea i know guess my luck ran out lol, well i left a e-mail to the buyer hope the will handle me with ease cause the black is for my mom is she is none too happy so lets see how they handles this lil issue, i'll be sure to keep you posted with and update later.i recomemd this to those looking for something fun small and hasnt got a tone money to spend, i'm getting for myself so you should too!!

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: cory
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter so she would stop asking to play angry birds on my ridiculously expensive cell phone.  The zeepad met all of my expectations and works perfectly for my 5 year old's gaming habits. Also its cheap enough that if she drops it on the tile its not a huge monetary loss as if I were to buy her a more expensive tablet, but at the same time it can do all the same things as the $500 ones.

Reviews.Title: do not buy this
Reviews.Author: Anna Seeger "the goodbee girl"
Reviews.Content: My daughter got this for Christmas and within a week the pen was broken.  The tablet never allowed us to type certain letters so we could not log into our google account and download apps.  Sent it back

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got this for our 8 year old daughter.  She loves it!  Easy for her to use.  I already have an Android type phone, so she already knew how the App store worked.  She has been able to download lots of free games and activities. The only thing we are still trying to figure out is how to get her some music.  But, over all...GREAT!

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my 4 almost 5 year old granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Gramma B
Reviews.Content: She only puts it down to tend to her new baby alive doll  Loves the preloaded Ninja Fruit game Great item

Reviews.Title: Like a big android phone but a little better
Reviews.Author: redd-fish
Reviews.Content: I own a Samsung stratosphere phone that runs on android 4.0 and this tablet looks and feels almost just like the phone except larger. The only real difference is that the apps tend to be more encompassing and sort of like a medium between what you would see on a phone and a laptop. It's a very nice substitute for a laptop if you use the right apps and perhaps buy a keyboard for it (the virtual keyboard is nice but I wouldn't want to write an essay on it). The battery life is great just as long as you don't leave the wi-fi connected to it all the time (I've had it on for almost 3 days and the battery is at 65% w/o using wi-fi). The screen resolution is a bit rough but not unbearable. Overall, for the price it's a great little device. I didn't mean to rhyme that .

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: Nky
Reviews.Content: Like: the color and size was perfer for my daughter, the price was affordableDislike: Very fragile.  Do not buy it for kids yonger than 10

Reviews.Title: Not durable
Reviews.Author: Nky
Reviews.Content: like: size and price.Dislike: very fragile.  I wish the product was stron enough to last more than one week,  the parts came apart and the screen broke.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: Clothilda Smith
Reviews.Content: I like the size, its for my little girl and she loves pink so i like the colour but if i had notice that it only has a front on camera i probably wouldnt of chosen this model

Reviews.Title: Pink zeepad <3
Reviews.Author: amber
Reviews.Content: It works just as good if not better than my friends kindle! I would recomend this to anyone love it! Such a great deal aswell!

Reviews.Title: Not bad but not great either
Reviews.Author: Richard F. Giersch "Rich Giersch"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this and a Kindle HD at the same time. It works well enough but is not terribly well constructed, feels flimsy and the screen is loaded with scuffs and scratches after just a couple weeks of use.  It needs restarted at least once per day due to it acting strange.  Under the same cir cumstances, I'd buy it again.  Not a good substitute for a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price`
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 9 year old son for Christmas.  It's definitely not an iPad.  Has a plastic face that scratches easy.  Some things don't adjust to which way the screen is turned and looks like things are missing, for example putting in the passcode. But for $80 bucks I just wanted something that works okay and maybe last a year since.  What can I say, I'm poor.  So far my son has loved it!  It has a good operating system.  Connects to the internet.  Nick can download games and watch Netflix.  So far so good!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Christy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 2 yr old grandson so he could play Angry Birds! He loves it. The only thing is the volume is not very loud but other than that he loves it!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Jessica Harding
Reviews.Content: We bought for 13 yr old as a Christmas gift and its great!  Simple to use, everything is pre-built, connects easily!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: This was given as a gift to a grandchild. I love it and so does my granddaughter~! This is an excellent learning tool

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: I gave this zee pad as a gift to a grandchild who loves it! This was a great gift choice for an 8 yr old who is learning how to use computers.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal garbage.
Reviews.Author: Clam Canoe
Reviews.Content: Do yourself a huge favor, and save up a couple of extra bucks, and buy an HP Touchpad 32GB from eBay for like $150. It's almost 10" and fast as hell. These things are total crap. Cheap Chinese tablet that's virtually unusable. Horrible.

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: wow
Reviews.Content: We got this for my sister for christmas and she hardly puts it down! It is a great tablet and she adores it. In her words 'its like a cell phone. I wont need one of those now that i have my awesome tablet!'

Reviews.Title: Good for kids
Reviews.Author: Pary
Reviews.Content: Product came on time. Bought two for my kids.  Now they don't have to fight over my phone to watch Netflix or play apps.  Good price

Reviews.Title: The Wife loved it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Since I bought this for my wife she uses it all the time and she even sleeps with it beside the bed.  Money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Finnerty
Reviews.Content: This tablet was purchased as a Christmas gift for my young granddaughter and it fits the bill perfectly.  It came with a pretty pink gel casing and the start-up was easy enough for this grandmother to sort through.  It plays Netflix well and all of the free kids' games we downloaded for free are running easily.  My daughter says she loves it as much as the little one.  The screen is clear and the speed is generous enough not to be frustrating.  A real winner for the price!

Reviews.Title: really great item
Reviews.Author: deandra barr
Reviews.Content: really nice, they work very good and my husband love them to.. everybody should try on n the price, love it.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price!
Reviews.Author: kristy
Reviews.Content: Overall a good tablet. My daughter loves it! The charger sparks when you plug it in so I would get a new one, but so did the one for my cell phone so I guess its not that uncommon. It works great and having almost everything I wanted preloaded on there is a big plus!

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Jessica Shivers
Reviews.Content: I bought this device for my 5 year  daughter for christmas. So far so good. It does everything that my android phone does and more. She has enjoyed playing games and using the different apps. The only downfall is that the battery doesnt last all day but for the price I can't complain.

Reviews.Title: POS!
Reviews.Author: SS817
Reviews.Content: Let it be said....You get what you pay for! & Buyer Beware! The pad is very slow, i bought it for my 6 year old and she loses interest in it quickly because it takes so long to start an app.

Reviews.Title: Its ok i guess
Reviews.Author: Tawnie
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my son he loves it .. its slow also.. although i ordered the pink one for my daughter and never got it and had to file a claim.. the one i did get was an ok tablet.. saddened my daughter never got hers for xmas though..

Reviews.Title: ZEEpad...great
Reviews.Author: marco
Reviews.Content: ZEepad is a great tablet. I just recived it today came with two games already installed (angry birds,fruit slice) the tablet is andriod 4.04 & has play store. Front camra is alright. Speakers are good and pretty loud. Bottom line its a great tablet at a great price.. Recommended

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: prettyme
Reviews.Content: came on time neatly packaged and it runs very well i love it cant complain i would recomand to others

Reviews.Title: poor product
Reviews.Author: Chad Layman
Reviews.Content: Poor product, it won't even turn on.  Company refused to exchange for another one.  Extemely disappointed, it was a Christmas present.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: KillahCox
Reviews.Content: It worked for about 2 hours.... All of the sudden things would start to open and close and all sorts of things. Don't waist your time and money!!!!!

Reviews.Title: no word excel
Reviews.Author: kasey hampton
Reviews.Content: nice tablet love the google market  but i need word so 4 out 5 it is cause it said it had word

Reviews.Title: This seller has caused me trouble
Reviews.Author: Richard1876
Reviews.Content: This seller ( importers127 ) offered me a black Zeepad with accessories at expedited 1-3 day shipping ($22.00) and sold me nothing but lies and would not respond to my emails.The item took forever to arrive and came pink. It also quit working after one month and my money was just a loss.This was a horrible Christmas gift for my 11yo son.Importers127 did not seem to care ... I expected better!!! Beware and don't purchase from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Not a new product
Reviews.Author: Christi Hudson "C. Hudson"
Reviews.Content: I received this not only late but I also received a used product. In the purchase ad it stated "new". Whenn I got the tablet it had a used screen protector on it and once I took the protector off it has 2 small bubbles under the glass! I am not a happy customer at all! This is suppose to be a Christmas gift for my son!

Reviews.Title: great for kids
Reviews.Author: D.Z
Reviews.Content: My five year old loves his tablet It's the perfect size for little hands and its cute too!. My son uses it to play and for learning, it is easy enough for him to use with little guidance. The internet search engine is slow, so I don't recommend it to someone who actively uses it. Definitely will be buying another for my niece!

Reviews.Title: Speaker cut out after two weeks
Reviews.Author: allischarn
Reviews.Content: Bought for my special needs son to watch movies and netflix.  The speaker which was weak to start scrapped out in two weeks. Trying Roget an external speaker.

Reviews.Title: 7' Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Todd Holt
Reviews.Content: Good Product in good condition when I received it and all the accessories were there and it all works well.Thanks Again,

Reviews.Title: Zee pad
Reviews.Author: Srf2004
Reviews.Content: This tablet was a gift price very good screen touch response seem to be really good. I recommend it to anyone. Great for a starter tablet.

Reviews.Title: WHERE IS IT??!!?
Reviews.Author: angie
Reviews.Content: I was super excited when I found this item and ordered it. Seemed like a great product at a great price. My 9 year old daughters net book got broken a few months back so this was the perfect "big" gift from Santa. Christmas came and gone......NO TABLET! I HAVE NEVER been so devastated...I mean how do you explain something like this to a child? If this turns out to be a scam, I don't know how these people sleep at night, ripping people off knowing most likely this gift is for s child. My Christmas was totally screwed up because of this....times are tough and I don't have hundreds n thousands of dollars to spend on gifts. That's why I was so thrilled when I found this at what seemed like such a good deal. Like I said, this was to be my baby girls main gift. She has taken it really well and is waiting so patiently for it to arrive. It just breaks my heart and burns me up when she asks everyday if its coming today. I'm hanging on to a shred of hope that it will still be delivered, but after reading some of the other reviews I have little hope left....I've heard of these things happening to other people, but have never experienced anything like this...it is an awful feeling to totally put yourself out there(trust, money, ...)just to be made a fool of. I hope I'm wrong, I pray I receive a package tomorrow, but if not....karma will come around to whomever thought of this coldhearted scam...

Reviews.Title: Don't order!
Reviews.Author: Christine Martin
Reviews.Content: After waiting several weeks, I was told I was not going to receive and they were refunding my money.  While I did get my money back, there is no sense in ordering something that isn't there!

Reviews.Title: BEWARE!!! WIFI DOES NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Rick Neil
Reviews.Content: Tried everything, I am very technical when it comes to electronics. The Wifi radio does not work in this tablet, screen is horrible and pictures would be better from a disposable camera. YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. This thing is horrible!

Reviews.Title: cheap quality don't bother
Reviews.Author: lydia parra
Reviews.Content: Not worth trying to save a few bucks and the quality proves this. It's slow,  freezes, touch screen sometimes just doesn't respond.  Don't bother...

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: taneisha
Reviews.Content: I just got this zeepad 7 4.2 android tablet I must say it's a good tablet for surfing the web,facebook,YouTube,and great for gaming I would recommend this tablet to anyone oh yeah a great e-reader too!!

Reviews.Title: trouble
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Trouble right out of the box. I think I would have loved this product...if only it had worked. The screen was bright and crisp, but that was the extent of anything good I could say about the thing because it failed to function. Fortunately the vendor took it back for full credit.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: lainey p
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with the quality of this product. The first one I got would not hold a charge, so I had to order a replacement. The seller was very good about sending out a another one, so I give them props for that!The replacement is no better. Apparently, you get what you pay for in a tablet!

Reviews.Title: don't bye
Reviews.Author: andrea
Reviews.Content: I been waiting for three weeksand abbr got it yet if i could give it 0 stares i would you should not have to wait this long for something asst they price

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Idntunderstand
Reviews.Content: Was the color n price I wanted to pay for my daughter and came nicely packaged but wouldn't power on. Very upset about it after I had to patiently wait for it and it was supposed to b a birthday gift. It just ruined my daughters day. If a no star rating was available that's wat it truly deserves

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: ancp
Reviews.Content: When i received it, the screen had already been used improperly. If you touch anywhere on the screen it shows a place that had been pressed too hard on the screen.

Reviews.Title: freaking perfect!
Reviews.Author: Wendy Cromer
Reviews.Content: I love it!! its perfect for what i needed it for. took a min to find a case it would fit in cause its small. but as a Pure Romance consultant i LOVE the fact thats its PINK!!! :) <3

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Mgilleo
Reviews.Content: The screen goes blurry and pixelated look. Then the charge cord quits working all together. Completely useless now being I cant charge it

Reviews.Title: Won't Charge
Reviews.Author: sjbmom
Reviews.Content: This is a cute tablet and did everything my 10yo wanted,  except charge. If someone put slight pressure on the plug to get it "just right" it would charge. She was trying to lay it against a pillow to charge when I discovered the problem. Seemed like a fire hazzard to me so I am attempting to return the thing now.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Retrosexual
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace a tablet with cracked LCD for a 7 yr old.  So far, it performs just fine.  her only disappointment was that it didn't have EverNote app.

Reviews.Title: buyer beware you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get something that was budget wise when it first arrived i was excited cause i bought 4 for my 4 kids..they were charging and was working but after 1 week, 3 of them wouldnt charge anymore even if it was plugged in the power wont turn on..the screen would freeze..and now only 1 is working functional..i'm crossing my fingers they either let me replace them or get a refund..there goes 300+ bucks down the drain

Reviews.Title: not for kids
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: Because of the price, we purchased two of these for our kids. Within two weeks the first on broke. now 1 month later, the second one is done for. Both were dropped on the VERY SENSITIVE power on/off button, braking the button right. I claim some responsiblity but very poor design.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: The item never mad it to my door. I end up ordering another one through another seller and it is okay for the price. I got it for my son who is 5 and it freezes up alot and the battery goes dead quickly. The charger stop working and I cannot find a case that fits it.

Reviews.Title: This product stinks!
Reviews.Author: amk3mom
Reviews.Content: As stated with the red one.  It is cheaply made, the buttons do not work and we have to share one charger as one we received won't charge.  Do not buy!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: Maritza Kreutzer
Reviews.Content: I was hesitating to buy it, because of the reviews. It was a gift for a friends 2yr old son to watch cartoons and play toddler games. I took a chance that one that will be shipped to me wont be defective. But it was. Touch screen  was unresponsive in about 1inch wide column. So I had to return it. Before I did I tried to install some apps and connect to wifi with no problem. So, bottom line is, invest in better tablet or take your chances.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad tablet
Reviews.Author: pedro lizarraga
Reviews.Content: This tablet did not work well from the beginning nor did it hold a charge .amazon was kind enough to give me my money back .for which I thank them very much .dont recommend this tablet the touch despise is  bad too u have to tap it repeatedly to get it to respond the wifi won't stay on either it takes it forever to pick up wifi .its got a mind of its own .

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: House momma
Reviews.Content: Bought 4 of these for christmas presents. 3 of the 4 will no longer charge. 2 of the 4 had the on/off button and volume buttons completely fall off. They are basically trash and unusable. These stayed in a protective case and were taken care of when the buttons fell out. What a waste!

Reviews.Title: Maybe okay for kids but spend a little more on yourself...
Reviews.Author: Jeep Man
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and looked at the specs and everything looked good but honestly I'm pretty disappointed with this tablet.  It lags terribly on typing and even on a a fast wifi connection it still seems pretty slow at times.  I'm going to look at spending a bit more and getting something better.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the Buck
Reviews.Author: Ginger Simpson "mizging"
Reviews.Content: Other than the screen resolution being a bit fuzzy, I thought this was well worth the money spent.  It was a gift for my grandson (nine and autistic) and he loves it.

Reviews.Title: the product was not vey well made
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my son,he loved it it had everything that he wanted on it!!!! it lasted a month and broke.....The power button broke and it no longer works and the company that i bought it through would not even respond to my e-mail.... so very disappointed with this product ...

Reviews.Title: Charger cord dose not work
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: The tablet is fine but the charger cord that came with it dose not work I would like to recive a new charger cord and not have to pay the $15 to order a new one I already paid almost $70 for the tablet that should have had a working charger with it.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0Allwinnwer A13 Boxhip Cortex A8 Android 4.0,4GB
Reviews.Author: soledad m.atwood
Reviews.Content: I can't hear any sound..like if u want to listen a music.I have to use my earphone..but listening without earphone,you cant hear any thing even while you are playing games..i dont know what's the problem is..the volume is already up.. im not recommend to anybody this  pad..

Reviews.Title: Not worth the fustration..
Reviews.Author: JESSICA ROSSON
Reviews.Content: Got 2 of these for my boys 4 and 5 .. One broke in 3 days, it will only turn on with the charger in, once i pull out charger even on full battery it goes dead.. The other keeps freezing.. The games just stop working all the time.. It has been days and all these problems..Not worth the kids being upset when it freezes and just stops..Returning ..2 stars because they kids used it for netflix and no problems on there..

Reviews.Title: Product is good but
Reviews.Author: p wilson
Reviews.Content: My son enjoys this the only problem I have found is with the charger. When you plug it in to charge you have to keep it in one place he cannot use it while charging because it shuts off.

Reviews.Title: picture is great.
Reviews.Author: Bela
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Son.  He uses it daily.  Watches videos, goes on FB etc.  Has froze up once, but that was it.  He has had it since just after Christmas.  He is happier with this tablet too.  (bought him a different one for Christmas, and it frozen constantly on the 1st day he used it.  Have since returned that one.)

Reviews.Title: not worth a crap
Reviews.Author: mo2646
Reviews.Content: U can not use head phones. On it because the head phone Jack is messed up it is very slow

Reviews.Title: Love the Product, but too Small
Reviews.Author: Angela Samuel Jackson
Reviews.Content: The screen is too small.  The icons make it hard to understand how to browse, download, etc.  Too complicated for any child under 5.

Reviews.Title: would have liked a user manual
Reviews.Author: jess1105
Reviews.Content: Product arrived new n nicely pkgd on time by usps so it was just placed in mailbox, I rated it a 3 bc it came w/ no user manual only printed out sheet of instructions not much help.

Reviews.Title: I have never been this unhappy . aside  the play store everything works
Reviews.Author: tish
Reviews.Content: I have spent days before buying this, reviewing, searching i was disapointed when it came, the store opens but has a server error. everything it good besides. the camera also haspoor resolution.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a tablet
Reviews.Author: JayT78
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these as Christmas gifts for family members and they loved them. The shipping was great and the product is a really nice.

Reviews.Title: For the most part, I like this tablet.
Reviews.Author: Karen Dupre
Reviews.Content: I like the compact size and the fact it can fit in my purse. It is perfect size to fit in my hand.I like the ease of use. I wish the camera was on both sides, but for the price, it's a pretty good product. It slides pretty good without hesitation. It satifys the purpose for what IT want from it.I would buy another one, in fact I would like to purchase one for my sister. II have only had it for about a month, but so far it is everything I expected.The instructions that came with it are  not very good and hard to understand, but the tablet is easy tolearn.

Reviews.Title: Very Mad and upset
Reviews.Author: Tracie Tramell
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed in the tablets. Both of them flicker and one of them all the components are offset. The seller wants me to pay shipping back to them for him to look at them and see if i am telling the truth and if so then he will repair them. I feel like he should have offered to send us 2 new ones with pre-paid labels to return the other two or to do a pick up for them and refund my money. I have went round and round with this seller and I am very very pissed due to I have 2 very unhappy children due to this was there valentine's gift. Seller say I have only 10 days to return them and since I only get paid twice a month I do not have the money to pay for them to be return. Just very very dissatisfied and not sure if I will ever purchased anything like this again. One it has been a nightmare back and fourth with emails to get them return. It is costing me money to return them when they were defected when the seller ship them to me and he made me like I was a liar when saying if they are doing what I said he would repair them. REALLY!!!! repair them. I am a point I don't know what to do except to accept that I am gonna be out $180.00 bucks that I cannot afford. I have a child with cancer and lupus and is taking 23 pills a day. In the hospital at least every other month and all i wanted was her to have something to occupy her when she was stuck in the house for days at a time due to she has no immune system and when she was in the hospital. I should have just spent the extra money and went to a local store and bought one that way if there was a problem all I had to do is drive over there and get the problem solved. Very unhappy customer and this was my first time to purchase amazon and just may have to be my last.Sincerely,Tracie Tramell

Reviews.Title: not what I thought it would be
Reviews.Author: Jacktut
Reviews.Content: most of the tablets that I see in similar price are alot faster, I purchased my tablet a few weeks before christmas 2012 and to be honest I am not that satisfied with it. in the original posting it states that its super fast but this thing force closes most apps, and as well I had to restore it to factory setting a few times now. I will never buy a certain item for the color ever again. its made very cheap and the touch screen part isn't glued down right. but hey for under $100 not too bad if you can deal with force closes and such.

Reviews.Title: Bad, bad, bad, just awful
Reviews.Author: Myroslava M.
Reviews.Content: Freezes on almost every website I go to, nothing works, it's slow and looking at screen for some reasons hurts my eyes. I wish I never bought it. There's a reason why expensive good tablets are expensive and this one is cheap.

Reviews.Title: Okay Product
Reviews.Author: Verdelia Burks
Reviews.Content: This is a good tablet for children. It does freeze up and you have to switch it off to standby and on again to unfreeze it quite regularly. Not sure who to call or where to go to fix this, as there was no customer service number provided with the packaging. I purchased it for my 11 year old and her only complaint was the freezing. It takes decent pictures and you can access and download all apps and watch youtube videos.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy with Purchase
Reviews.Author: Agnes
Reviews.Content: very short battery life ... does not have usb port so the case I purchased with keyboard that has a usb is useless.....

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: D. Peterson
Reviews.Content: First off I am pretty sure this was refurbished....Secondly like few other people have said, the screen till start coming off in one of the corners, not sure what kind of cheap stuff they are using but it doesn't hold.Screen rotates too much if you ask me but thats not the killer for this its all the other things.Woke up this morning and the screen was peaking out a little and something have gotten underneath it, the screen got cracked while trying to get it out........

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Realword
Reviews.Content: For the first 2 weeks, the Zeepad was a God-send.  It has great games, skype, netflix, etc.  But I noticed the battery life becoming less and less.  Now after a whopping 5 weeks, the battery life on this tablet is about 1 hour after being fully charged.  Of course, the people at Zeepad cannot be reached.  I do not recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Won't stand the test of kids
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: Truth be told, most of the tablets in the >$80 range are all the same crappy tablet, just a different brand name and price. AVOID Allwinner, .TABNero, Zeepad, Chromo, Tagital, Matricom and ZTO. We have been through several since Christmas but these light weight tablets have charging issues (even with a two port option) and do not stand up more than 4 months of daily use. Great tablet for a grandma just getting started out, not so much for a family setting. Bumped or dropped a few times and you will be looking for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer a13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Android 4.0, 4GB Capacity
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these and 1 of them the sound did not work and there is an area on the screen that doesn't work.  I contacted the seller and they told me how to do a factory reset on it which I tried and it did not work.  They told me then to call Worry Free Gadgets which I called and left a message and nobody has yet to call me back.  The one that works is very nice.  I am concerned though with the one that doesn't work and if I will even get a call back.

Reviews.Title: bad experience
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: They shipped it late, it was received late and as my husband took it out of the box on christmas the screen was lifting on the corner. I did not expect a ipad but this Product is very low grade and seller is not recommended

Reviews.Title: power packed
Reviews.Author: Evert Robinson
Reviews.Content: This unit has all that you will need...its durable, has the latest OS,and the Capactive screen is super senseitive...I would recommend this unit to anyone.

Reviews.Title: my zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jo ann linville
Reviews.Content: Well trying to figure it out is the hard part but I am not technology savvy. Once I set up my google account I could download books which was the main purpose. but it does all kinds of things.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price and for the little one!
Reviews.Author: Bizzykidz
Reviews.Content: Was very anxious to get this and yes a little nervous to! Just wanted something inexpensive for my 7 year old to use and this is perfect! Already downloaded some of his fave apps that he plays on my iphone and they work great!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice For the Price
Reviews.Author: D Mack
Reviews.Content: This product was a Christmas gift for my 11 yr old daughter. After having it for over a month, we are quite pleased with its performance (for the money). I paid $72.00 for it, and quite honestly, I was a bit nervous, thinking that the quality and performance might not be that good.We were pleasantly surprised! The packaging was nice and the item was nicer than expected. It's NOT a workhorse, but for simple web surfing and downloading and playing games, its near perfect. My daughter even uses it for school as a dictionary and research tool.I've noticed that the battery doesn't have a very long life, about 2 hrs at best. I'm not too worried about that because it's rare that she uses it for much longer than that.If you're looking for an inexpensive, quality tablet, this is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Low Battery Life Freezes All The Time!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Sova
Reviews.Content: Got becasuse of the reviews. I actually purchased one for my little brother for Christmas first and thought the first one was fine. This one though seems slower and freezes way more often then my brothers. Also, on both the battery life sucks! Ends up dead by the time you get into the first scramble words game going. I also purchased a larger SD card (16) because once you get it with all the apps that are already on it...not a whole lotta room left. If it could have a better battery likfe and not freeze so much would be so much happier with it! I am definitly saving my money for the new IPod Touch...just thought I would start off with a tablet to see if I'd use it. I would use this a whole lot more if it worked better.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Tabs
Reviews.Author: mmmagrady
Reviews.Content: I bought four of these tablets for Christmas in 2012.  I returned one right away because the power button was stuck on, causing it to continuously shutdown and start.  I was refunded my money for this one.  I sent two of these tablets to step-children out of state and was recently informed that one does not work and one does.  The last tablet, I gave to my--at the time---3 and 1/2 year old son.  He loved it for a year, then just after Christmas 2013, it stopped working.  It won't turn on or charge.  I have since bought a couple more tablets that are name brand and a little more expensive, but they work with no problems.  I don't think I would purchase the zeepad again.

Reviews.Title: Start
Reviews.Author: allenbrig
Reviews.Content: Had trouble with start button and the screen saver.Sometime would not start and could not get bubbles out of the screen saver.Final,could not start at all.

Reviews.Title: Excellen
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Torres
Reviews.Content: all came to my entire satisfaction, I can recommend widely to make their purchases hereby, all my products came to my entire satisfaction

Reviews.Title: Please do not buy
Reviews.Author: Hanson R.
Reviews.Content: Please do not buy this zeepad 7"tablet on less you have money to throw away please learn from my experience I bougth two zeepad tablets for my kids for christmas last year (2013) and after one month there was a problem with one it was not taking charge I returned it to amazon and was refunded. Now the next tablet is getting extremely hot when in use I will return it , my kids told me better  I should of purchase two post cards with the money for the zeepad tablet .I am sorry kids.  So once again do not buy this zeepad tablet......................

Reviews.Title: Perfomace was very poor.
Reviews.Author: Roger Scheele
Reviews.Content: Do not purchase this product unless you have a lot of time on your hands to wait for all the minor lag and crashes it has incurred. Returned it in the first 3 days of purchase. There are several other products out there in a similar price range that work.

Reviews.Title: Blah
Reviews.Author: DannyDevito
Reviews.Content: Nice color, but thats where the good ends. The damn thing freezes constantly. The LCD quality is pretty bad (think mid 2k's cell phone screens). They for some dumb reason put the phone version of android on, so it is constantly searching for cell signal even in airplane mode. You get about 30min of battery life due to this. Upon research, this is a common problem when putting the phone version on a tablet. To fix the issue you have to Root the tablet, and being it's a China tablet, probably not wise as it's almost guranteed to brick it. Save up and get a Kindle etc.

Reviews.Title: Lousy zeepad rendered useless after 1week  never received it.
Reviews.Author: larry powell
Reviews.Content: It stop working  after 1 week machine freezing  unable to open programs.not worth sending for repair I purchased insurance never came in mail.

Reviews.Title: Easy break
Reviews.Author: Ada Rivera
Reviews.Content: This I ten is poorly made. It was dropped once and the case came apart.  It was a gift to my niece, I was embarrassed.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the $60
Reviews.Author: Brenda Fonseca
Reviews.Content: I knew I was going to get something cheap but it is not worth it - I wouldn't even spend $10 for this device.  It was frustrating, slow, wouldn't charge and the screen was very poor quality.  Would rather have spent the money on craft supplies and let me kids play the old fashioned way

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: reinaldo garcia
Reviews.Content: poor image quality in a lot of issues not really happy with this item. picture quality is really bad bad

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: Jamie Elisabeth Mathis
Reviews.Content: My sister bought two of these for my daughters last year for Christmas. The seller was Goodios.  She ordered them in November. The first order never shipped and they refunded her money without sending a note that it didn't ship. She reordered them two weeks before Christmas. They shipped from China and finally arrived in February. Of the two the charger for one didn't work. I wasn't too concerned because we could just use the other one.  After a week the charger won't make a connection with either tablet. It doesn't go all the way in and sit flush. Wish we had known and my sister could have saved some money and bought the girls a present they can actually use!!! I tried contacting the seller but since I didn't by them, there isn't much I can do.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for! "Kds Toy"
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old boy. He loves my I Pad mini so I thought this would make a good starter. He still wants my iPad! The tablet runs slow. You can't play a game or watch a movie because something is always updating. At times the screen dosn't  respond to touch. It has a few glitches. Over all I guess you get what you pay for. It works, and it's cheep enough to let the kids play with it without being worried the caust of repair. If it would have been bought for myself I would send it back! I wish I would've paid the extra and got him a tablet just for kids for around $100.00.

Reviews.Title: Maybe for a child
Reviews.Author: Edgardo Maravilla
Reviews.Content: Maybe this one will satisfy a child and not a full grown person like me. I was thinking of having a tablet without spending much,but this one is now wasted as I cant find any use to it. But my niece may like it. Not recommended for full users(my own opinion only).Please dont ask me any further question or inquiries as I have nothing to share.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk....
Reviews.Author: selcuk mumcu
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my 2.5 yr son thinking he would eventually break it and it would be easy to replace.  However, it did not even last 4 - 5 months.  Battery died!So, my verdict is.  Don't buy it...The old adage holds true:  " I am not rich enough to buy cheap products."I don't know if it has warranty.  I will see if I can get a replacement.  Probably not.

Reviews.Title: Poor excuse for a tablet, for any age user
Reviews.Author: Michelle D.
Reviews.Content: The one star was given because we had to. Pros: Color choice, purchase price  Cons: Poor resolution, slow to load and the charge lasts about an hour. This tablet cannot be operated while plugged in to charger, and a full charge required 8-10 hours. This was sent back, and a better tablet was purchased. Don't waste your time or your money.

Reviews.Title: Damaged camera and USB port does not work
Reviews.Author: Ping
Reviews.Content: I received the tablet with enthusiasm. It worked fine until I realize that the camera shows static. There is not even a glimpse of image. I have never been able to use it. Also i tried to connect my flashdrive and other USB devices to it but they do not show up. I contacted the seller but I am yet to receive a response. I am not pleased with my purchase and the poor customer service.

Reviews.Title: Ahhhhhhhhh!
Reviews.Author: Ran
Reviews.Content: The tablet has not broken down.. YET!  I'm waiting for it (It's my 6 year old's tablet).  My problem with the tablet is everything that came with it was garbage and timed for self destruction.  The stylus lasted 1 literal day the connector lasted 2 literal days; haven't used the usb adapter so its still around.. The screen protector latest about 1 week.. Again i'm waiting for the tablet to go if it was also built to this quality.The stylus point pushed in; The connector was brittle and the prongs broke into the case... 2 Stars..As far as the tablet its self it is working pretty well; expected speed, response and cam image quality...

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Tester
Reviews.Content: Do not buy if children under 7 years of age it lasted us about 6months. Bought two, and both screen cracked.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Present
Reviews.Author: Regina Gamble
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday day present for my daughter it does not have flash camera like it was noted false advertisement also it looked used I should of taken it out of the box before I gave it to her and  she did not receive the earphones and something else it was suppose to come with it.  I ordered this  back in April because it was cheap.  Now I see Zeepad has taken the part out about flash camera and reduced the price.  I would not recommended this to someone over the age of 5.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for Kids
Reviews.Author: K. Lucas
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these to save my Kindle from my 5 year old twins.  They love them so much, I now have to pry the zeepads out of their hands to get them to come to dinner.  This is NOT the same calibre tablet as the Kindle Fire HD or the iPad, or Samsung!  The screen is not HD, the touch sensors are sluggish, the processor is not fast and the battery life is relatively short.  That said, it works perfectly in the twin's small hands and gives them access to games and a camera AND it has the capacity for more memory.  I am happy give them this much power for less than $100.  I'm not sure how long they will last, but so far I don't regret my purchase at all.  Over all, I am happy with them.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: crazymama7
Reviews.Content: This item is horrible..from day one I had serious problems with it, it will not hold a charge, it freezes up constantly,shuts off by itself, it is very slow!!! It is the worst tablet you can purchase!

Reviews.Title: Not a good tablet.
Reviews.Author: Mildred P. Gomez
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zeepad for my daughter in January.  For some reason the color of the screens is turning green.  It started off with some parts of the pictures were not the right color but now almost the whole screen has the wrong color. I made sure that the color setting was correct. The seller would not exchange it for us.  after only owning it for less than 4 months my daughter is not able to use her tablet.

Reviews.Title: Won't turn on
Reviews.Author: Tracy Youngquist
Reviews.Content: I puchased 3 for xmas gifts for my 2 10 year olds and an 8 year old and a month in they won't turn on.  Waste of money:(

Reviews.Title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Ana C. McCarthy
Reviews.Content: face it, this is a cheap device, it's a little slow BUT it's never crashed! If you're patient, it does all that it is required to do. I had a little problem connecting the charger just as i was approaching 3 month ownership. Very disappointed was i. I contacted HD Design through Amazon here and WITHOUT question, without wanting the old device, they shipped a new one! Thank You HD-Design, I am VERY happy. -Ana

Reviews.Title: It is a piece of trash
Reviews.Author: susan foster
Reviews.Content: I will never ever buy another one. I have had so many problems with it, And I have told everyone that I know to never buy one. It isn't even worth a penny in my opinion. I have had to do 3 factory restores due to it being encrypted. The battery power only lasts like 45 minutes. And I had a few games that I downloaded and ended up with someone else's information. I am extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: It was great for about 10mins
Reviews.Author: tmac_91
Reviews.Content: If this product boots up, it's a fantastic value.  Touch screen is very responsive, and the tablet seems pretty robust.However, the unit I ordered only booted up one time.  It was completely dead after that, even after days of charging.  Returning it for a refund.  Save your money and buy something better.

Reviews.Title: STOP ITS NOT WORTH IT
Reviews.Author: Asaelfreezing
Reviews.Content: I bought this a few weeks ago and all it does is freeze and reboot on its own the tablet camera is terrible for 40 I at least expect it to run smoothly but I guess I can't even get that don't waste your money on this

Reviews.Title: great pc tablet!!!!
Reviews.Author: Annette  Freeman
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet the touch sensitivity is awesome, great for playing games on.lots of apps to choose from on goolgle.watching movies on netflix is wonderful youtube is great also!!! just a wonderful tablet all around!!!! also receieved  tablet 10 days before estimated delivery date!love ordering from amazon~

Reviews.Title: awful
Reviews.Author: MissKorey
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for. Very very basic but the apps don't work! Not one app I loaded worked so I returned it and just paid double for a kindle instead .

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Ellamae brown
Reviews.Content: i like it but it didn't evin last two weeks because its not worken any moor.its not chargein.its no moor use to me

Reviews.Title: Smh
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Kia
Reviews.Content: This product does not hold the charge. I did exactly what the directions told me to do and the charge was gone within 30mins to and hour. So I got my kids iPad minis. They love them

Reviews.Title: Keeps Freezing
Reviews.Author: DC
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item for my nephew for his 6th birthday. It was a great price and when it arrived I thought it was the perfect weight and size for a 6 year old to handle/manage. Unfortunately, on first use the zeepad froze up repeatedly and requireed rebooting. Planning to return it to vendor today.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Katherine M. Lovsey "KML"
Reviews.Content: got this to go with a tablet for my niece. she doesn't use it because it only works half the time.

Reviews.Title: beyond awesome
Reviews.Author: effy
Reviews.Content: I luv this tablet. I was worried how well it would work and if I had to buy a bigger memory card right away but the amount of memory it comes with is plenty for all the apps and games I want to play. It works really good and I luv the fact that my tablets pink and the same size as those ipad minis for wayyyyyy less money. The tablet got shipped to me sooner than the expected date too. All in all I'm searching these guys for all my electronics purchases from now on. Great job you guys. Excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: WARNING PIECE OF CRAP DON'T BUY
Reviews.Author: Jamie S. Mustard "~J-ME~"
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 of these in Feb and 1 month later only one of them still works.  There is no rest button on them and they won't hold a charge.  I want my money back but I know I will never get it.  When looking it up online since there is no brand name (and ZeePad is not a brand name) you can't find any info on the piece of S***.  Not only am I pissed about this but you have screwed my kids over.  Thanks for nothing.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: mandie
Reviews.Content: The zeepad work as well as my Ipad really good deal for the price. Only thing I don't like is that you cant see the screen from a angle. Its best for front head one viewing. camera was ok and its small enough it slides easily into my purse. my 3 young kids now want one sense they can afford one verses the apple alternative at 400$ over all I would buy this item over again and will for my kids .

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This gel cover is really nice and goes well with the 7 inch tablet I bought for my step daughter.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Kimler
Reviews.Content: It works like as well as a Ipad with out the cost.  I got me and my sister one and we love them.  Great for travel.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet - Headphones sucked
Reviews.Author: hansueter
Reviews.Content: My 16 month old son is always taking my phone to play on.  I needed something he could play with and I not have to worry about him wrecking it and me being out a lot of money.  This is perfect.  He's dropped it several times, and still no issue.  The back did pop off one time when he dropped it, and it just popped right back on.  It also works for what I need too.  I've used it several times now to do work on.  Obviously there is not much memory so you'll need an extra micro SD, but for the price, I'll take it...I did how ever have an issue with the ear buds that came with it.  There was a nasty dirty finger print on the ear piece.  They weren't the best quality ear buds anyways, but I definitely wasn't using them after that.  I contacted the seller, and they sent me a new set of earbuds in a different brand.  Small issue, but still 100% happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Do I have to give it a star???
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Duckett
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my two daughters for Christmas. One was dropped on Christmas day and has been in a computer repair shop since, he says it is junk.  This I realize, could be due to it being dropped. However the other zeepad I purchased stopped working in late January! It had never been dropped! I know the cost to purchase these tablets was extremely inexpensive, however I would expect them to work for longer than one month. I am highly disappointed in this product!

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware-Horrible piece of junk!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jokergeorge
Reviews.Content: This thing was good for a few days+then it was over.We bought it for our daughter,who handled it with great care,+within days she said the volume didn't work.Then it wouldn't connect to wifi.Then it would frequently freeze up+she can't rectrieve her video+pictures she took of her schoolmates now.The manual is written in broken english+the Square Trade warranty we bought for this(Amazon recommended it)is useless.They just passed the buck right back to the Zeepad manufacturer-which is nearly impossible to get a phone number,or e-mail to contact them- and to Amazon,which hasn't done anything yet.This is a joke all the way around+a complete waste of money,never mind our daughter being heart broken after she waited so long to get a tablet of her own.Don't buy this garbage+skip the "recommended" Square Trade warranty!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet!
Reviews.Author: L. Smith "grammasmitty"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a grandchild. Played with it for a full day, setting it up with Wifi and several apps. It is just a little slower than my Galaxy, but other than that is just a great tablet. Priced well for a child. Connects to internet, display is good. Takes pictures with front camera, wish there was a back camera. Storage is small (4 gb) but can be expanded with a 32 gb mini sd card. Very pleased with this product!

Reviews.Title: Here on time and I love it.
Reviews.Author: Chris Randazzo "Chris Randazzo"
Reviews.Content: It's no iPad, but the system is better. It has Flash, not QuickTime, and the apps are better than on an iPod/iPad. You can easily just pick it up, put it in a case, and take it anywhere. It has a freaking awesome cam as well. I apologize for the first negative rating, as the shipping was great, the boxing was in perf condition, so thanks. c:

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Pink Juice
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zee Pad for my 4 yr. old and she loves it! I have not had any problems with it (knock on wood) and it is very easy to use. I thought with the price being so low, I would have to struggle to make it perform right, but to my surprise we got a great deal. I would recommend the Zee Pad for anyone looking for a tablet and doesn't want to spend an "arm and leg" for it!

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: rliz22
Reviews.Content: I ordered this so that I could listen to internet radio at work since the AM/FM reception is terrible!  This does everything I need and more.  I'm just figuring out some of the apps I can use and watching videos, looking at photos, etc.  There are some fun games also which is an added bonus.  Works great, volume is good.  I'm sure it's not as fancy as an ipad but it works perfect for me!

Reviews.Title: unable yo unlock
Reviews.Author: ROBERT DEVERNAY
Reviews.Content: locked by 9 yr old using patterns..unable to unlock a month later ,spent hrs on the net, still no answers.. any help? anyone?

Reviews.Title: good little tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Sergio
Reviews.Content: Considering the price this is a good tablet. Do not expect nexus 7 performance. It can get laggy especially if multitasking. Battery life depends on usage, but anywhere between 2and 3 h. I bought it for my 3 year old niece and for what she needs it, it is great.

Reviews.Title: Way better than expected for cost
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This was my third attempt at buying my 14 to son a tablet. The others had been nothing but problems. I did not hold out much hope for this one as it was $40 cheaper than the others I had tried but to my great surprise it has worked great with no glitches at all. Easy to use, access to google play, decent video.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Had problems from the get go. I guess you get what you pay for. I ended up buying the samsung galaxy 7'' and Im happy with it.

Reviews.Title: works fine my granddaughter loves the games
Reviews.Author: Faye Powe
Reviews.Content: no problems with tablet I cannot steal it from my granddaughter. She will play her games and put it back in the case.She's only 2***

Reviews.Title: Aweful product
Reviews.Author: Disappointed customer
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for my kids and none of them worked. I sent all of them back. The product was poorly made and even though the price was low, the product was even lower.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: This is our first tablet an I think it's great for what we use it for an a great start ;)

Reviews.Title: Sent it back
Reviews.Author: Dancherd
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 yr old with restrictions on when she could use it providing homework is done, chores are done etc. With that stipulation, to protect her from being tempted, and because I am smart, I put a password on it. At first I used the slide lock. Well I forgot the combination but after 3 tries it asked if I wanted to open with my google account. Nice save! So still feeling pretty sure of myself I set a password and left for work. Returning home to find her chores done, homework done and room clean  she earned play time. I have to admit that after hours of trying every combination of what I thought the password was, I was never able to unlock it.I take full responsibility for forgetting the password. I give this tablet a low rating because there is NO reset button!! Before sending back I searched for hours on the internet looking for help on how to reset it. For the money it is not a bad product and my daughter enjoyed it for her first tablet. But what are the chances that she would set a password and forget later on without any way to reset it? With the slide lock after 3 tries it did give the option to override and we were able to get in. With the password however, I tried over 300 combinations and never got the option to open with my google account. I saw many other sites with the same complaint but never found an answer. Nor was I able to find the manufacturer info to call and ask if there was a way to reset the tablet. So I sent it back and will try another brand.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money!
Reviews.Author: Laura Harwick
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my son for Christmas.  He played it maybe 10 times before it stopped working.  The backlight will turn on for a few seconds, but no picture will show up.  I ordered these early so it is past the date available to return the item.  Very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: i did not like it
Reviews.Author: brittany
Reviews.Content: it was not the kind of tablet that i wanted.i want one that has a front and back cam. that what i want

Reviews.Title: resets
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: My son got this for Christmas from his grandma. He likes it other then his angry birds games keep resetting. He is getting very frustrated with it now.

Reviews.Title: 7" tablet
Reviews.Author: william hyatt
Reviews.Content: works great, can download all apps.  just as good as an ipad for 1/4th of the cost.  i would suggest this product to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Bought by a mom for a teen
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got our zeepad. Thus far, I must write a review on what I am experiencing for other non-tech savvy moms considering this for a kid to use for homework applications. I have it on the charger, and whoo boy! I can tell right from the box that the charger connection is going to be an issue! On the plus side~ there are ample attachments/wires/accessories, for the price. I have a usb adapter, headphones, the charger, and an adapter for the keyboard (keyboard NOT included!). The charging connection is wonky enough to mention to anyone considering this purchase. The price is nice, and I am still optimistic that it will do what I need it to do, but be forewarned on the charger not fitting into the pad snugly. You will have to keep an eye on it and make sure it doesn't get jostled.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: JeffWeisbaker
Reviews.Content: The keyboard does not pickup correctly sometimes, It cannot find wifi spots and The  keyboardcase i have will not operate when connected to the pad. am think about colntacting the seller about returning it .

Reviews.Title: Basic tablet
Reviews.Author: A, CHRISTIE
Reviews.Content: I havent used an expensive tablet before but this one still seems a little cheap.It works fine but the instructions were written by a foreigner and really donthelp with the use at all. You just have to figure it out as you go which is mostlynot to hard. I havent figured out how to have a favorites list yet.Overall a decent value for the price but dont expect anything like an IPad.

Reviews.Title: Not usable
Reviews.Author: Garry
Reviews.Content: Ok, it is an inexpensive tablet. My biggest problem with it was out of the box it would not turn on. Could not really get a good read on performance. Once it did start it was very slow and response time was horrible. I assume something was amiss with the processor. The absolute great news is the unit was returned and my money credited back without delay. Amazon Rocks!

Reviews.Title: This tablet is horrible
Reviews.Author: A. Burgett
Reviews.Content: This tablet is HORRIBLE!!! Every 2 hours you have to charge it, wi-fi runs REALLY slow, it freezes all the time, and the screen will break if you hardy even drop it. I thought I was getting a good  deal but-NO. I am going to throw this away! Do NOT buy this!!! I am going to buy an apple product (ipad) those are good items.

Reviews.Title: Cheap fabrication
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: Screen is too slim while time you touch screen with a small pressure and you can see a black spot by your finger ...Battery is holding for 25 min ... It means its usseless .....To slow  TouCh screen most games doesn't feel a touch screenBorough this tablet for my wife only because review said is great tablet -IT'S NOT

Reviews.Title: don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Anna Seeger "the goodbee girl"
Reviews.Content: The tablet came with a cracked screen.  Sent it back right after Christmas. Waiting to hear from vender that he received it.

Reviews.Title: fabulous tablet
Reviews.Author: Charmaine White "CWhite"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 7 yrs grandson. He loves this tablet. This tablet is a good purchase for people who are not tech savvy.  However, sometimes it freezes, but, all you have to do is turn off the tablet and turn back on. Netflix works perfect on this tablet. My grandson downloads lots of games. FYI you might want to invest in a micro SD card for more memory. other than that, this is a fabulous tablet.

Reviews.Title: The Zeepad
Reviews.Author: PurpleDiva
Reviews.Content: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this THREE times, because I went out on a limb and actually bought 3 at one time for my kids at christmas; 8, 9 and 10 years old. I bought one in white, pink and black.  They are able to work them, I have found security apps to monitor the ones they download. They are just perfect- now the kids stay off of my phone and my Ipad!

Reviews.Title: ok tablet Bad company to deal with
Reviews.Author: Dianne
Reviews.Content: Got this for a present for my grandaughter for christmas.It came really fast .She opened it and started playing it .and she loves it.Update had a problem with tablet got ahold of engine 29 they said return it and they would fix it I did that They claimed they never got it back. I proved they did....Them they call me and tell me to send $10:00 to retuun it So  I do then they say they never got money order Now have proof it was cashed on April 16th. Still wont send Tablet back and will not answer my calls or emails!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Real Nice
Reviews.Author: Randy Landry
Reviews.Content: One of the best tablets out right now They Love Them Will Bye Another one if the price go back down

Reviews.Title: It's good for a kid - you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: JC in the DubC
Reviews.Content: Although the expedited shipping through the USPS was a few days behind schedule (better late than never) - I wont hold that against the manufacturer.The tablet itself is light-weight, easy to use, and meets my expectations for an Android OS. Although it took some tinkering in the settings, eventually I got it to unfreeze enough to download apps. (Instructions indicated doing something, but the print is so small and pictures even smaller that even with 20/20 vision I couldnt figure out what it said). The touch pad isn't always all that responsive...but for the most part, it's good enough for a 12 year old. I wasn't using the stylus that comes with it at the time..but perhaps the response from the touch screen would have been slightly better if it had.Ran into some issues of it 'not responding' and not accepting my request to shut the system off to try and fix the problem - eventually I did get it to come out of it's funk and it worked just fine. But it does freeze a bit. Runs a little slow, but with only 512MB of Ram, I chalk that up to the fact it's been a while since I've worked with something with such a slow processing speed.It's a decent reader - the kid prefers the weight and size compared to that massive Nook she got from another relative for Christmas. The fact that it is PINK is possibly the biggest plus. It does run most Google Play apps - so that is a plus since they are mostly free.  The front facing camera is pretty poor quality, so that feature for Skype is there, but know it's about as good as webcams from 10 years ago. If you're kids aren't very patient - might not be for them as it does seem to freeze if you're scrolling through the screens...but I like it over all and would even buy myself one for the reader alone.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: HappyMom
Reviews.Content: Product arrived today. Was a little worried about that. Well packaged and intact. I cant complain.  Tracking was easy and updated regularly. Its super cute bubble gum pink perfect for a little girl. Great for the price.  I messed around with it today and it works fine. Lets hope it stays that way. Only issue is I thought it was being shipped from MI and it came from CA. Had me worried about delivery dates. All in all satisfied. Happy holiday in my home.

Reviews.Title: i hate it
Reviews.Author: chevette
Reviews.Content: the product was received weeks late and wen the gift finally arrived the screne was broken and the tablet had scratches

Reviews.Title: defective
Reviews.Author: shannon ellison
Reviews.Content: I am trying to either get it replaced or return it bcuz the screen is not completely attached and the mic hole isn't big enough to put in ear phones head phones or even a small speaker .

Reviews.Title: perfec
Reviews.Author: oscar's
Reviews.Content: el paquete esta en buen estado solo en la espera para probar los productos, segun lo que indica la marcae un buen producto

Reviews.Title: Dead on arrival
Reviews.Author: lamerson77
Reviews.Content: The charger that I received is apparently not correct one? when it is plugged into the tablet, it doesn't set flush to the tablet.
